story:
Our Story

Andnothing is an apparel company that expresses and encourages empathy, human relationships, emotions, and actions. We had our start in late summer of '10 and over the past six months, we have found our inspiration in those around us. We believe in everyone's ability to recognize and embrace human emotions, to show compassion, and to find togetherness in those around you. We're about being a message, not a name.  


The Impact

We strive to empathize and relate on an everyday level. We want to be that constant reminder to anyone who wears our apparel, sees our apparel, or experiences anything we create. We express different messages through our art and offer you the opportunity to express those messages as well. By wearing or supporting our company, you take on the responsibilty to start that conversation, have an open mind, to show compassion, or simply put: Just Love. 


What We Need & What You Get

Through your donations you will be giving us the opportunity to expand and move our company beyond just apparel. As designers, Andnothing started as a way of expression for us and we would love to be able to translate our ideas and messages in all forms of art. For the '11 Holiday season we were able to produce personal Andnothing Mugs, and want to continue pushing the boundries of our apparel company.



With that, we're starting a project called 'The Empathy Project' where we'll be expressing ideas we believe in through custom screen prints, cards, electronic downloads, posters, words, pictures and everything in between which is due to release at the time of our new apparel line. 

You're donations will help our newest launch, but more importantly, you'll be giving us the means to take Andnothing to a height it hasn't had to opportunity to reach. We'll be able to print on more than t-shirts and expand into cardigans, sweatshirts, crewneck pull overs, beanies, and other means of apparel. 

As of now we're paying with the money our company has been able to make thus far, as well as out of our own pockets. If we don't meet our goal, we'll do the best to our ability to get you the products we want you to have and as much of the products we wish to create. 

As you can see, if all goes well, there are many exciting and one-time-only bundles we are offering for each contribution level! Every dollar counts, and we want to make sure you're getting everything you can for your dollar. 


Other Ways You Can Help

You can help us spread the word by visiting us on Facebook, liking our page, and telling your friends! Or, you can find us on any of our other social networks. 

http://www.facebook.com/andnothing

http://www.twitter.com/andnothingco

http://andnothingapparel.com/

story:
The Cesaro Story. 

Cesarò is an independent accessory company based in Cleveland, Ohio. We create fashionable, high quality wrist wear hand crafted in the United States. Our leather is the American classic, Horween, assuring quality and comfort at all times. The clasps are designed in house, and made in Italy. Our clasps range from gun metal, to stainless steel, to gold and rose gold. Cesarò guarantees quality men's wrist wear. We started this campaign to improve our product and gain brand awareness, we are also interested in receiving funding to start more fashion projects.

Products 

The A

The A is one of Cesarò's more luxurious and sleek bracelets. An 18k Gold Platted  magnetic clasp fitted to a clean, smooth monogramed black (or brown) leather. The bracelet comes in rose and yellow gold. 


The Solfra 

The Solofra is one of Cesarò's more unique and modern bracelets. A stainless steel magnetic clasp fitted to a German merino felted wool with a brown leather interior.


The Molise 

The Molise is our original bracelet. A gunmetal clasp fitted to a single strip of leather. It is available in 3 colors, Sadle, Navy Blue, and Dark Brown. 


How its made. 

The A. 

 We use fine hand-drawn Italian 18k Yellow and  Rose gold ore for our luxurious plating on The A. The gold is first stripped into the finest sheets of ore, then searched for the smallest imperfections. Finally it is fitted right into the Italian leather band making the perfect band. 
The Leather 

We use only the finest materials on our wrist wear such as Hand Pressed Horween Leather designed and embroidered for the most sensible feeling on the wrist.

The Clasp
The clasp on the Molise is a hand crafted stainless steel made in San Diego. It was important that we have some of our products made in the USA for their superior quality and to support of our country. 

 


The Monogram 
We hand press the Cesarò monogram into each of our bracelets at the exact center.

story:
We're obsessed with making the perfect backpack. 

Hi, I'm Stephanie - the co-founder of Quilted Koala. I love backpacks but couldn't find one that was both functional and attractive. So we started from scratch - it had to fit all of our requirements. Lightweight, ready for a full day of work, school or vacation -- and have a sense of style.

I hope you'll join our campaign and spread the word about our brand. We have lots of fun perks to make it easy and fun to join us on our mission to make the perfect backpack.

 

    What You Get When You Join #teamkoala:

    We want everyone to own a Quilted Koala bag and be a part of the QK family. 

    New Perk! Our best-selling Small CAMO Duffel. Perfect for men or women. Now $50 (reg $138).

     

    Our Mini Camo Clutch  (reg. $48, your Indiegogo price is just $25!)

    Other amazing  perks include:

     

      The Impact

      We're hoping you'll share the koalalove for our new backpacks.

      We are a small family-owned business based in New York City. We have an amazing product and we want everyone to be a part of the #backpackrevolution.  These backpacks always generate "ooohhs and aaahhhs" when people see them and even more positive energy when we say "go ahead pick it up!"

      Starting a new business, especially in the fashion world is challenging. Our biggest hurdle is  getting people to know that we exist. Once they do - people love us.  One of our biggest successes to date -- one of our canvas bags was featured in O, The Oprah Magazine as one of Gayle's favorite things. When the magazine came out, it was the most amazing feeling.

       

      Quilted Koala Featured On:

       

         

             

      Spread the Love

      fashion + function = #koalalove

      We think everyone would love carrying a Quilted Koala bag! We would be so grateful if you would share our campaign with your friends and family. 

       

      Thank you,

story:
BARBA+BRADA: Natural Beard Care for the Modern Man

A lot of beard care brands try to capitalize on the “manly man” image and grungy packaging, making you feel like you’re only allowed to be proud of your beard if you join that club. 

But our philosophy is simpler: “No bullshit. Only what your beard needs.” What does this mean? Uncomplicated, organic, small-batch beard care for beards of all sizes and colors.

Why should you give your beard special care?

  • Sensitivity: Your face is more sensitive than your scalp - and so is your beard. Hair products do more damage than good, as they're made for a different pH level. Beard care products are made to match your skin and beard needs.
  • Itchiness/flakiness: When growing a beard, you'll probably suffer from itchiness and flakiness. A good beard serum hydrates your beard and the skin beneath, reducing beardruff and any discomfort.
  • Split ends: Because your beard is exposed to the elements all day long, it may suffer breakage and split-ends. Your beard needs extra nutrients to grow healthy - and that's what a quality beard serum provides.

1. Choose a reward level. 
Choose the perk which you would like to acquire (including the aroma of products) and follow the instructions to check out. IndieGoGo allows you to choose only one reward level at a time. 

2. That’s it!
If you’ve chosen a "Barbershop" or "Retailer" perk, you will be contacted via e-mail to ask which aromas you would like after the campaign ends. Everyone will be contacted with their shipping details after the campaign ends.

Follow us on Facebook | Instagram | Medium

On a warm September afternoon, almost three years ago, Bruno decided he was going to grow his beard. Septembers get hot here in sunny Portugal, but "winter was coming" and a face blanket would come in handy.

Quickly, he got frustrated by not being able to grow it past the first few weeks ("thanks genetics!"). Besides, he couldn't find products that helped him in the quest. And you know what they say... "If you can't find it, make it". So he took the popular advice, and together with his partner Natasha, created his own beard care products.

---

The products gave birth to the brand - BARBA+BRADA - and since then, we've been helping Portuguese beards grow healthy and handsome.

After all the great feedback our barbudos* gave us (4.7 out of 5 stars, on average), we decided it was time to create the next generation of products. Also, we'd like the rest of the world to meet our brand - us Portuguese are all about sharing!

*that's what we call our bearded customers

BARBA+BRADA is Portugal’s leading beard care brand. We have been nourishing Portuguese beards for over two years and perfecting our products based on customer feedback (they gave us an average of 4.7 out of 5 stars!). Here at BARBA+BRADA, we are driven by our customers’ needs. The new lines we are launching now represent all of the knowledge and feedback we have accumulated so far. We have secured suppliers for our new products and handle all manufacturing and fulfilling in house. 

We do acknowledge that unforeseen circumstances, such as natural disasters or accidents, may occur and hinder our schedule. However, we have constructed our timeline with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events and are confident in delivering orders within the first few weeks after the campaign ends. We are devoted to providing consistent updates to this campaign about the production and shipment of  your perks. 

BARBA+BRADA IndieGoGo Shipping Policy


E.U. SHIPMENTS

Shipments to European Union countries are sent using CTT Portugal postal services. The perks will be shipped during the first few weeks after the campaign ends. Once shipped, packages should reach their destination in 3-7 business days, depending on which country your delivery address is based in. Orders shipped to Portugal should arrive in 2-3 business days. We do not provide the option for expedited shipping. All orders will be shipped with a tracking number that will be provided to you upon shipping. Track your order here.  

INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS

International packages are sent using CTT Portugal postal services. The perks will be shipped during the first few weeks after the campaign ends. Once shipped, packages should reach their destination in 5-11 business days, depending on where you are located. However, some shipments may take longer to reach certain destinations due to complexities associated with international shipping and local customs. We do not provide the option for expedited shipping. All orders will be shipped with a tracking number that will be provided to you upon shipping. Track your order here. 

Customs & Duties 

BARBA+BRADA is not responsible for any customs, duties, or import fees associated with receiving your BARBA+BRADA order. 

BARBA+BRADA IndieGoGo Warranty & Return Policy

All of BARBA+BRADA’s products are made in small batches to ensure quality and freshness. However, it is not our policy to offer refunds or returns on items received as IndieGoGo rewards. We will consider exchanges on a case-by-case basis. Please reach us at suporte@barbabrada.com if you have any concerns upon receiving your order.

story:
Introducing HOLYFANCY

"We don't have only a clean production, we are actually cleaning the environment while manufacturing our products "

HOLYFANCY was created by a young couple and was successfully funded on Kickstarter on January 6th, they are now available for pre-order here on Indiegogo at special prices.

EARTH-FRIENDLY FASHION - Every backpack produced by us removes at least 15 plastic bottles + 900g of cotton scraps from the environment. The production of our fabrics is also free from water and dye - besides being zero carbon emission. 

SOCIAL CONCERN - In addition of being innovative in its use and its materials, HOLYFANCY DAILYPACK also finances part of a Social Program in Brazil as all the pouches are handmade by a community in Rio de Janeiro where different jobs/activities are created to help people in need. 

 

How to get yours

To become a backer of this project you only need to click on the Perk you want and enter your payment info. Your order will ship once we have finished fulfilling pre-orders made previously on Kickstarter.

Risks & Challenges

Our project may have to propose different colors every year because the fabrics are produced according to our demand.

story:
THIN ICE: The Most Exciting and Truly Satisfying Thing You’ll Buy All Year Has Just Arrived… Once or twice in a generation a truly amazing event takes place.


A technological breakthrough takes place that is so different, profound, innovative and truly user-friendly, it is destined to impact literally BILLIONS of lives worldwide.

We’re biased. But with very good reason.

Because we know beyond any shadow of doubt, that the moment you try it, you’ll feel 100% convinced that Thin Ice – the world’s first ‘wearable’ weight loss clothing line, is such a breakthrough.

It has been described as being ‘Like something from a science fiction movie from the 22nd Century’

But in this case, while the technology definitely deserves the title ‘space-age’ it is 100% real. And it is available for you to start enjoying today!

This is the Thin Ice Vest 1.0 that had been already developed with your help. Now we have a prototype of Thin Ice Vest 2.0 that is thinner with longer battery life and controlled by an application. 

Thin Ice Vest 1.0:

 Thin Ice Vest 2.0:

You can use the Thin Ice Vest 2.0 anywhere, anytime doing you day-by day stuff including work, sleep, watch TV...

How It Works:

It works 100% exactly like in the video you just watched.

You simply wear your new Thin Ice Vest and it immediately starts to work - helping you to burn fat and lose weight. Burning an estimated 500 to 1,000 calories a day based on controlled-scientific studies that feature similar features and durations to the recommended use of Thin Ice.

Thin Ice is controlled by the super-easy-to-use app . The technology strategically cools parts of the body with high concentrations of thermoreceptors which stimulate the brown adipose tissue (BAT) pathway.

This miraculous pathway burns white fat (bad fat) to produce heat, burning calories in the process!

More on the Battery

The battery will be located in the arch of the back and is being custom built to accommodate the shape of the average back. This is the best possible area to ensure most size accommodation while maintaining a sleek design under clothing. Here is a cartoon of where the battery is located:

The battery will be lithium ion and will snap into place on the back of the vest. The battery will be charged on a charging pad in between vest usages. The capacity of the battery is projected to be between 1-4 hours depending on the setting the vest is put on. I.e. lower temperatures sap more battery power than higher ones!

The battery is an important part of this revolutionary technology's ability to keep you cool and help you stimulate brown fat.

Brown Fat? Wait a Minute… Surely Fat Something I’m Trying to ‘Get Rid of’ Not Stimulate?

Actually the answer is “Yes!” and “No!”

Because you see, not all fat cells are created equal.

In fact, there 2 major categorizations of fat cells with very different applications:

- White Fat, the ‘Couch Potatoes’ of the Body

White fat is what most of us know the most about and what we are trying to actively get rid of. White fat cells are designed to passively store fatty acids for use as energy in future activities. These cells expend very little energy to subsist, and thus have only few mitochondria which are the engines of the cell world. White fat cells are like the couch potatoes of the body. They sort of just ‘lounge around’ and wait for the body to request their fuel.

The problem with that is that with our sedentary lives, our bodies don’t often need a surplus of fuel and the white fat cells can sit around for years – making YOU fatter and fatter and fatter in the process.

- Brown Fat

Brown fat, also known as brown adipose tissue, is a tissue you probably don’t know as much about as white fat, but you should!

Brown fat cells are a much more active than their white cousins and have a very different function. Instead of passively storing fat, brown adipose tissue’s role in the body is to BURN fatty acids as a fuel source.

In this case, the fat is burnt to create heat which helps to keep the body warm, protecting it from cooling down.

Here is a helpful chart that compares the different kinds of fat cells in our body:

Thin Ice technology might sound too good to be true but we are proud to say its creation has been based on science. The peer-reviewed literature on the ‘Brown adipose tissue pathway and its calorie burning properties’ has guided our every move throughout the entire project.

If you want to look into some of the articles that inspired us and learn more about the fascinating science of the BAT pathway, please check out these articles and publications:

Brown Adipose Tissue in Humans:

http://www.nature.com/ijo/journal/v34/n1s/full/ijo2010183a.html

Supercharging Brown Fat to Battle Obesity:

http://www.scientificamerican.com/article/supercharging-brown-fat-to-battle-obesity/ 

Cold-Activated Brown Adipose Tissue in Health Men:

http://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa0808718

"Clothing to Help Freeze Off the Fat" - DailyRX

If you want more guidance through this exciting literature please email support@thiniceweightloss.com and we can suggest some further readings!

Amazing Real-World Examples of the miracle of BAT...

Besides the scientific articles on the subject matter there are also a tonne of anecdotal examples of the same temperature-related weight-loss effects at play.

One of the most salient examples is that of Michael Phelps’ diet as he trained for the Beijing Olympics. During that time, he ate the 12,000 calories on a daily basis. See his diet pictured below:

FACT: Phelps was able to eat all of that (6 times more than the average person) while staying ripped. Only about half this calorie intake is explainable by his exercise regime and basal metabolic rate. The thousands of missing calories are accounted for by considering Phelps trained in a pool as opposed to land for 4 hours a day.

FACT: Water is 42 times more thermally conductive than air is. This means heat was leaving Phelps’ body much faster than it would have if he was on land leading to massive calorie burning to create heat to keep him warm.

This is the exact same process that is at play with Thin Ice products, albeit without the sogginess!

BAT also helps to explain why: People scaling Mt. Everest need to pound back sticks of butter not to die of starvation and why people living in climates with more pronounced seasons (including cold ones) tend to have a slightly easier time keeping off weight.

This weight-loss method has been hiding in plain sight throughout our struggles and failed weight-loss attempts.

Don’t let it sneak away again! Contribute NOW and get your very own 2.0 Thin Ice Vest!

What Do I Get In My Thin Ice System?

Finally, a weight-loss solution that was invented with science in mind. But, you ask, what EXACTLY do I get when contribute for a Thin Ice system? Well, in short, you get an absolute bucket load of seriously amazing stuff!

But don’t take our word for it. Take an in depth look into each amazing part of the 2.0 Thin Ice System:

1) The 2.0 Thin Ice Vest: 

The 2.0 vest is a marvel of modern technology that functions using battery-powered Peltier-based cooling technology that effectively pumps heat out of the body, emulating the effects of ice.

 Your new Thin Ice Vest will have these amazing features:

2) The Thin Ice app for:

The Thin Ice app is the command center of your Thin Ice experience. This app will allow you to adjust the temperature of the device manually or set the temperature maintenance mechanism.

The app is also able to give you an ongoing estimate of how many calories you’ve burnt while wearing it, based on the temperature you’ve been using it at.

The app also features:

  • Unlockable achievements to keep you motivated and having FUN achieving your goals 
  • Other tracking tools to help optimize additional areas of your fitness regime 
  •  Intuitive design and smooth functionality

 3) The Thin Ice Lifestyle E-Book:

We here at Thin Ice are not one-trick-ponies. We have done done and we are doing tonnes or research to bring together an e-book that will help you hack your body in a slew of interesting ways you never thought possible.

Did you know, you burn 600 calories when donating blood?

Did you know chewing gum burns 11 calories an hour?

We get at the science of many many body hacks and harness them to help you get lean faster than you ever imagined. The Thin Ice vest is just the beginning of the Thin Ice lifestyle!

It really is tomorrow's technology today…

We've left no stone unturned to make absolutely certain your new Thin Ice System addresses every possible avenue to help you burn calories effortlessly that you could possibly wish for.

Bottom Line:

“It offers you big, substantial, definite value for money – something you will be ‘thrilled to bits’ to own every single time you even think about it. Don't miss your limited chance to join the party early and get a substantial discount in the process…”

Choose your size of the vest:

 

Partners:

 UDT: http://udtech.ca/

RTG: http://www.rtgmarketinggroup.com/

ThatGuy: http://www.thatguyproductions.ca/

Greenroom: https://grnrm.com/
story_txt:
THIN ICE: The Most Exciting and Truly Satisfying Thing You’ll Buy All Year Has Just Arrived…
Once or twice in a generation a truly amazing event takes place.

A technological breakthrough takes place that is so different, profound, innovative and truly user-friendly, it is destined to impact literally BILLIONS of lives worldwide.
We’re biased. But with very good reason.
Because we know beyond any shadow of doubt, that the moment you try it, you’ll feel 100% convinced that Thin Ice – the world’s first ‘wearable’ weight loss clothing line, is such a breakthrough.





It has been described as being ‘Like something from a science fiction movie from the 22nd Century’ 
But in this case, while the technology definitely deserves the title ‘space-age’ it is 100% real. And it is available for you to start enjoying today!
This is the Thin Ice Vest 1.0 that had been already developed with your help. Now we have a prototype of Thin Ice Vest 2.0 that is thinner with longer battery life and controlled by an application. 
Thin Ice Vest 1.0:





 Thin Ice Vest 2.0:





You can use the Thin Ice Vest 2.0 anywhere, anytime doing you day-by day stuff including work, sleep, watch TV...





How It Works:
It works 100% exactly like in the video you just watched. 
You simply wear your new Thin Ice Vest and it immediately starts to work - helping you to burn fat and lose weight. Burning an estimated 500 to 1,000 calories a day based on controlled-scientific studies that feature similar features and durations to the recommended use of Thin Ice. 





Thin Ice is controlled by the super-easy-to-use app . The technology strategically cools parts of the body with high concentrations of thermoreceptors which stimulate the brown adipose tissue (BAT) pathway.
This miraculous pathway burns white fat (bad fat) to produce heat, burning calories in the process!
More on the Battery
The battery will be located in the arch of the back and is being custom built to accommodate the shape of the average back. This is the best possible area to ensure most size accommodation while maintaining a sleek design under clothing. Here is a cartoon of where the battery is located:





The battery will be lithium ion and will snap into place on the back of the vest. The battery will be charged on a charging pad in between vest usages. The capacity of the battery is projected to be between 1-4 hours depending on the setting the vest is put on. I.e. lower temperatures sap more battery power than higher ones!
The battery is an important part of this revolutionary technology's ability to keep you cool and help you stimulate brown fat.
Brown Fat? Wait a Minute… Surely Fat Something I’m Trying to ‘Get Rid of’ Not Stimulate?
Actually the answer is “Yes!” and “No!”
Because you see, not all fat cells are created equal. 
In fact, there 2 major categorizations of fat cells with very different applications:





- White Fat, the ‘Couch Potatoes’ of the Body
White fat is what most of us know the most about and what we are trying to actively get rid of. White fat cells are designed to passively store fatty acids for use as energy in future activities. These cells expend very little energy to subsist, and thus have only few mitochondria which are the engines of the cell world. White fat cells are like the couch potatoes of the body. They sort of just ‘lounge around’ and wait for the body to request their fuel. 
The problem with that is that with our sedentary lives, our bodies don’t often need a surplus of fuel and the white fat cells can sit around for years – making YOU fatter and fatter and fatter in the process.





- Brown Fat
Brown fat, also known as brown adipose tissue, is a tissue you probably don’t know as much about as white fat, but you should! 
Brown fat cells are a much more active than their white cousins and have a very different function. Instead of passively storing fat, brown adipose tissue’s role in the body is to BURN fatty acids as a fuel source. 
In this case, the fat is burnt to create heat which helps to keep the body warm, protecting it from cooling down.
Here is a helpful chart that compares the different kinds of fat cells in our body:





Thin Ice technology might sound too good to be true but we are proud to say its creation has been based on science. The peer-reviewed literature on the ‘Brown adipose tissue pathway and its calorie burning properties’ has guided our every move throughout the entire project. 
If you want to look into some of the articles that inspired us and learn more about the fascinating science of the BAT pathway, please check out these articles and publications:





Brown Adipose Tissue in Humans:
http://www.nature.com/ijo/journal/v34/n1s/full/ijo2010183a.html
Supercharging Brown Fat to Battle Obesity:
http://www.scientificamerican.com/article/supercharging-brown-fat-to-battle-obesity/ 
Cold-Activated Brown Adipose Tissue in Health Men:
http://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa0808718
"Clothing to Help Freeze Off the Fat" - DailyRX



If you want more guidance through this exciting literature please email support@thiniceweightloss.com and we can suggest some further readings!
Amazing Real-World Examples of the miracle of BAT...
Besides the scientific articles on the subject matter there are also a tonne of anecdotal examples of the same temperature-related weight-loss effects at play. 
One of the most salient examples is that of Michael Phelps’ diet as he trained for the Beijing Olympics. During that time, he ate the 12,000 calories on a daily basis. See his diet pictured below:





FACT: Phelps was able to eat all of that (6 times more than the average person) while staying ripped. Only about half this calorie intake is explainable by his exercise regime and basal metabolic rate. The thousands of missing calories are accounted for by considering Phelps trained in a pool as opposed to land for 4 hours a day.
FACT: Water is 42 times more thermally conductive than air is. This means heat was leaving Phelps’ body much faster than it would have if he was on land leading to massive calorie burning to create heat to keep him warm.





This is the exact same process that is at play with Thin Ice products, albeit without the sogginess!
BAT also helps to explain why: People scaling Mt. Everest need to pound back sticks of butter not to die of starvation and why people living in climates with more pronounced seasons (including cold ones) tend to have a slightly easier time keeping off weight.
This weight-loss method has been hiding in plain sight throughout our struggles and failed weight-loss attempts. 
Don’t let it sneak away again! Contribute NOW and get your very own 2.0 Thin Ice Vest!





What Do I Get In My Thin Ice System?
Finally, a weight-loss solution that was invented with science in mind. But, you ask, what EXACTLY do I get when contribute for a Thin Ice system? Well, in short, you get an absolute bucket load of seriously amazing stuff!





But don’t take our word for it. Take an in depth look into each amazing part of the 2.0 Thin Ice System:
1) The 2.0 Thin Ice Vest: 
The 2.0 vest is a marvel of modern technology that functions using battery-powered Peltier-based cooling technology that effectively pumps heat out of the body, emulating the effects of ice.





 Your new Thin Ice Vest will have these amazing features:





2) The Thin Ice app for:





The Thin Ice app is the command center of your Thin Ice experience. 
This app will allow you to adjust the temperature of the device manually or set the temperature maintenance mechanism.
The app is also able to give you an ongoing estimate of how many calories you’ve burnt while wearing it, based on the temperature you’ve been using it at.
The app also features:






Unlockable achievements to keep you motivated and having FUN achieving your goals 
Other tracking tools to help optimize additional areas of your fitness regime 
 Intuitive design and smooth functionality

 3) The Thin Ice Lifestyle E-Book:





We here at Thin Ice are not one-trick-ponies. We have done done and we are doing tonnes or research to bring together an e-book that will help you hack your body in a slew of interesting ways you never thought possible. 
Did you know, you burn 600 calories when donating blood? 
Did you know chewing gum burns 11 calories an hour? 
We get at the science of many many body hacks and harness them to help you get lean faster than you ever imagined. The Thin Ice vest is just the beginning of the Thin Ice lifestyle!





It really is tomorrow's technology today…
We've left no stone unturned to make absolutely certain your new Thin Ice System addresses every possible avenue to help you burn calories effortlessly that you could possibly wish for.
Bottom Line:
“It offers you big, substantial, definite value for money – something you will be ‘thrilled to bits’ to own every single time you even think about it. Don't miss your limited chance to join the party early and get a substantial discount in the process…”
Choose your size of the vest:

RTG: http://www.rtgmarketinggroup.com/
ThatGuy: http://www.thatguyproductions.ca/

story:
Matching the toothbrush to your modern lifestyle and brushing needs with Convenient Subscription Heads, Smart Vibration Motors, Customizable Handles and a Hygeinic Travel Mount Cap




It’s an essential part of our daily routine that is overlooked by most. We invest more than ever in other health gadgets but teeth are ignored, yet damage to teeth is irreversible

No single brush type, regardless of cost, is best. Dentists simply advise to choose what you feel most comfortable with, that encourages you to brush well, regularly & correctly 

A modular brush providing a premium experience to all, allowing you to simply & easily adapt its ergonomics, aesthetics, functionality & performance to match your needs & cherish for life

Create your own brush, from minimal and manual to flashy and electric

  • CUSTOMIZE-ABLE HANDLE - aesthetic and ergonomic customization
  • UPGRADE-ABLE VIBRATION MOTOR - drop in a vibration module to make it electric
  • RENEWABLE SUBSCRIPTION HEADS - Replacement head mailed every 3 months
  • VERSATILE CAP - protect bristles while mounted to wall or in bag

Its the start of a platform that can revolutionize the industry. New Ergonomic handles, Smart Vibration Modules & Performance head attachments can keep this brush adapting for years

Researching with dentists and partnering with a leading brush manufacturer, we bring the same Soft Dupont bristles, Tongue Cleaner & Electric motor used by leading brands

The basic brush starts at just $19, an electric upgrade adds $20 and head subscription only $4/ cycle, easily competing with manual brush costs and far cheaper than electrics

Only available here, at campaign end we start production. After honing manufacturing & logistics we ship the brush to you, free of charge, summer 2014 (September at latest)

To raise funds needed for mass production and learn what our consumers want Instead of losing our vision to investors, you are the investors & get a brush as a thank you!

byDEFAULT, a new design brand based in New York, headed by Simon Enever and partnered with other leading Designers, Engineers & Researchers around the world

For a product so important to our health, that we use twice a day our entire lives, its amazing how little attention we pay to the act of brushing our teeth and the products we buy to do so. Cheap, gimmicky manual brushes and overpriced, overweight electric ones are ubiquitous, whatever the brand and we seem to accept that. But people are starting to care more about the wellness products they buy and we wanted to be the first in the industry to cater to that desire for well designed, intelligent & forward thinking products

The only consistent thing that dentists agree on is that everyone has different brushing needs and no one brush is best for all, regardless of cost or feature set. Tests have proven that even the most high performance brushes can only increase effectiveness by 7% at most, and can actually be damaging to most if not used correctly. Above all, dentists simply advise to choose a brush that you feel most comfortable with, that will encourage you to brush well, regularly and correctly and that is the core of our thinking 

A beautifully crafted brush that has had the same attention to detail as our other, less important, everyday objects. Providing an entry point to all budgets, but the same premium brushing experience to all and designed to be kept and adapted for life using a modular construction that allows users to easily adapt its ergonomics, aesthetics, functionality & performance to match their unique needs and keep up with technology

  1. CUSTOMIZEABLE HANDLES - personalized ergonomics and aesthetic
  2. UPGRADEABLE VIBRATION MODULE - manual or electric functionality
  3. RENEWABLE SUBSCRIPTION HEADS - convenient performance
  4. VERSATILE TRAVEL CAP - Hygiene and convenience


Create or choose your own brush to match your unique Aesthetic, Ergonomic and Functional brushing needs. From a minimal and manual brush to a flashy electric one

Every buyer will receive theDEFAULT brush fully assembled and you can quickly and easily swap in custom handles using the penny slot screw on the base of the brush 

"theDEFAULT" - NO MORE FUSS

Tacky colors, gimmicky features and clunky construction are replaced with premium design and engineering, "theDEFAULT" matte white plastic toothbrush has a beautifully minimal aesthetic and an attention to detail not seen before on a toothbrush

"byDEFAULT" - PREMIUM LIFESTYLE

To bring the brush level with our other premium lifestyle products, we created the  "byDEFAULT" range of premium handles. Starting with Aluminum and Wood designs, this collection provides consumers with materials and finishes to match their modern lifestyle.

"myDEFAULT" - TOTALLY UNIQUE

By partnering with designers and listening to users we are also building a growing catalog of printed plastic handles in our "myDEFAULT" collection. You can choose from numerous colors and unlimited forms, patterns textures and features to match your stylistic, ergonomic or functional needs.


Vibrating brushes have grown in popularity but current solutions are bulky and wasteful. By dropping an AAA battery and our vibration module into the handle of your manual DEFAULT brush & tapping the touch sensitive logo, it will transform into an electric one without compromising on size or style. 

Remembering to replace your toothbrush is not easy so we are offering a subscription service that will send you a replacement head at dentist recommended 3 month intervals as a reminder. At only $16 / year ( 4 brush heads), incl. shipping, the cost is well below competitors and on a par with replacing a cheap manual brush every 3 months. The snap on head, containing Soft Nylon bristles and rubber tongue massager, makes replacement quick and easy while reducing toothbrush landfill by up to 80%. 


Our bundled cap accessory uses an integrated strip of micro suction film to allow mounting of the brush to any smooth surface without residue, providing a convenient, germ free stand when not in use and sealing the brush during travel, keeping the bristles and your bag protected when you to take your brush to work or on vacation

This is the start of a platform that can revolutionize a tired industry. New Ergonomic handle designs, Smart, Connected, Vibration Modules & Unique Performance head attachments can keep this brush adapting for years to comeWhile carrying out research with dentists and being partnered with a certified toothbrush manufacturer from the early stages of the project, we are not creating a brush that tries to make rash claims about brushing performance. Instead, what we want to do is make people enjoy interacting with their brush for the first time ever, potentially encouraging them to brush for a little longer, with a little more care and maybe even more often and in different locations. Then, further down the line with people bought into our idea, thanks to our modular design, we will partner with different oral health foundations and dentists to bring more advanced Vibration Modules and replaceable heads and accessories to more drastically increase brushing performance.

With theDEFAULT brush, including cap accessory at just $19, an electric upgrade adding only $20 more and head subscription only $4/ cycle, this brush easily competes with less functional manual brush costs and is far cheaper than 99% of electrics who charge heads at $5-$15 each

Pre-ordering a brush is as easy as clicking on a pledge level on the right hand side of this page. but to help you better understand what each Perk means we have put together this quick list to differentiate the three main types...

"theDEFAULT"---Matte white plastic


"myDEFAULT"-----3D Printed Plastic

Browse our custom design Catalog here, Choose a favorite (ignore "SOLD OUT" sign), Purchase the "myDEFAULT"  perk on this page, tell us your choice at the end of the campaign

"byDEFAULT"-----Aluminum & Wood

Browse our premium design Catalog here, Choose a favorite (ignore "SOLD OUT" sign) from SILVER, MINT, RED or BLACK Aluminum, or CHESTNUT (light) or ROSEWOOD (Dark) Wood (made in Brooklyn), Purchase the "byDEFAULT" perk on this page, tell us your choice at the end of the campaign


WHAT IS INDIEGOGO?

Indiegogo is a crowd funding platform that allows us to use pre-orders to finance the first stage of mass manufacture. Instead of losing our vision to outside investors, you guys are the investors and get a brush of your choice, before anyone else, in the process!

WHAT WE HAVE DONE SO FAR

We have consulted with dentists and worked closely with fellow designers, engineering partners and our toothbrush manufacturer to research, develop and test every detail of these patent pending brushes to ensure production readiness and adherence to standards.

WHERE WE ARE NOW

All prototypes in the video have been produced at the factory of our toothbrush manufacturing partner to ensure we are showcasing a production ready product. Our wooden handles are hand crafted in a Brooklyn wood shop by an independent worker.

WHAT IS NEXT

Ensuring an exquisite fit and finish is our biggest challenge. The factories are ready to go, but we at byDEFAULT have exacting standards and anticipate spending some time honing the feel and the user experience of both the physical parts and the vibration motor module. 

byDEFAULT is an exciting new design brand founded by a team of New York based Industrial designers who collaborate on and create beautiful but intelligent everyday products. Head founder Simon Enever , www.simonenever.com, is a British born, New York based industrial designer with years of experience in consumer product and consumer electronics design at several consultancies in Europe and the US, most recently, Fuseproject (NY) and now Lead designer at ECCO design.

WHAT IS "theDEFAULT", "myDEFAULT" AND "byDEFAULT"?  

"theDEFAULT" is the basic white plastic brush package including handle, head and Cap "myDEFAULT" includes “theDEFAULT” and your choice of unique 3D printed handle “byDEFAULT" includes "theDEFAULT" and your choice of premium handle (Metal or wood)

HOW DO I ORDER? 

Read the "WHEN AND HOW DO I GET IT" to decide on a brush package then click the appropriate big grey button on the right hand side to select that option. Then you simply type in your amount, enter your payment and shipping details and you’re done!

WHEN DO I CHOOSE MY COLOR!? 

At the end of the campaign, a survey will be sent around that will ask your preferred color/ material/ finish / chosen design depending on which perk you selected

WHAT TYPE OF BRISTLES ARE YOU USING?

We are planning on supplying ALL brush heads asSOFT, rounded tip, Dupont Nylon bristles as recommended by dentists. If you have a particular need for medium or hard bristles please be in touch or leave a comment and we will assess the demand.

HOW DOES THE BRUSH HEAD PERFORM?

We use the same bristle design, tongue cleaner and vibration motor as the majority of modern brushes and performance will match. We are partnering with oral health experts to bring more "performance" head variants and smarter motors to the platform down the line

WHEN WILL IT COME? 

We are likely to ship in the Summer 2014 and have given a VERY conservative “latest” ship date of September 2014.

ARE YOU ENDORSED BY ANY DENTISTS? 

We carried out extensive research with dentists and we have been partnered with a certified toothbrush manufacture who supplies many large US chains. Dentists are extremely excited by this product and we are looking to announce official endorsements imminently

CAN I BUY THESE ANYWHERE ELSE? IN STORE? 

No, this campaign is the ONLY way to guarantee you can get a toothbrush at launch. we will open up our own online story at www.bydefault.co soon after the campaign ends to accept more pre-orders and allow orders for additional handles

WHAT HAPPENS IF YOU DON'T REACH $60,000? 

if the total is extremely low you will get your money back, however, if we get a little nearer to our target we will still be able to produce the brushes as per your order as we really believe in this product.
