story:
The Heart of YoniFlower

Welcome to YoniFlower apparel, at the heart of the soon-to-launch Church of Wild Collections store and community.

Built on beauty, love, audacious acceptance, and confident celebration. Born midlife in the midst of a global pandemic. Where a simple pair of flowered leggings declares ownership and love of our Selves and all our parts.

So what's a "Yoni"? There are all sorts of terms for the space between a womxn's legs, from the scientific to the raunchy to the artistic. The Hindus call it a "yoni."

Life-giving, a gateway, divine procreative energy, a sacred space, home, the source...a refuge and a catalyst. What better way to describe the impact of womxn in our world?

Yes, "womxn."

Did you know that "wimmin," the first gender designation without "man" in it, was popularized in the 1900s? We use "womxn" because we fully agree and wholeheartedly support how "‘womxn’...stress[es] the concept that womxn are their own separate individuals, capable, operational on their own, and without a man to help them. [It] is seen as intersectional, to incorporate transgender womxn, womxn of color, womxn from Third World countries, and each different self distinguishing womxn out there." (from this Medium article)

Inclusive. Nurturing. Empowering. Strong. We believe "womxn" points the way.

 

A Note from Our Founder and Designer

Hi! My name is Jene' Jackson. I'm an author, speaker, and long-time passionate amateur photographer and now, designer! I see the world in terms of light and shadow...drama. And I love seeing how people express themselves through clothing. Though I don't play well with sewing machines, I still have a portfolio full of designs sketched in high school in a box somewhere.

When I lost my job due to COVID-19, as many of us did, I decided it was time to unite my passions to design products that express confidence in womxnhood and beauty, using my photography as the raw material. I've been dreaming and planning a store to share with the world for years, working on the YoniFlower concept for over a year, and now, I'm building it for real.

I'm a creative. I have more books to write, more thoughts to share, more stories to tell. Those will come. But with YoniFlower and the Church of Wild Collections store, I hope to make our world a brighter, lovelier, cheekier place, to galvanize and encourage confidence in womxn's lives, to more fully support our community, and to rile up a lot of fun!

 

What Your Backing Means & What You Get

The goal for this first YoniFlower launch is $10,000. We see that number in terms of impact. $10K equals a little over 130 pairs of YoniFlower leggings running around out in our world, proclaiming strength, sass, and confidence in womxnhood!

Raised funds will go towards producing your perks, design tools, creating long-term marketing with respected systems, and building out YoniFlowers' home, the Church of Wild Collections online store. Getting each design just right takes much longer than you might imagine; they're not just slapped on. If this campaign doesn't meet the goal, every penny raised will still help strengthen the store and scale up faster.

You will be our first round of customers! Your experience with YoniFlower leggings matters and will inform next steps.

This flagship collection is only the beginning. You can look forward to new YoniFlower designs when the Church of Wild Collections store launches, as well as matching sports bras, masks, and sweatpants, botanical prints that are a little less in-your-face but just as striking, and designs using Jene's photography of plants, abstract/urban, and patterns, and more. We can't wait to release collection after collection based on seasons, themes, always with new photos and fascinating vistas!

 

Giving Back

We are thrilled to support our local community with the YoniFlower line. 10% of what the campaign makes and of the YoniFlower line, when the online store opens, will be donated to organizations and endeavors that support womxn of color and promote safety and life.

 

What are "Meggings" and Why Do We Offer Them?

We believe even men have at least a bit of the yoni in their nature. The Church of Wild Collections store will eventually offer an entire men's line, but we know men who will want to celebrate their yoni-ness and show solidarity with womxn by wearing YoniFlower "meggings."

(The image below shows how they'll look in all the different flower designs. More images to come soon.)

 

Challenges

DESIGN: We are already working with our production teams to make sure what you see in the product mockups is what ends up in your hands. For example, as the sizes increase, more of the printed material is sewn together in the yoni area. You wouldn't want a YoniFlower with two flower centers "right there." So we're working to mitigate that through trial and error and ordering samples, then more design.

COVID-19: Our production partners have been practicing vigilant protection measures at their factories, hiring and ramping up operations to meet increased demand, and are doing all they can to prevent delivery delays. We will let you know immediately if there is any change in expected delivery times.

From Jene': At the beginning of the 2020 pandemic, in March, I was preparing to launch...wait for it...a travel retreat company. TRAVEL. As the world shut down and we all found new ways to work and be in community, I had to shift.

YoniFlower is my shift. And though I could shift again, the words "grit," "hustle," and "determination" come to mind. I'm not going to stop making this audacious YoniFlower vision real, as long as one person wants these, I will make them.

 

You Can Help in Many Ways

If funds are tight right now, we hear you, so dang much. Take advantage of the Early Bird perks, find a way to save up for your favorites, and stay tuned for occasional flash sales when the store opens. The everyday self care of what we wear is worth it when it brings a smile and sass, in the YoniFlower spirit. We honor you.

For now, you can help by getting the word out and making some noise about this campaign and the spirit of YoniFlower. Share, share, share!

Check out all the content here, the embedded links, all the ways Indiegogo allows you share, and LET'S DO THIS! :)

 

The Flagship YoniFlower Leggings Collection - Your Design Choices

Choose a Bloom or build a Bouquet, plant your YoniFlower garden today! Whichever style you choose--flat waist, yoga waist, plus size, or meggings--you get to choose from this first collection of designs. We are designing, consulting with our production team, and ordering samples to make sure each style looks as close as possible to what you see above. Size charts are below.

 

 

360 Degree View Videos!

 
 
 
 

 

 

 

Quality leggings...from design to your hands

Smooth, Soft, Stretchy, Supportive, Durable...you can trust in their quality and loveliness. They feel so good.

 

 

Stay Tuned Here for In-Person Videos to Show Samples

Our first two sample pairs, in the wild!

 

Size Charts for YoniFlower Leggings Styles

From Jene': At the beginning of the 2020 pandemic, in March, I was preparing to launch...wait for it...a travel retreat company. TRAVEL. As the world shut down and we all found new ways to work and be in community, I had to shift.
YoniFlower is my shift. And though I could shift again, the words "grit," "hustle," and "determination" come to mind. I'm not going to stop making this audacious YoniFlower vision real, as long as one person wants these, I will make them.
 

You Can Help in Many Ways
If funds are tight right now, we hear you, so dang much. Take advantage of the Early Bird perks, find a way to save up for your favorites, and stay tuned for occasional flash sales when the store opens. The everyday self care of what we wear is worth it when it brings a smile and sass, in the YoniFlower spirit. We honor you.
For now, you can help by getting the word out and making some noise about this campaign and the spirit of YoniFlower. Share, share, share!
Check out all the content here, the embedded links, all the ways Indiegogo allows you share, and LET'S DO THIS! :)
 
The Flagship YoniFlower Leggings Collection - Your Design Choices

Choose a Bloom or build a Bouquet, plant your YoniFlower garden today! Whichever style you choose--flat waist, yoga waist, plus size, or meggings--you get to choose from this first collection of designs. We are designing, consulting with our production team, and ordering samples to make sure each style looks as close as possible to what you see above. Size charts are below.
 

 
360 Degree View Videos!


 

 

 

 


 

 

 


Quality leggings...from design to your hands
Smooth, Soft, Stretchy, Supportive, Durable...you can trust in their quality and loveliness. They feel so good.

 
 
Stay Tuned Here for In-Person Videos to Show Samples
Our first two sample pairs, in the wild!

 
Size Charts for YoniFlower Leggings Styles

story:
You may wonder, different from other campaigns, our Facebook group comes first. It is because we could create many innovative applications of meditation with EEG technology, such as providing biofeedback and health monitoring, and current functions of Flowtime is just a beginning. We warmly welcome you to join our Facebook Group Flowtime Meditation Angel User Community, to discuss your dream features of Flowtime with our founders, product managers and engineers. Maybe the next function is defined by YOU!

Meditation helps us relax. When we meditate, we can let go of our thoughts and emotions, and let our bodies and minds heal. In today’s fast-paced modern society, we want to experience all of the science-based benefits of meditation for our mental health and physical wellbeing. However, meditation and mindfulness are hard for most people to get into. And, sometimes, we have to do a lot of meditating to get real results. 

 When we do exercise, we have fitness trackers to monitor the body, the heart rate and calories, etc. But have you desired to know how your brain and body react to meditation? Any device could do that as well? 

 Luckily, Flowtime is here to help!

 

The most thrilling thing is the two-channel EEG acquisition technology monitors brainwaves in real time and distinguish brainwave energy from left to right-hemisphere, while the heart-rate sensor also tracks your heart constantly. It’s amazing to see how your body and brain are changing when meditating.

 The real-time data matters when you are doing meditation, while rich data report after practice is also crucial to the measurement of your practice every time and insights of your progress. The sensors passively sense your brain and heart activities and the app translates them into visualized graphs of your body performance. You would be eager to see how well you perform after you practice.

For the beginners, meditation lessons are decisive while it’s hard to find the professional ones. In order to provide qualified content that is indeed helpful, we investigated and compared content from many companies, and finally cooperate with Mobio Interactive, an outstanding and rigorous Canadian company experienced in mindfulness. The lessons they offer have been scientifically validated to improve stress resilience in a random controlled trial completed in collaboration with Mobio Interactive and the University of Toronto.

To meditate is to feel free, which guides us in appearance design. Our excellent design partner Piero got the inspirations from hummingbird. The ultra-slim design makes the headband imperceptible and incredibly light, only 25g, while the rubber band on the back keeps it in perfect position, especially suitable for running meditation and yoga meditation. Ergonomics studies have been made to include a wide range of users: the elastic rubber band in two sizes are flexible to adapt to different head circumference.

Meditation is not just a spiritual experience. Science can explain what meditation does to your brain. Brain waves , which are electromagnetic energy, reflect what’s happening in your brain.

Flowtime is an innovative way to understand what is going on in your head as you practice and make the insensible change inside the brain visualized in the app. Whether you practice on your own or guided by a mentor, the data helps to find out whether you are focusing on meditation or distracted.

Many people think meditation is difficult to learn because they cannot get deep enough to impact their subconscious. People often cannot get into it in a way that truly makes a difference. But Flowtime will tell you it does make differences!

Meditation practitioners generally experience a lower heart rate and blood pressure. Some individuals experience a decline at rest of 7-15 beats per minute. Heart rate variability (HRV) is another key indication of especially your nervous system, stress and recovery activity, but also overall health as well as general fitness. 

Scientific studies have shown that meditation transforms the way brain acts to stress and other passive emotions. That is why two-channel EEG sensors are necessary to make Flowtime be able to distinguish brainwave energy from left to right. You’ll know from the graph how meditation helps you with the positive emotion which is primarily processed by the left hemisphere and negative the right.

 The more you practice, the more you realize the gap between you and experienced meditators becomes smaller and know better where you are going.

Long-term meditation is a tool that helps our brains evolve and develop more compassion towards ourselves as well as others. Neurofeedback is what makes Flowtime truly different from anything you have tried before.

The science behind meditation seeks to understand the brain wave activities that can be measured using an electroencephalograph (EEG). There are five major categories of brain waves, each corresponding to different activities: 

R&D

Circuit Board Position

 In order to create a comfortable wear and appearance, our hardware engineers put a lot of effort into including all the circuitry into a 16*35mm space. With continuous optimization, the power consumption has been reduced greatly, with the operating electric current as low as 5mA and the standby electric current at only 2uA. A one-time charge can last for more than 10 hours. The acquisition accuracy of EEG sensors has reached 3uV (microvolts).

Design Draft

Table-Type Elastic Electrodes

Our hardware engineers also created an innovative device structure. For example, a unique tablet-type elastic electrode is designed to be only 7mm thick. This not only ensures good electrode contact, but also provides a comfortable fit. The electrode is made of medical-grade silver chloride, which prevents allergies and makes the signal more accurate.

We are the Entertech team, engaged in brain science study for years and are leading the world in technologies like consumer-grade EEG acquisition algorithms that can play an active role in assisting people who meditate. 

Therefore, to help more people benefit from meditation and meditate correctly and efficiently, we came up with the idea of Flowtime, a device that can monitor brain waves, heart rate and heart rate variability during meditation and generate detailed reports. The word “flow” can be defined as an “optimal state of consciousness where we feel our best and perform at our best.” Flow refers to those “in the zone” moments where focus gets so intense that everything else disappears. Therefore, Flowtime is the best description of entering the meditative state.

With precise data and guidance from well-designed courses by Mobio Interactive Inc., users will learn meditation more efficiently and effectively than ever before, as well as learn more about their own levels of meditation so that they can closely monitor their practice. We hope Flowtime will become the best companion for meditation and help our customers enjoy a healthier life.

CEO Yi Interviewed by BBC in 2018

The partnership between Entertech and SingularityNET

We are so excited to announce that Entertech will form a partnership with  SingularityNETto create AI-powered neurotech for the consumer and the enterprise markets!

SingularityNET is a full-stack AI solution powered by a decentralized protocol. Lead by Dr. Ben Goertzel, the team includes seasoned engineers, scientists, researchers, entrepreneurs, and marketers.

In the newly established collaboration, SingularityNET’s AI research division, which includes a team with medical background along with a large number of AI experts, will apply novel AI tools to extract general-purpose patterns from the extensive EEG data that Entertech has gathered. This is expected to yield new insights regarding the dynamics of emotion, arousal and consciousness, and the relationship between the body (e.g., heart rate) and mind. The results of this AI analysis will be used to create more effective neurotech solutions for the enterprise, as well as to optimize the functionality of Entertech’s consumer products.

 

Risks & Challenges

Entertech has researched and developed EEG acquisition technology for the last four years and cooperated with many well-known Chinese university laboratories, science museums, and hospitals ever since the team was set up. The Forehead Two-Channel EEG acquisition with Heart-Rate Sensor Program is our new development proposed on the basis of our previous product Luuna which was launched in April, 2017 and has been delivered to our backers successfully, which means we have mater EEG acquisition and application technology which will be applied not only for sleep track but also meditation. The fulfilment and effectiveness of this new program highly boost our confidence in Flowtime.

Designs and working prototypes have been developed. We are going to do small-batch production soon. Based on our experience of production and distribution worldwide with our last two crowdfunding campaign, we are confident that we will be able to produce the final product with exceptional quality and to also complete it on time.

story:
Hello, I'm Sailor! During the peak of the Naruto fandom years back, I was quite into NaruSasu and practically gobbled up any content I could get my hands on. I wasn't all that confident with my art then though and never contributed content myself. Now that I've returned to the fandom and have gotten a lot better and more confident in my skills as an artist, it's high time to finally churn out some NaruSasus that fellow shippers could enjoy!

For more NaruSasu content from me, feel free to check out my social media where I post drawing on a regular basis!

Twitter: @sailor_suits | Tumblr: hellosailorsuits

 

The Nitty Gritty

 

FUNDING GOAL: $500

So where will the funding be used? The money raised will be used to pay for the production of the pins, printing of the mini-prints that come with some tiers, and printing of the backing cards. When the funding is reached, feel free to still back the project! There are stretch goals that can be unlocked containing goodies like stickers and acrylic charms.

Since Indiegogo projects can't be backed through paypal, I'll also open paypal orders in my online shop for a limited time when the project reaches the minimum funding goal ($500). During that period, customers can avail of the perks below for the same price as Indiegogo backers. The period for paypal purchases will last two weeks, the same amount of time this Indiegogo campaign will run.

 

THE DESIGN AND SPECS

  • Pin Type: Hard Enamel, silver-colored plating, silver chain
  • Size: Each pin is 1.5 Inches wide
  • Chain: Detachable, 13cm long

 

PRINT DESIGN

For Reward Tiers beyond Shallow Waters (see Rewards), backers will receive mini-prints of a Diver-inspired artwork I made on top of the Diver enamel pin set. The design can be seen below:

 

Rewards

 

Stretch Goals

 

Risks & Challenges

I've worked with my pin supplier before, and while I do trust them, I can't 100% guarantee that there won't be any delays in production. Also, the design is still in its concept stage, so I can't guarantee that there won't be any changes. Adjustments like outline width may have to be made to accommodate the physical restrictions of the pin's materials. There's also a possibility that some colors may be swapped to the nearest available PANTONE color in case the manufacturer doesn't have the ones listed above. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to back the project but would like to support it regardless, feel free to check out my twitter and share my posts about it. You'll have my eternal gratitude for doing so!

story:
Some Background....

PROSERIES® Athletic Equipment Company, founded in 1999 and based in Southern California, is a Made in The USA manufacturer of top quality cold therapy ice wrap products. PROSERIES® original ice wraps have received a tremendous following from leading orthopedic physicians, physical therapy clinics and professional athletes.

We have spent years perfecting our cold therapy compression wraps to fit perfectly on all areas of the body that are commonly injured. The ProSeries wraps are custom made to control pain and inflammation in the ankle, shin, calf, knee, thigh, hip, back, and shoulder. Regardless of your level of performance, from amateur athlete to high level professional, we have an ice pack and wrap to help you function at your best.

The Next Step...

After years of providing our ice wraps and bags to the masses with recognizable success, we're now faced with the challenge of what comes next for ProSeries. What new product can we design and how to bring it to market?  We wanted to come up with something simple but effective that would continue to expand the ProSeries brand as well as doing what we've always set out to do....

Simply help our customers feel better.

This time around, we've focused our efforts on the little ones!

The Solution.

KoolPal is a line of ice bags made specifically for kids!  These bags have fun designs that your kids will respond to.  Parents also don't need to worry because these bags are completely PVC Free with a non toxic lining.  They also have a patent pending integrated gasket built right into the cap making them not only leak proof, but also child safe!

These bags will be something your kids can call their own.  It's amazing the results we get with a slightly different delivery.

Science!!!

As we said before, our ice bags use real-ice.  Simply fill the bags with ice and a little water.  No gels or chemicals are used.  Here's a chart showing some comparisons of KoolPal to some popular gels.  The choice is clear!

These gels just simply go on way too cold, and get warm way too fast!

Whether you have a boy, girl, or both, there's a KoolPal design available to keep them all happy!

Finally, the Selection of KoolPal Ice Bags!!

This is the starting lineup for KoolPal.  Should things really explode, we will add some new styles as a stretch goal.  Let's get there!!

Top Row from L to R - Hearts, Smiley Faces, Multi-Sport
Middle Row from L to R - Penguins, Ducks
Bottom Row from L to R - Football, Camo, Kittens

Now, here's the backbone of the ProSeries brand.  There's a wrap to fit most every joint and those sore spots that aren't easy to treat.  Please visit our website at www.proseriesusa.com to reference the whole product line and pick exactly what you and your loved ones might need.

Risks and challenges

Given that we've been in this industry for some time and already have good relationships built with our material suppliers, our project should be able to be executed with minimal delays.

There is always of course Murphy's Law to consider, but we're very comfortable that we can meet our shipment deadlines for your incentives!

Help Make Koolpal a Reality!

Thank you so much for taking the time to review our new product and campaign, This project is close to our hearts, but to make this come to fruition we do need your help.  Please find a perk that works well for you and your loved ones.  If you can't contribute we more than understand, but we'd still love your help in getting our campaign into more people's hands. So no matter what you can do, please come take this journey with us and help us spread the word!

Thank you for all your support!

story:
Since our birth from a successful Crowdfunding campaign in 2016 and with the amazing support from our initial 1,500 backers, we have spent countless hours learning, innovating and mastering our craft.

The result?  We’re extremely excited to introduce our newest collection, Flyte Socks X.  We believe not only are these socks the best bamboo socks on the market, they’re the best damn socks period. 

 

 

Ben McKenzie (@mrbenmckenzie) - Lead Role in Gotham, Award-winning TV show

Drew Carey (@drewfromtv) - Comedian and host of The Price is Right

Tait Fletcher (@taitfletcher) - Actor, Founder of Caveman Coffee & Host of Pirate Life Radio


Rafael Bello (@rafaelbellotv) - TV personality, two-time Emmy® award winner & two time  marathon finisher 


Pablo Schreiber (@officialpabloschreiber) - Actor, Primetime Emmy Award Nominee

story:
THE MOST FUNDED FASHION ACCESSORY IN HISTORY, TWICE OVER WITH THE BEST TRACK RECORD POSSIBLE! WE'RE BACK! 

 

 

  We are Harmattan Design (Holt Evans & Radu Zarnescu), Kickstarter veterans and Enthusiastic Creators. Last year, our fifth campaign The Smart Belt 2.0 became the most funded fashion accessory in history surpassing our own record from a year before (2017) when we introduced The Smart Belt.

We sent out all the pledges and wanted to know what our backers had to say. To our delight, 96% of our backers where happy with The Smart Belt and manny thousands wanted more.

We picked the most popular demands and integrated them into The Smart Belt 3.0. TAKE A LOOK! 

 

 

 What we believe is that there is no one thing that made our SMART BELT 2.0 such a huge success, but the combination of all our innovations bundled into a nice and elegant, finely tuned package with all our 4 INNOVATIONS made even better.

 

 

  Firstly, replacing the 5 hole system with 32 adjustments brings a world of comfort and a whole new dimension of adjustability. Not many people think about it or realize it but, our waist changes as we go about our business throughout the day. A classic belt does not adjust correctly because holes are too far apart. 

  Forget feeling tight or loose, you'll forget you have a belt on but your pants will stay exactly where they're supposed to.

 

 
      

 Our Kevlar® Core built with Kevlar® fibres is our staple innovation. Belts wear out because the leather flexes longitudinally and loses structure. Our Kevlar® Core prevents that from happening by reinforcing the whole structure like nothing else. It makes the whole thing highly durable yet light and comfortable.  We are the only licensee authorized by DuPont to make belts using the Kevlar® brand.

DuPont™ and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company used under license by Harmattan Design LLC  (Project Creators).

 

 

  The Leather we use is the most exclusive leather anywhere in the world. Vegetable Tanning is almost a lost art. Because it takes longer to tan the leather with natural tannins it has been replaced by chromium tanning at the turn of the century. We get our leather from a small valley in Tuscany, Italy, one of the hand-full of places in the world where this is still done. It's much more resilient that normal leather, it's all natural, eco friendly and really smells good too. It will come with a certificate of authenticity and a serial number. 

 

 

 Have you ever had a problem with a wrong size or buying a present for someone, ever been in between sizes? Not our Smart Belt 3.0. You will get to make your own size, so no chance of getting it wrong. Please remember that our belt will cover a max. waist size of 115 cm / 45".  

 

 

For this year's Smart Belt 3.0 we have introduced a new type of leather finish that we call CROC. We have also kept all buckle types from last year. Have a look below.

 

 

   We have a total of 36 possible combinations, you can get any. 

IF YOU WANT TO SEE ALL BUCKLE / STRAP COMBINATIONS IN HIGH RES CLICK HERE

 

          Here's our secret to starting to ship in October, we're already making the straps and we have the buckles already.

We are now shipping Kickstarter orders and Indie will follow.

On the experience of a Super Project last year, The Smart Belt 2.0 with 20.000 backers the one before that with 15.000 happy backers we know what it takes to get this done right . We are manufacturing beforehand and using a bit of stock as a buffer for any hurdle we might encounter. We will start shipping in August and fulfil in order of backer number at a rate of about 5000 backers per month with a better courier service this time.

 

  SATISFACTION SURVEY TO 36.000 BACKERS !

           We send out a satisfaction survey each year, to our knowledge we are the only Kickstarter Project to do so. We do it because we want to know if where doing right by our backers or not. Our result speak for themselves,  the numbers below are from last year's Smart Belt 2.0.

 

 

     VIDEO REVIEWS FROM BACKERS

 

 

Smart Belt 2.0 - Some of our backers even sent us videos!

Check them out here:

 

Smart Belt 1.0 - And these backers are from 2017.

Check them out here:

BACKER'S COMMENTS

  Here's what our backers are saying about how we did last year with a similar campaign:

  You can find all these guys and gals by looking at our previous projects Smart Belt 1.0 & 2.0

Kickstarter, Backer #10833,  comment:

“Got my belt and love it! Thanks for all the work! Btw very easy to open, no idea why people have problems with it.”

Kickstarter, Backer #14849,  comment:

“I got my belts a few months ago and they are great.”

Kickstarter, Backer #12037,  comment:

“Hi, I received my belt and love it, thank you......now I want another in a different colour......thank you.”

Kickstarter, Backer #8406,  comment:

“I have finally received my belts. They're just as I expected. Thank you very much for the belts and for the assistance!”

Kickstarter, Backer #15167,  comment:

“Hey there, I received my belts today and was not disappointed. I am glad to have help make the Smart Belt 2.0 a success story. Thank you again for everything.”

Kickstarter, Backer #14599,  comment:

“Got my Two belt. Very good quality and design. Thanks.”

Kickstarter, Backer #10940,  comment:

“Very happy about the belts, love the look and feel. Awesome!”

Kickstarter, Backer # 15008,  comment:

“Amazing v 2.0 with subtle changes and I like the new buckle. Good job dear creators.”

Kickstarter, Backer #1918,  comment:

“Just a quick note to thank you for another amazing belt. The improvements on V1 are small but welcome. Great work guys.”

Kickstarter, Backer #9574,  comment:

“I received it yesterday and it is all I hoped and dreamed it would be! Disappointed that I didn't order more as Christmas gifts for my family.”

Kickstarter, Backer #14717, F comment:

“Got mine today, surprisingly simple to set up correctly and in use immediately. Thanks and big cheers to the creators!”

Kickstarter, Backer #14169,  comment:

“Wow! Great belt, I ordered a black and a brown but only ordered one belt buckle, I would like to order another belt buckle, how do I go about doing that?”

Kickstarter, Backer #12436,  comment:

“Just received my belts and they look great! Awesome job!”

Kickstarter, Backer #13101,  comment:

“Great work guys, excellent product of the highest quality. Looking forward to what's coming up next year from you folks.”

Kickstarter, Backer #11766,  comment:

“Have received my belt, and i must say i am very pleased, top quality and the belt buckle is just beautiful.”

Kickstarter, Backer #11017,  comment:

“My husband and I ordered 6 belts-3 each. We are really thrilled with the belts. The leather colours are beautiful. We especially love the cognac and blue leather. We find the belts are easy to use. We appreciated how well you ran your campaign with your updates and keeping on track with your timing. Thank you.”

Kickstarter, Backer #11421,  comment:

“I got my belt, found it waiting for me after I got back from my holidays. Looks great and feels good too. Can’t wait to try it out and see how it wears.”

Kickstarter, Backer #14108,  comment:

“Greeting from Malaysia! Just received my belt a few days ago. It has been good so far! Keep up the good work guys!”

Kickstarter, Backer # 11446, comment:

“My belts arrived today. They work as specified and the leather is beautiful. Great work guys, and what a spectacularly well run campaign.”

Kickstarter, Backer #13306,  comment:

“Received my belt and LOVE it. I keep looking everytime to see if there's any indents or tears on my belt... nothing. Thank you!”

Kickstarter, Backer #13213,  comment:

“Hi Folks, I received my belt a few days ago. I have worn it for a couple of days before posting this comment. It is easy to use and comfortable. I like it and would probably buy it again. Thank you.”

Kickstarter, Backer #9532,  comment:

“Just got my belt and it’s just what it promised. Great product. Highly recommendable!”

Kickstarter, Backer #13687,  comment:

“Just received mine here in Montreal, Canada! The belt is beautiful! Loved the design. Might have to order the black and brown version now! :) Thank you!”

Kickstarter, Backer #9675,  comment:

“I got my belt today (Backer from Indonesia). Very very satisfied with the belt quality and the mechanism, very cool!”

Kickstarter, Backer #12552,  comment:

“Received and happy with it. Where can I buy another one?”

Kickstarter, Backer #12302,  comment:

“I got mine! And i like it a lot! Thx team”

Kickstarter, Backer #13039,  comment:

“the belts have just arrived in Surabaya, Indonesia. Everything about the belts are simply amazing. ????????”

Kickstarter, Backer #10475,  comment:

“The belt is tightened by pulling it through the buckle and the ratchet tightens in small steps. To release the belt, pull the end that pokes out of the buckle whilst pushing the buckle release knob and push the belt back through the buckle. Once you’ve done it a couple of times it becomes second nature. When you get the belt, the leather part is long enough to fit the widest waist (within reason). Wrap the belt around you and cut to length so what the middle of the ratchet on the front end of the belt meets the cut end of the belt. Best to cut longer and then fit the buckle. You can always trim a bit more so that it eventually it is cut to your size. There is a small cream leaflet that comes with the belt and buckle that shows all this. That’s how I did it, and it’s the most comfortable belt I have ever owned.”

Kickstarter, Backer #159634,  comment:

“I have just received my belts. Superior quality and excellent design. I would definitely order again. Many thanks!”

Kickstarter, Backer #10455,  Bricks comment:

“I received my belt yesterday. What a great design. Thanks.”

Kickstarter, Backer #13032,  comment:

“Got my belts today. Love them! Easy to put together, and they work great.”

Kickstarter, Backer #9945, comment:

“Arrived today in Tucson AZ. Looks beautiful and seems to work great...can't wait to wear it tomorrow. Thanks, and hang in there those-still-waiting!”

DuPont™ and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company used under license by Harmattan Design LLC.

We welcome third party sharing of our product in graphic form and text but only if in accordance and in full respect of trademark and copyright use guidelines concerning Kevlar® issued by it's respective owner, E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company.For more information on using these trademarks linked to the materials we use in manufacturing THE SMART BELT 3.0, please visit:  Kevlar® Trademark Policy

 

We, Harmattan Design LLC, are a responsible company and believe that quality is of the utmost importance. As such, we source our Kevlar® Fibre directly from manufacturers licensed by E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company and are Registered Customers.

Patents and Intellectual Property

Part of our due diligence as a reputable company, in launching a new product, is the undertaking of an IP Audit. Such an audit, by a well known US IP specialised law practice, has deemed our Smart Belt 3.0 to be free of any infringement on any  standing patent, domestic or foreign. Any claim to the contrary, in a public arena, in a purposeful attempt to disparage our efforts will be pursued for damages.   

Video and Audio Content

All footage, images and soundtracks presented within this campaign are our own manufacture or are licensed from their respective owners for the purpose and scope in which they are used. Testimonials of our product are voluntary and renders from actual backers from previous campaigns that have had extensive experience in using  the initial iteration of The Smart Belt 3.0. The testimonials are their own manufacture and are used with their specific and direct consent.

Warranty & Money Back Guarantee

The Smart Belt 3.0 has a limited warranty of 1 year from the receipt of the product. The warranty covers manufacturing defects, structural failure of the buckle or the strap. The Money Back Guarantee is valid 30 Days from receipt of the product and can be claimed only after the product is returned to us in a good working order and with no apparent marks, cuts or signs of wear.

story:
...not anymore...

 

Features

(Note: These sizes are according to waist size, NOT hip. Before your order is shipped you will be contacted by support to get your particular size/style/color preference.  Prints/Colors in photos are protoypes. Initial prints/colors offered will be black and dark blue camo as shown in perk images. )

All of our Booty-Cover variations conveniently come with one loop on the waist band (for towel, key clip, etc.) and a phone pocket (8 1/2" W x 5" H).

WATCH VIDEO BELOW FOR STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO ORDER:

(We've received a few inquiries about colors, sizes, styles and how to checkout. Although most of those questions can be found in our 'FAQ's' area or in the text above, this video is an all-in-one explanation.)

 

Risks & Challenges

For all the girls we asked, about 8 out of 10 said they would surely purchase and wear this product. The only potential problem I see would be marketing and advertising.  

We plan on attending fitness expo’s, setting up booths at gyms, and making connections in as many communities as possible, as well as launching an online marketing campaign(s). Besides that we are going to send our product out to select influencers that will help drive traffic to our page and website. From there we are confident that we can make the majority of them life-long customers!

If you can't contribute for whatever reason, please share this a friend or family member who you think would LOVE this product...THANK YOU!!!

story:
THE DRZ_Type_250F  

We have the pleasure to introduce you Direnzo’s first watch collection, a stylish timepiece born from a passion for modern design, tradition and motor racing. We hope you will accompany us as we embark on this exciting adventure. Hand-assembled in Switzerland, in an atelier specialised in high-end watches, each timepiece will be part of a limited series of 600 units. Each watch will be a unique, numbered piece.

READ WHAT THE PRESS SAYS:

Watchpaper:"To me, it is not the Maserati racing story that makes this watch fascinating, but the design, the proportions, the colours and the comfort on the wrist."

The Time Bum: "The fine lined and broadly spaced letters of the brand name at the top of the dial is balanced by a simple and effective rounded logo at the bottom. It is clean, legible, and highly attractive." 

28 days earlier: "The acid test for any watch is the time honoured question, “would you own one?” The answer here is a definite yes. The size is nice, the build is excellent with sapphire and the attention to detail. Most importantly though, it reminds me of being young, when the summer days seemed longer driving around with a few friends and the roof down."

Watchtrotter: "L’orologio trasmette a chi lo osserva grande passione e cura per i dettagli. Il quadrante è disegnato prendendo spunto dal tachimetro della Maserati Type 250F. I due grandi zeri che rimpiazzano le più classiche ore 12 danno un tocco di sportività e richiamano i vecchi cronografi." 

MrMontre: "C’est une montre construite pour durer, un instrument de précision parfait pour un usage quotidien. Au poignet, le rendu est équilibré et indéniablement élégant." 

Watchisthis: "The dial has a nostalgic appearance. The DRZ_Type 250f_B with a black dial and the DRZ_Type 250f_C with a white dial are a delightful combination of timeless design and an urban, modern look. Light and pleasant, the wrist feel is comfortable."

Chrononautix: "Das Gesamtpaket, welches Direnzo hier mit seinem Einstand abliefert ist hinsichtlich Preis-Leistung wirklich erste Sahne. Kurzum: Ihr dürft bedenkenlos zuschlagen, wenn euch das Vintage-Design gefällt. Insbesondere zu Beginn der Kickstarter-Kampagne lockt ein schnäppchenverdächtiger Preis von 270 CHF (ca. 235€). Dem Erfolg dürfte meiner Meinung nach nichts im Wege stehen – ich werde jedenfalls dabei sein und wünsche Sergio Di Renzo gutes Gelingen!"

Suave Watches: "On the wrist, the DRZ_Type_250F is a pleasantly light-weight watch paired with a slim natural leather strap – soft and supple. The dial is extremely clear and appears much larger due to the slim bezel"

Relojes Increibles: "Direnzo nos presenta, de este modo, el DRZ Type 250F, una pieza que reúne una serie de detalles seleccionados de una manera meticulosa. Sobre su esfera encontramos el primero de ellos; se trata del numeral 12, que ha sido sustituido por un 00, en un guiño a los cronómetros de mano de esa epoca."

Petite Trotteuse: "Les montres inspirées par l’automobile sont nombreuses, et provoquent toujours un ressenti agréable quand on les regarde ou qu’on les passe au poignet. Cette Direnzo ne fait pas tache dans la catégorie, avec une montre très réussie, de qualité, et résolument agréable à porter. Au poignet c’est un régal, tant au niveau du confort que de la lisibilité."

Geargreed: "Our honest opinion about the Direnzo watches is that they have put a lot of hard work into them and they honestly seem like they know what they are doing"

VIDEO REVIEWS:

Armand the watch guy

La petite Trotteuse 

Luxury Lifestyle

Watch Addict

INSPIRATION  

The exquisite design of this timepiece draws inspiration from the magnificent race cars of the 40s and 50s, particularly the Maserati Type 250F, driven by Juan Manuel Fangio in his world famous victory at the 1957 Formula 1 Grand Prix race in Nürburgring. Our goal was to create a timeless but contemporary wristwatch, which, while both elegant and subtle, transmits a sense of excitement and speed; homage to an era of pioneers and mould-breaking engineering. Timeless and sophisticated in design, this timepiece is a reliable, precision instrument for everyday use.The DRZ_Type 250F is a dress watch with a sporting soul.

 DIAL  

The design of the DRZ_Type_250F exudes passion and attention to detail. The dial finds inspiration in the tachometer of the Type 250F, and in place of the number “12”, the dial displays “00” lending it a sporting touch, reminiscent of an old stopwatch. The calendar has been deliberately removed thus generating a meticulous design uncluttered by external elements that may upset the symmetry.

CASE  

Inspired by the dashboard gauges of old race cars, the polished 316L stainless steel case measures 40mm in diameter (without the crown), the height of the watch is visually reduced thanks to its dual-cylinder design: a floating bezel that rests on the main body.

HANDS  

The hands offer a delicate aesthetic, yet maintain a strong presence. Their colour, which contrasts with that of the dial, ensures effortless readability; a design priority throughout. The red second hand on both versions is a nod to the Maserati Type 250F.

AUTOMATIC MOVEMENT  

The caseback houses the robust Japanese Seiko NH35 automatic movement with hacking function. This movement is an exceptional high-spec, Japanese-made automatic movement featuring a 42-hour power reserve. The caseback is screwed down to ensure maximum water tightness.

SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL  

It features a double-domed sapphire crystal with double sided anti-reflective coating; a material that is known for its excellent scratch-resistant qualities, allowing the watch to look like new for many years.

WRISTBAND  

With the aim of creating an unparallelled tactile experience, we have used a top quality, natural leather strap. As an added detail, traditional hand-sewn stitches are reminiscent of the old-fashioned straps from the 50s, affording the watch an aesthetic that is both vintage and sporty. The wristband contains a quick release spring bar, so that the straps can be swapped in seconds without the need for special tools.

 

 

PASSPORT WALLET  

For best storing of and travelling with your watch, we will provide you with a stylish, durable container. Inspired by the old-fashioned tool rolls used in car races in the 50s, this wallet has been designed to accompany you in your journeys and adventures. It has a special pocket for your passport, the warranty (or credit) card, two DRZ's or a watch plus additional strap. It is made from natural distressed dark brown leather of the same quality of the strap and fitted with a black elastic. The wallet comes free with the purchase of the watch.

 

 

CRAFTSMANSHIP 

The DRZ_Type_250F will be assembled in Switzerland and will undergo all the necessary quality control checks for water-resistance, precision levels, etc. Our aim is to produce a high-quality timepiece. Each and every component of this watch is made from the finest materials, ensuring a product that is guaranteed to operate flawlessly for many years to come. This is a watch built to last.

SPECIFICATIONS

FEATURES

IT WILL BE AVAILABLE IN FOUR STYLES 

DRZ_Type 250F_B: Black dial with cream minute and hour hands, Arabic numerals, red seconds hand and genuine leather band. 

DRZ_Type 250F_C: Cream dial with black minute and hour hands, Arabic numerals, red seconds hand and genuine leather band.

DRZ_Type 250F_BL: Blue dial with cream minute and hour hands, Arabic numerals, red seconds hand and genuine leather band. 

DRZ_Type 250F_G: Green dial with cream minute and hour hands, Arabic numerals, red seconds hand and genuine leather band. 

INTERNATIONAL WARRANTY  

We stand behind our products and are committed to fast and high quality service. Each Direnzo comes with a limited warranty covering flaws in workmanship and materials for a period of two (2) years after the original purchase.

TIMELINE  

This project came to life in 2016 following many hours of design, meetings with different specialist companies and thanks to an especially close relationship with our followers, who have been witness to the creation process of the DRZ_Type_250F. We’re very proud to have successfully arrived at this momentous date. Our prototypes are finished and have been tested by watch connaisseurs  from the world over: Canada, USA, France, Germany,  UK, SIngapore, Switzerland and Spain. We’re ready to begin this great adventure and hope you can come with us!  

SHIPPING

Shipping worldwide, please note: customs duties and taxes are the buyer’s responsibility upon delivery.

Postage costs cover national postal services. Please contact us If you require a specific courier service.

EU customers: We'll be shipping from a EU country.

Warranty: Two (2) year international Warranty from the original date of purchase. The warranty covers manufacturing defects.

SPECIAL THANKS AND CREDITS  

Special thanks to family and friends who’ve encouraged me every step of the way, particularly the amazing team we’ve put together to get this campaign done.

Clarissa Patrianova Valaeys (Creative Director - Head & founder at ContentPlate) www.contentplate.ch

Matt Goodman (Director) 

Jennifer Macleod (Co-Director & Editor) 

Juan Ortega (Model)

Giulia Ranzanici (Model)

Mariano Godoy (Music) 

THANK YOU!

Thank you all for taking your time to view this project . We hope that you are as passionate as we are about the DRZ_Type_250F watches and make your pledge to receive your unique and supremely stylish timepiece. 

Download the press kit 

Click here to access the DRZ_Type_250F press kit

For more information regarding our watches you can subscribe to our newsletter or follow us on: 

Website: www.direnzowatches.com  

Facebook: DIRENZO watches  

Instagram: direnzo_watches

Need help? Feel free to contact us at: info@direnzowatches.com

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We are aware that creating and delivering a product can be a complicated process, which sometimes entails unexpected delays. This is why the utmost care has been taken throughout the process. 
We have developed firm relationships with reliable manufacturing partners and have created, tried and tested, high-quality prototypes. 
We'll keep our backers/buyers informed throughout the production process with regular updates and by sharing images whenever possible. 
Since we believe in best-quality customer service and experience we guarantee a response to any queries within 24 hours. If there are any setbacks in the production process, or any kind of delays in our pre-established time frame, we ensure complete transparency and will keep all of our backers informed.
story_txt:
THE DRZ_Type_250F  
We have the pleasure to introduce you Direnzo’s first watch collection, a stylish timepiece born from a passion for modern design, tradition and motor racing. We hope you will accompany us as we embark on this exciting adventure. Hand-assembled in Switzerland, in an atelier specialised in high-end watches, each timepiece will be part of a limited series of 600 units. Each watch will be a unique, numbered piece.


READ WHAT THE PRESS SAYS:
Watchpaper:"To me, it is not the Maserati racing story that makes this watch fascinating, but the design, the proportions, the colours and the comfort on the wrist."
The Time Bum: "The fine lined and broadly spaced letters of the brand name at the top of the dial is balanced by a simple and effective rounded logo at the bottom. It is clean, legible, and highly attractive." 
28 days earlier: "The acid test for any watch is the time honoured question, “would you own one?” The answer here is a definite yes. The size is nice, the build is excellent with sapphire and the attention to detail. Most importantly though, it reminds me of being young, when the summer days seemed longer driving around with a few friends and the roof down."
Watchtrotter: "L’orologio trasmette a chi lo osserva grande passione e cura per i dettagli. Il quadrante è disegnato prendendo spunto dal tachimetro della Maserati Type 250F. I due grandi zeri che rimpiazzano le più classiche ore 12 danno un tocco di sportività e richiamano i vecchi cronografi." 
MrMontre: "C’est une montre construite pour durer, un instrument de précision parfait pour un usage quotidien. Au poignet, le rendu est équilibré et indéniablement élégant." 
Watchisthis: "The dial has a nostalgic appearance. The DRZ_Type 250f_B with a black dial and the DRZ_Type 250f_C with a white dial are a delightful combination of timeless design and an urban, modern look. Light and pleasant, the wrist feel is comfortable."
Chrononautix: "Das Gesamtpaket, welches Direnzo hier mit seinem Einstand abliefert ist hinsichtlich Preis-Leistung wirklich erste Sahne. Kurzum: Ihr dürft bedenkenlos zuschlagen, wenn euch das Vintage-Design gefällt. Insbesondere zu Beginn der Kickstarter-Kampagne lockt ein schnäppchenverdächtiger Preis von 270 CHF (ca. 235€). Dem Erfolg dürfte meiner Meinung nach nichts im Wege stehen – ich werde jedenfalls dabei sein und wünsche Sergio Di Renzo gutes Gelingen!"
Suave Watches: "On the wrist, the DRZ_Type_250F is a pleasantly light-weight watch paired with a slim natural leather strap – soft and supple. The dial is extremely clear and appears much larger due to the slim bezel"
Relojes Increibles: "Direnzo nos presenta, de este modo, el DRZ Type 250F, una pieza que reúne una serie de detalles seleccionados de una manera meticulosa. Sobre su esfera encontramos el primero de ellos; se trata del numeral 12, que ha sido sustituido por un 00, en un guiño a los cronómetros de mano de esa epoca."
Petite Trotteuse: "Les montres inspirées par l’automobile sont nombreuses, et provoquent toujours un ressenti agréable quand on les regarde ou qu’on les passe au poignet. Cette Direnzo ne fait pas tache dans la catégorie, avec une montre très réussie, de qualité, et résolument agréable à porter. Au poignet c’est un régal, tant au niveau du confort que de la lisibilité."
Geargreed: "Our honest opinion about the Direnzo watches is that they have put a lot of hard work into them and they honestly seem like they know what they are doing"
VIDEO REVIEWS:
Armand the watch guy
La petite Trotteuse

story:
Have you ever resorted to changing clothes using a towel or hiding in the car before or after your activities? That’s why we created The Undress so you can CHANGE out of what you’re wearing AND get into a new outfit - and it only takes about 30 seconds.

Security, peace of mind, and convenience in a unique fashionable solution.

 

  • Remove Your Top: First, bring The Undress to your waist. Then use the soft handle to guide the front of the dress underneath anything you want to remove. Bring the straps over your head, and cinch both the neck and back cord locks to secure. Finally, simply remove your top and bra.
  • Remove Your Bottoms: Insert your hands into the side access openings to easily remove your bottoms. Done!

 

  • Put your bra and top over The Undress, and use the special side openings to put on your bottoms.
  • Next, simply loosen the cord locks and use the soft handle to guide the straps under all your top layers. Then just slip out of The Undress, and you’ll be in your new outfit!

The Undress changes to fit YOU. Women’s bodies are very different, but most clothing companies design clothes to fit their idea of ONE ideal shape. So, we sought to challenge the norm and solve a complex problem with a simple, elegant solution - our brand new EVERFIT SYSTEM.

With three adjustment points, The Undress transforms to your own perfect fit!

 

The Undress is so size friendly and adjustable, that Size “B”, fits women from Extra Small through Large, Size “C” fits women sizes XL-3XL, and we now have Size "A" for Youth!

 

The Undress changes to match your style - Transform The Undress in 4 ways by using a combination of the cords, cord locks, and belt loops. It’s like 4 dresses in one!

The Undress IS wearable everyday, and we hope it becomes a favorite item in your wardrobe that you wear on a regular basis.

 

 

NEW! Built-in Bra Padding: The Undress Version 3 has a brand-new soft padded lining that provides additional coverage in the chest area of The Undress. The padding is pliable (like swimsuit padding) and gives you perfect coverage. You can now wear The Undress casually, and without a bra if needed.

 

Built-in, removable shelf bra (add-on option): If you need support, quickly add an optional, fully adjustable shelf bra strap to provide better coverage and support for those who prefer it!

 

Two Hidden Pockets: The Undress has zippered side-access openings with convenient hidden pockets to hold your small items like a cell phone, keys, and more.

 

Self Packing: Convert The Undress into a small shoulder bag to take small items with you. You can also pack it away in your gear bag or car so you are prepared for everything!

 

Car Seat Cover: Don’t have time to change out of your sweaty clothes after a workout? Don’t get you car seat dirty - use The Undress as an emergency car seat cover instead. It’s built to be as tough as you are.

 

The Best Dress for Travel: The Undress is versatile and perfect for any destination. From the beach, the bar, a night on the town, or after a run - you’ll be prepared for anything on your travels. You can even change on a crowded tour bus or plane!

 

Love it, or send it back! If it doesn’t fit, you can send it back and exchange for a different size, or get your money back. No questions asked!

 

FABRIC DETAILS:

Introducing The Super Shawl Version 3! The brand new Super Shawl now has sleeves! So, on top of using it like a regular shawl, you can wear it like a cardigan to keep you warm when you're on the go. The Super Shawl is the perfect companion to wear with The Undress!

 

  • You will choose your size and color after the campaign is over via a special email survey sent after June 25.
  • If you fall between Size B and C, choose B for a slimmer fit, or C for a more flowy fit.
  • Dresses shown are prototypes and final color choices are dependent on actual availability of fabrics shown at or near end of campaign.
  • For limited colors & prints, earlier backers will get first chance to order, so pledge early for the best selection!
  • Photos of size comparisons are below in our photo gallery! (scroll down)
  • To pledge to our project, Click the pink “Back It” button on the campaign page
  • Next, select the perk you'd like to receive and your pledge amount will automatically populate.
  • Log into your Indiegogo account.
  • Pledge with confidence!

 

 

     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hi, we’re April and Dennis and we’ve worked for 3 years to develop what we believe is the most amazing dress system in the world that every active woman would love!

We have come back to Crowdfunding because of this community, a community that cares and challenges us to grow and improve our products and ourselves.

When you pledge for The Undress today, you help our little company accomplish new things like develop a wholesale program for the first time so we can sell The Undress in running, yoga, and other specialty stores; pursue worldwide distribution, and redevelop the brand as our next evolution of our transformation.

We have a unique opportunity, and we can’t do this ourselves - we need your help. We invite you to join thousands of our backers worldwide who are courageous, daring, bold, and passionate women from all over the world that represent the Courage to Change. Please pledge, and please share, and we look forward to having you become the first in the world to own The Undress Version 3, and join our founders family.

 

Co-Founders Dennis Caco & April Estrada 

Founders - Dennis Caco & April Estrada

Customer Service and Fulfillment Technology - Marat Z.

Videographer - Matt M. 

Assistant Camera - Kyle S.

Gaffer - Nicholas C.

Key Grip - Kevin F.

Photography - Jenna M.

Graphic Design - Nestor P.

Customer Service Support - Wayva

Production Manager - Clio K.

Mr. Money Bags - Ben A.

Padres Numero Uno - Margerita and Jerry Estrada

Models: Evelyn Sun, Breanne Vaca, Luci Hanley, Jodi Gilbert, Natonya Pacchiarotti, Mandolin Badger, Steph Villegas, Kristi Kuttner, Kathleen Meehan, Tania Vasquez, Krisha Daugherty, Taylee Madrigal, Sidney Sarmiento, Nikki Jimenez, Jennifer Santini, Myla Tyco Generoso, Hawley Woods, Breeanne Macouzet

Test Fit Team: Monique Ramos, Anavie Leelin, Sarah Dejesus, Rachelle Caco, Melissa Mednick, Chabeli Cazarez, Kristi Robusto

Special Thanks:

Eve Cafe & Yoga in Encinitas, CA

Boys & Girls Club of San Dieguito

Casa de Doug Sutton

A HUGE THANK YOU to our incredible team and everyone who blessed us with their time, energy, talent and support throughout our entire journey of creating The Undress Version 3. This truly has been the most amazing experience and it would not have been possible without all the people who believed in us and believed in our vision. We send all our love and gratitude to you all and the impact you all have made to us will always hold a special place in our hearts!

Thank you to my parents, Margarita and Jerry, for being our #1 fans and for all your encouragement & support! Also a huge thank you to my boyfriend Denny for being there for me and for letting us borrow your fancy camera! And a thank you to my sister, Stephanie, for your help and for all the funny, random Instagram posts you send me! ;p -April

Thank you to my wife Rachelle, and my son, Drake for bearing with me and supporting me as I work hard to fulfill all of our dreams!- Dennis

 

 

 

 

Do you have a guarantee? Yes! Love it, or send it back for a money-back guarantee! No questions asked!

Do you guarantee it will fit? Yes! If it doesn’t fit, you can exchange for a different size, or get your money-back. No questions asked!

Why isn’t the bra strap included in the price? After we surveyed our customers, it was 50/50 in favor of a strap. So we did not want to force someone to buy the strap if they did not feel the need to have it. Also, it is quite laborious to make, so it does cost quite a bit to produce, and we make very little, if anything, on this item.

How did you decide on the length, and why isn’t there a long version? This was debated and we made prototypes of both this current length and a longer version. We had test fitters try both, and the shorter length was the favorite BY FAR. The longer dress was quite cumbersome in comparison. But hey, if you really want a long version, email us and maybe we can be swayed!

When does it ship?  Our target dates to ship are November-Dec 2017 for all Indiegogo Perks. These are estimates and are subject to change.

Could the prints/colors really sell out? Fabric Supply is always limited, so it is possible that Indiegogo Prints/Colors may be limited.  We will keep you informed of which colors/fabrics will be available before you process your Perks through Backerkit.

What is the washing/drying instructions? Information coming soon!

What is the fabric content? Information coming soon!

What if I fall between sizes? If you fall between L and XL, we recommend picking Size C and use the Everfit System to adjust The Undress to your desired fit.

International Orders - Duties, Tariffs, Taxes are not included in price, and are the backers responsibility.

So, on top of using it like a regular shawl, you can wear it like a cardigan to keep you warm when you're on the go. The Super Shawl is the perfect companion to wear with The Undress!  
You will choose your size and color after the campaign is over via a special email survey sent after June 25.
If you fall between Size B and C, choose B for a slimmer fit, or C for a more flowy fit.
Dresses shown are prototypes and final color choices are dependent on actual availability of fabrics shown at or near end of campaign.
For limited colors & prints, earlier backers will get first chance to order, so pledge early for the best selection!
Photos of size comparisons are below in our photo gallery! (scroll down)

To pledge to our project, Click the pink “Back It” button on the campaign page
Next, select the perk you'd like to receive and your pledge amount will automatically populate.
Log into your Indiegogo account.
Pledge with confidence!
                 Hi, we’re April and Dennis and we’ve worked for 3 years to develop what we believe is the most amazing dress system in the world that every active woman would love!We have come back to Crowdfunding because of this community, a community that cares and challenges us to grow and improve our products and ourselves.When you pledge for The Undress today, you help our little company accomplish new things like develop a wholesale program for the first time so we can sell The Undress in running, yoga, and other specialty stores; pursue worldwide distribution, and redevelop the brand as our next evolution of our transformation.We have a unique opportunity, and we can’t do this ourselves - we need your help. We invite you to join thousands of our backers worldwide who are courageous, daring, bold, and passionate women from all over the world that represent the Courage to Change. Please pledge, and please share, and we look forward to having you become the first in the world to own The Undress Version 3, and join our founders family.  Co-Founders Dennis Caco & April Estrada Founders - Dennis Caco & April EstradaCustomer Service and Fulfillment Technology - Marat Z.Videographer - Matt M. Assistant Camera - Kyle S.Gaffer - Nicholas C.Key Grip - Kevin F.Photography - Jenna M.Graphic Design - Nestor P.Customer Service Support - WayvaProduction Manager - Clio K.Mr. Money Bags - Ben A.Padres Numero Uno - Margerita and Jerry EstradaModels: Evelyn Sun, Breanne Vaca, Luci Hanley, Jodi Gilbert, Natonya Pacchiarotti, Mandolin Badger, Steph Villegas, Kristi Kuttner, Kathleen Meehan, Tania Vasquez, Krisha Daugherty, Taylee Madrigal, Sidney Sarmiento, Nikki Jimenez, Jennifer Santini, Myla Tyco Generoso, Hawley Woods, Breeanne MacouzetTest Fit Team: Monique Ramos, Anavie Leelin, Sarah Dejesus, Rachelle Caco, Melissa Mednick, Chabeli Cazarez, Kristi RobustoSpecial Thanks:Eve Cafe & Yoga in Encinitas, CABoys & Girls Club of San DieguitoCasa de Doug SuttonA HUGE THANK YOU to our incredible team and everyone who blessed us with their time, energy, talent and support throughout our entire journey of creating The Undress Version 3. This truly has been the most amazing experience and it would not have been possible without all the people who believed in us and believed in our vision. We send all our love and gratitude to you all and the impact you all have made to us will always hold a special place in our hearts!Thank you to my parents, Margarita and Jerry, for being our #1 fans and for all your encouragement & support! Also a huge thank you to my boyfriend Denny for being there for me and for letting us borrow your fancy camera! And a thank you to my sister, Stephanie, for your help and for all the funny, random Instagram posts you send me! ;p -AprilThank you to my wife Rachelle, and my son, Drake for bearing with me and supporting me as I work hard to fulfill all of our dreams!- Dennis        Do you have a guarantee? Yes! Love it, or send it back for a money-back guarantee! No questions asked!Do you guarantee it will fit? Yes! If it doesn’t fit, you can exchange for a different size, or get your money-back. No questions asked!Why isn’t the bra strap included in the price? After we surveyed our customers, it was 50/50 in favor of a strap. So we did not want to force someone to buy the strap if they did not feel the need to have it. Also, it is quite laborious to make, so it does cost quite a bit to produce, and we make very little, if anything, on this item.How did you decide on the length, and why isn’t there a long version? This was debated and we made prototypes of both this current length and a longer version. We had test fitters try both, and the shorter length was the favorite BY FAR. The longer dress was quite cumbersome in comparison. But hey, if you really want a long version, email us and maybe we can be swayed!When does it ship?  Our target dates to ship are November-Dec 2017 for all Indiegogo Perks. These are estimates and are subject to change.Could the prints/colors really sell out? Fabric Supply is always limited, so it is possible that Indiegogo Prints/Colors may be limited.  We will keep you informed of which colors/fabrics will be available before you process your Perks through Backerkit.What is the washing/drying instructions? Information coming soon!What is the fabric content? Information coming soon!What if I fall between sizes? If you fall between L and XL, we recommend picking Size C and use the Everfit System to adjust The Undress to your desired fit.International Orders - Duties, Tariffs, Taxes are not included in price, and are the backers responsibility.

story:
Meet NÜWA!

Changing the world drop by drop. We want to easily allow you to make a conscious choice when it comes to what you wear. NÜWA creates fully sustainable & recycled clothing and is 100% Portuguese.

 

 

It's all about slow fashion! We're joining the #fashionrevolution movement. Just like they say, "everyone’s action has a consequence and you can actually impact the stories of others".

 

Our low carbon footprint and vegan-friendly apparel seeks a more sustainable life and simplificty is the keyword.

 

 

Now we seek funding on Indiegogo to launch our own online store and to start shipping. Also, a percentage of our profits is going straight to an amazing NGO. So, act now, help us save water and change lives for the better.

 

Why this matters

Because we are running out of water. We are running out of time. Each drop matters.

 

 

How does it work?

We do not waste water on production, we recycle PET bottles. How? Here's a brief explanation:

 

 

#1 Collect and sort post-consumer plastic bottles, stripping them of all labels and caps;

#2 Salvage cotton from discarded industry scraps (also sorted by color and blended with polyester - please note that polyester fibers come from the recycling of PET);

#3 The reclaimed fiber is then spun into yarn and knit into fabric;

#4 Fabrics are cut and sewn into a NÜWA garment.

 

 

Your perks: basic or branded t-shirt

1 NÜWA t-shirt = 4 plastic bottles of 0,60L

 

 

Features you'll get:

✔ A hidden message inside to inspire you

✔ Long-lasting comfort and durability

✔ The best fitting in the shoulder area

✔ Eco-friendly digital printing (if you choose so)

✔ Lightweight, regular fit

✔ 100% recycled materials

 

Our t-shirts originally include our brand logo. Anyway, you can choose your t-shirt with or without NÜWA's printed branding. Just send us an email and be sure you give us a heads up!

 

 

Your perks: basic or branded hoodie

1 NÜWA hoodie = 13 plastic bottles of 0,60L

 

 

Features you'll get:

✔ A hidden message inside to inspire you

✔ Includes a kangaroo-pouch handwarmer pocket

 ✔ Long-lasting comfort and durability

✔ Soft Brushed knitwear, a champion-weight fabric

✔ Eco-friendly digital printing (if you choose so)

✔ 100% recycled materials

✔ Kids hoodie does not include a hood cord for safety reasons

✔ The reflector* colors are also and a great option to hike at the end of the day 

 

Our hoodies originally include our brand logo. Anyway, you can choose your hoodie with or without NÜWA's printed branding. Just send us an email and be sure you give us a heads up!

* Reflector colors are only available in Black, Navy Blue and White hoodies.
 
 

Your Choice. Your World. Your Heart.

That's our motto! Inspired by Nature, our mission is to motivate those around us to act for a greener tomorrow.

 

Back in 2015, more than 150 world leaders were at the UN headquarters to formally adopt a new agenda for sustainable development. This is composed of 17 Sustainable Development Objectives, which must be implemented by all the countries of the world during the next 15 years, until 2030. At NÜWA we want to follow those goals and this is our way to do so.

 
 

How NÜWA gives back

1% of the proceeds will be donated to a non-profit in order to help provide clean water to Mozambique's affected villages.

 

 

We're partening up with this amazing NGO! In Africa, water is one of the major shortcomings and the lack of its quality is the N1 cause of most diseases. In addition to using raw materials that do not require water, we provide potable water and sanitation systems to communities in need. For each NÜWA purchase, part of the amount will revert to build clean water wells and other resources in some of the villages affected by Cyclone Idai in Mozambique.

 

Sustainably Certified Process

We only use sustainable raw materials: recycled cotton and recycled PET bottles. The generated yarn is high-quality, without the need of water consumption, toxic dyes or agrochemicals. The cotton we use is obtained through cuts of daily confections' fabric leftovers (textile industry surplus)

 

Our meshes have no dyeing steps nor do they pollute the environment; Dyeing steps are not required, because the final color of cotton fiber is related to the color of the raw materials. Plus, we have opted for digital printing, the most ecological and highest quality solution on the market.

 

 

We are certified by the following standards:

 

100% Recycled

Just like our clothing, our packaging, hang tags and labels… everything is 100% recycled and eco-friendly to guide our journey to zero waste!

 

 

Made in Portugal

We care about fair trade and responsable production. All the manufacturing is done in Portugal, as well as the design. Because it's our hometown, choosing Portugal not only helps the local economy, but guarantees quality standards and ultimately the safety of our workforce.

 

Your perks

Behind the scenes

 

How to order

Don't let us be just a drop in the ocean...

 

1. Click to back this project

Click BACK IT to support this project. Select the available reward you'd like to pledge on the right side of the page. Each backer may only make one pledge.

 

2. Payment

Enter your payment information. Your payment will not be charged until the very end of this campaign (July 31st, 2019).

 

3. Size, Color & Shipping

No worries! You’ll get to easily select your size and color as well as submit your shipping details once you back this project. We also have basic t-shirts and hoodies available, so, if you prefer those without the NÜWA printed branding, please contact us at hello@nuwastore.com

 

Timings​

July 2019 – Indiegogo campaign

August 2019 – Production & Online store launch

September 2019 – Shipping to our backers

 

About the creator

I’m Catarina Lopes, founder of NÜWA. I've decided to "join the green side" and it's one of the best things I ever did! It all started with the desire to add value to the fashion industry, which shockingly ranks 2nd in the ranking of the world's most polluting industries. My team and I care deeply about our oceans, so, saving water is always on top of our minds.

 

Sizing

 

Risks & Challenges

There is a risk to starting any business, but thankfully we have already put in a ton of hard work and completed some of what we believe were our biggest first steps. It took a lot of planning and we have made efforts to mitigate risks such as shipment delays or product defects. Even so, we still have a long way to go!

We have created a capsule wardrobe and now we just need the funds to put in the order and spread the word. Weather here or on social media, we promise to communicate with you every step of the way!

 

Make sure you share you've backed this project on social media!

 

Stay green. Love,

NÜWA Founder

 

Want to find out more about us? Stay in the loop...

Website  |  Instagram  |  Facebook  |  Twitter  |  Pinterest

 

Please note: you can change the currency by clicking on our campaign total above and selecting 'Edit currency settings'. All orders are processed in €EUR.
