story:
Our campaign is now over, find more info on https://www.heyjoy.io

 

Octopus is the first icon-based watch that empowers the kids by teaching them good habits and the concept of time.

Octopus is for children aged 3+. Unlike other products on the market, it’s wearable, visual and it grows with your kids.

 

 

 

It’s a watch built for children who don’t yet understand time

Studies have shown that children under 8 years old don’t understand the concept of time, let alone remember what to do when a certain time rolls around. We have designed the first watch that helps them understand how parents expect them to use their time. We believe this will help children form good habits and help them to take responsibility for their actions.

Every child dreams to be a grown-up! Imagine how proud your young children would be with a watch on their arms just like you. Imagine how they would feel when the watch remind them to prepare their bag for the swimming lesson or to feed the fish before leaving: “I'm useful, I have a role to play in the family, I don't need my parents, I am autonomous!” 

It works in 3 modes adapted to different stages of childhood development. Octopus can grow with your child! 

The first mode helps kids understand time by association. It displays a big icon that is associated with a task to accomplish, according to a schedule set by the parent. 
The second and the third modes teaches kids to read digital and analog clock.

 

It’s a scheduler for parents who are tired of power struggles

Parents want to promote self-discipline in children because they know it’s the foundation for later success in life. When getting ready for school devolves into one power struggle after another, everyone loses. Your child wants to have ownership over the process. Parents just want to get out the door by 8:15.

Parents program visual reminders on their smartphone that will pop up on the watch at certain times (with a discreet vibration).

It's an assistant

Octopus is an assistant for your child, but the system as a whole helps the parents too.

It helps you teach good habits to your kids without overwhelming them; It’s an educational tool. “Be consistent, coherent, predictable and clear about your expectations, teach few tasks at a time”.

It becomes a partner in parenting by helping to enact proven methodology. For example, kids learn better when given specific instructions. Octopus can help to break down tasks and go step by step. Example: Put the blocks in their container, then Tidy up the robots in their box, then come to Dinner, etc.”.

 

It grows with your kids

Everything is setup via an app, so Octopus can evolve with your ever-changing needs. It provides templates for routines based on age and gender. You can adjust them or create new ones from scratch. It syncs up in real time via Bluetooth. Everything is stored physically on the memory of the watch, so the system can keep track of the progress. It grows up with the kids. Some features are unlocked based on the age, like new clock faces for instance.

... and it's fun!

And of course, it’s fun for the kids. But we kept the level of distraction low. It’s a tool, not a toy! No video games, no messaging system...

There is an optional gamification feature built into the system. If it is turned on, your kid will be able to unlock virtual rewards such as special badges based on their progress. 

 

The dashboard available on your smartphone is a great tool to track progress and provide positive reinforcement. 

 

Octopus is mainly for kids aged 3 to 8 years old, but the sleek design is appealing even to older children (they can use Octopus as a task manager).
Octopus can also help the kids with special needs (AD/HD, ASD, Diabetes, Down Syndrome, or executive functioning issues). 

Children with special needs often require frequent prompting to complete tasks. Instead of getting in a shouting match, use Octopus as a tool for repeated prompting. Your child gets the prompts they need, parents retain their sanity, and the whole family is happier. Octopus can be used by parents in tandem with therapists, psychologists, and teachers to provide a reliable and comprehensive scheduling tool that is adept at maintaining consistency across settings.

 

 

 

Our mission is to reinvent how parents share time with their children: no more stress, no more power struggles, only precious moments spent focusing on what really matters: quality family moments.

 The power of routines

 

50 years of psychological research have proven that having routines in place in the family reduces the level of stress, prevents conflicts and it helps the kids to be more organized, focused, independent, cooperative.
 It makes it easier for them to assimilate good habits and it also teach them to be on schedule.

But to maintain routines it requires consistency and persistency.

Today’s fast-paced world presents many challenges because kids are exposed to a lot of distractions (TV, tablets, video games) and have more and more activities besides school. On the other hand, you, the parents, work a lot and even at home, it may be hard to disconnect from your job, your social life, etc. Consequently, spending quality time with your kids is harder, and it requires a lot of energy to teach them good habits.

Octopus is here to help you with that!

 

Even with more than 15 years of experience in the tech industry, building an electronic product is always a big challenge. Doing it from France or from the United-States is doable, but it takes more time, more resources and more money. We decided to apply to the world’s first and largest hardware accelerator HAX, which offers facilities in China and access to an incredible network of mentors and experts. We were selected from a large field of applicants!

HAX is in the heart of the “Silicon Valley for hardware” in Shenzhen, 40 minutes north of Hong-Kong.

 

 

One of the multiple upsides of being in Shenzhen, China, in a super equipped lab like the one of HAX is that we could produce several prototypes very fast. Making a hardware device is always a trade-off between user experience, technology and cost but we started with no limits. We didn’t want to be constrained. We wanted to explore all the possibilities that were making sense, and we wanted to test them fast.

 

 

 

 

We tested with a lot of parents and their kids. Then we realized that to reach out to more parents, we should bring schools on-board. And because we are citizen of the world, we decided to test on 3 continents!

 

During this testing phase, we discovered that our solution could tremendously help children born with disabilities like AD/HD (Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder), ASD (Autism Spectrum Disorder), Down Syndrome, A-type diabetes, executive function issues, etc. Having members of our families dealing with the daily challenges from some of these conditions, we were very deeply motivated to improve our product even more.

We also have created an important community on Facebook and we would like to take this opportunity to thank all the parents for their feedback, comments and encouragements.

 

In parallel of developments and prototyping, we conducted interviews with parents, teachers, and child specialists to define the feature set of the product. We wanted to be as efficient and simple as possible.


Watch the co-founder interview:

 

We received hundreds of encouragements and we can't thank our community enough for this. It has really boosted us.

 

 

 

The watch comes with a charging cable. An optional charging station can be purchased, which transforms into a nightlight when the watch is attached to it!

 

 

 

We are a team of passionate individuals with backgrounds in engineering, business, marketing, child development, product design, ...

 

Sam Hickmann
Sam is a proud father of 2 kids. He loves to create technology projects that transform people’s life. He’s an entrepreneur, an author, a husband and absolutely adore exploring new cultures.
 When he’s not working, he’s probably hacking some code with his son, drawing magical worlds with his daughter or travelling somewhere to spark his creativity.

Omar Alaouf
Omar is a Jack of all trades. Trained as a software engineer in France, he has a strong experience designing, building, maintaining and scaling systems and infrastructure serving millions of users in both France and the US.
When he is not at work, you might find him in the workshop tinkering and hacking. Omar has a passion for taking his ideas from designs to real world objects using traditional and modern prototyping and manufacturing techniques

 

 

Advisors

And because we don't know everything, we brought on board people who do!

 

HAX mentors & team

 

 

 

If you like what we're doing, share it on Facebook. It's a huge help for us.

 

 

REFUNDS
If you have any concerns about backing a project and think you may regret your purchase after selecting your perk, please be aware we are not in a position to offer a refund after the 10-day period offered by Indiegogo. The nature of crowdfunding projects, the discounted prices involved (which includes subsidised shipping in many cases) and the fees due to Indiegogo and payment services means we are unable to offer refunds ourselves without being left out of pocket ourselves.

Instead of getting in a shouting match, use Octopus as a tool for repeated prompting. Your child gets the prompts they need, parents retain their sanity, and the whole family is happier. Octopus can be used by parents in tandem with therapists, psychologists, and teachers to provide a reliable and comprehensive scheduling tool that is adept at maintaining consistency across settings.   Our mission is to reinvent how parents share time with their children: no more stress, no more power struggles, only precious moments spent focusing on what really matters: quality family moments. The power of routines 50 years of psychological research have proven that having routines in place in the family reduces the level of stress, prevents conflicts and it helps the kids to be more organized, focused, independent, cooperative. It makes it easier for them to assimilate good habits and it also teach them to be on schedule.But to maintain routines it requires consistency and persistency.Today’s fast-paced world presents many challenges because kids are exposed to a lot of distractions (TV, tablets, video games) and have more and more activities besides school. On the other hand, you, the parents, work a lot and even at home, it may be hard to disconnect from your job, your social life, etc. Consequently, spending quality time with your kids is harder, and it requires a lot of energy to teach them good habits.Octopus is here to help you with that! Even with more than 15 years of experience in the tech industry, building an electronic product is always a big challenge. Doing it from France or from the United-States is doable, but it takes more time, more resources and more money. We decided to apply to the world’s first and largest hardware accelerator HAX, which offers facilities in China and access to an incredible network of mentors and experts. We were selected from a large field of applicants!HAX is in the heart of the “Silicon Valley for hardware” in Shenzhen, 40 minutes north of Hong-Kong.  One of the multiple upsides of being in Shenzhen, China, in a super equipped lab like the one of HAX is that we could produce several prototypes very fast. Making a hardware device is always a trade-off between user experience, technology and cost but we started with no limits. We didn’t want to be constrained. We wanted to explore all the possibilities that were making sense, and we wanted to test them fast.    We tested with a lot of parents and their kids. Then we realized that to reach out to more parents, we should bring schools on-board. And because we are citizen of the world, we decided to test on 3 continents! During this testing phase, we discovered that our solution could tremendously help children born with disabilities like AD/HD (Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder), ASD (Autism Spectrum Disorder), Down Syndrome, A-type diabetes, executive function issues, etc. Having members of our families dealing with the daily challenges from some of these conditions, we were very deeply motivated to improve our product even more.We also have created an important community on Facebook and we would like to take this opportunity to thank all the parents for their feedback, comments and encouragements. In parallel of developments and prototyping, we conducted interviews with parents, teachers, and child specialists to define the feature set of the product. We wanted to be as efficient and simple as possible.Watch the co-founder interview: We received hundreds of encouragements and we can't thank our community enough for this. It has really boosted us.   The watch comes with a charging cable. An optional charging station can be purchased, which transforms into a nightlight when the watch is attached to it!   We are a team of passionate individuals with backgrounds in engineering, business, marketing, child development, product design, ...Sam & Omar, JOY co-founders Sam HickmannSam is a proud father of 2 kids. He loves to create technology projects that transform people’s life. He’s an entrepreneur, an author, a husband and absolutely adore exploring new cultures. When he’s not working, he’s probably hacking some code with his son, drawing magical worlds with his daughter or travelling somewhere to spark his creativity.Omar AlaoufOmar is a Jack of all trades. Trained as a software engineer in France, he has a strong experience designing, building, maintaining and scaling systems and infrastructure serving millions of users in both France and the US.When he is not at work, you might find him in the workshop tinkering and hacking. Omar has a passion for taking his ideas from designs to real world objects using traditional and modern prototyping and manufacturing techniquesLaurie Hickmann, Arthur Kenzo & Ludo Landry  AdvisorsAnd because we don't know everything, we brought on board people who do! HAX mentors & team   If you like what we're doing, share it on Facebook. It's a huge help for us.   REFUNDSIf you have any concerns about backing a project and think you may regret your purchase after selecting your perk, please be aware we are not in a position to offer a refund after the 10-day period offered by Indiegogo. The nature of crowdfunding projects, the discounted prices involved (which includes subsidised shipping in many cases) and the fees due to Indiegogo and payment services means we are unable to offer refunds ourselves without being left out of pocket ourselves.

story:
What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $2,500 - or more - which we will use to fund our first full round of inventory, tagging, packaging, and to finalize our website. Perks not only include our awesome T-shirts, but we've also got some sweet mugs, canvas totes, and a big hug the next time we see you! Let's face it, these days are rough! Doesn't it make it easier when you have your favorite Tee, mug, tote, and a big hug from someone who loves you?!

The Impact

Prodigal is nearly a year in its development. We have put our heart and soul, as well as a lot of sweat and tears into this company. We feel a calling to express ourselves through our designs. The opportunity to give back in the form of donating 25% of our profits to a charity fighting for the end of human trafficking is an added bonus for us. We hope you will see it the same way and join us in this cause.

Risks & Challenges

We will put all collected funds toward the improvement of our company whether we surpass our goal... or don't quite make it. We understand that giving money to a start-up company can be intimidating. We want to assure you that we are here to stay. We will fulfill all orders and we're even in the process of creating our second line of products!

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you contribute financially to our campaign, we would love for you to help us get the word out. Tell all your friends by using the Indiegogo share tools! And those hugs mentioned above... We've got one for you!

story:
FAZL

Wear the Change You Want to See in the World

We started Fazl because we fell in love with two orphanages in India. The dream was simple: support children born into desperate circumstances. But then we had an idea - what if we could do more? What if we not only supported the orphanages but gave ethical wages to the people who make our products? Good news! The dream became a reality. 

Every time you purchase Fazl you are helping to provide orphaned and destitute children in India with food, shelter, education, and clothing. What’s more, we give fair wages to artisans in need who handmake every item. We are committed to supporting vulnerable children in India and we donate 50% of our profits to orphanages. 

Currently, we give fair wages to over 200 artisans in need. We started with our amazing handmade socks and we still are primarily a sock company. However, we are trying to expand. Because of our commitment to the orphanages and to ethical employment we don’t have the same sort of capital as other companies to invest in new products. We want to grow our brand and launch our new Mizo bags. Your partnership will help us to expand our product line and create more fair-trade employment opportunities. This in turn helps us to continue to support the orphanages that we love and work alongside.

The Goal

Our goal is to raise $20,000. This would enable us to purchase Mizo fabric (all traditionally made on looms!) and give ethical wages to our artisans. The funds would allow us to go into full-scale production and continue building other Fazl initiatives. Every item created and sold helps provide for the orphanages. Thus giving life changing opportunities to women and children in need. When you support us you could get one of our beautiful new products; our signature socks have even landed us in the New York Post and Newsweek. 

The Impact

There is a crisis in India. Millions of people are trapped in devastating poverty, as of 2014, 58% of the total population were living on less than $3.10 per day. According to UNICEF there are 31 million orphans in India. Through Fazl we are able to help respond to both of these issues by giving dignified work opportunities to those in need and donating half our profits to orphanages. 

As a company we are completely committed to supporting orphaned and destitute children and empowering women while preserving traditional handmade products. We’ve actually been offered the use of machines that could blast out items much faster and at a cheaper rate. But that’s not what we’re about as a company.

Please support us today. Together we can build a better world.

Join the Movement! And please share, share, share!

We want YOU to get involved! 

​Tell the world about @fazlco on Instagram and Facebook today! Visit us at www.shopfazl.com

story:
OUR CAMPAIGN WAS SUCCESSFUL! PLEASE CLICK HERE TO GET THE LATEST UPDATES AT LALABU.COM.

 

We're raising funds to develop a new simple babywearing product.

 

At Lalabu, we believe you can change the world through babywearing.

Being worn creates safe, happy, thriving babies and it also creates confident, successful new parents.  Babywearing changes the world one flourishing family at a time.
 

We’re creating a new approach to babywearing.

We’re a small business with a big dream - to make babywearing simple and accessible for all parents.  Like our babywearing shirts, we have a vision for another new product with superior usability, comfort, and simplicity of use.  And we need to raise funds to put towards its design and development.
 

Back us to enable the next innovation in simple babywearing.

Your support will go directly towards the research and development of our next product. If you help us reach our campaign goal, we should be able to release it in early 2018!

WHAT WE'RE HOPING TO ACCOMPLISH

 

WATCH WHAT YOU GET AS A BACKER

As a backer, you will immediately be rewarded with your choice of our existing flagship babywearing shirts and much loved Lalabu Leggings.  They will ship as soon as our campaign ends.

Our Unique Perks

 

Join the Simple Babywearing Movement

The Many Benefits of Babywearing

The studies are clear - being worn is not only the safest place for babies to be, it is also incredibly beneficial to their development.  Being worn creates safe, happy, thriving babies.  It also enables confident, empowered new parents.  And the two together change the world one thriving family at a time.  Whether with a Lalabu Shirt, a wrap, a sling, or a structured carrier - we want everyone to babywear.

 

 

 

FAQs

Please leave a comment to ask a question.  Here are answers to the top questions we've already received:

When will we be able to choose what size and color we want? You will be able to select your size and style as soon as our campaign ends.

What sizes are offered? The Soothe Shirt and Leggings come in sizes XS-XXL. The Dad Shirt comes in sizes M-XXL. Please visit our complete sizing guide here.

What styles are available? You can see all of our current styles at shop.lalabu.com.

When will the perks ship?  We're confident that we will ship perks at the end of May immediately after our campaign ends.

How long can I use the Soothe Shirt and Dad Shirt pouch? The pouch is intended for newborns between 7 and 15 lbs.  For most babies that will be from birth up to 6 months. Moms can keep wearing their shirt as a nursing top the entire time they breastfeed.

Can I return or exchange a perk after the campaign? In the United States, size exchanges are free for up to 6 months after your perk ships. Products must still be in new condition to exchange. We cannot offer cash refunds after our campaign ends, but we can offer you a store credit if desired. We do not offer exchanges and returns on international shipments. 

 

What Sparked the Movement

It started in November of 2009.  We took a trip to Burkina Faso and experienced babywearing for the first time.  We didn’t know it at the time, but we had joined the babywearing movement.

We loved it, and we wanted to make it simple and accessible for all parents. So we leveraged our lives to make simple babywearing a reality.  It has been an adventure of ups and downs that we wouldn’t trade for anything. It began with 2 years of nights and weekends designing a babywearing solution that would be simple.

On September 10th, 2013... we shipped the first Soothe Shirt.  That day the simple babywearing movement began. Since then over 25,000 moms and dads have joined the movement by wearing their babies in a Soothe Shirt or Dad Shirt.

Parents enjoying their babies is what we’re all about.  It is why our driving purpose statement is “we work for new lives.”  Our company exists to make the lives of babies, parents and moms around the world better.  We do this in three ways:

  1. We literally craft products for new lives - babies
  2. We are driven to make the new phase of life, parenthood, a joy for mom and dad
  3. And we give 2% of all sales to help moms


About Lalabu
​Lalabu is leading the simple babywearing movement with its focus on everyday wear that promotes child and parent bonding. In contrast to traditional baby carriers and wraps, Lalabu offers parents the unique opportunity to spend quality time with their newborns through stylish babywearing shirts for mom and dad. No assembly required.

All Lalabu products are made in the USA and two percent of all Lalabu revenue is given to help moms through their For Moms Giving model. The company contributed nearly $30,000 in 2016. From its inception Lalabu has leveraged its “For Moms” funds to help moms pursue their dreams.

Connect with Lalabu on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter and learn more at lalabu.com.

We literally craft products for new lives - babies
We are driven to make the new phase of life, parenthood, a joy for mom and dad
And we give 2% of all sales to help moms

No assembly required.
All Lalabu products are made in the USA and two percent of all Lalabu revenue is given to help moms through their For Moms Giving model. The company contributed nearly $30,000 in 2016. From its inception Lalabu has leveraged its “For Moms” funds to help moms pursue their dreams.
Connect with Lalabu on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter and learn more at lalabu.com.

story:
Balancing work and life is never easy. Smartphones promised to help, but they've become almost too helpful. Smartphone notifications have proliferated to the point of almost being out of control. Apps, too, compete for your attention. Almost anything or anyone can use your phone to intrude on your time. The DOI SmartRing wirelessly connects to your SmartPhone and updates you on only the notifications you want, right at your fingertips.  

 

The DOI SmartRing cuts through the clutter, giving you newfound freedom over your connected life. You alone decide with whom and with what you want to connect. 

 

 

The DOI SmartRing's companion app for Android and iOS devices allows ultra fine-grained control of notifications to be displayed on the ring. Low energy Bluetooth 4.0 communications provides a stable connection between your phone and your DOI SmartRing.  

 

 

The ring lets you scroll through text at your own speed. Whoever your VIPs are, you’ll ensure you never miss another text, email, or phone call from them again!

 

Customize your ring to notify you only of a select few if you're crunching low on time. Expand your circle of contacts for when you don't mind being in touch with the world. The DOI SmartRing gives you back the most precious thing of all: time.  

Charging this ring is as easy as taking it off and putting it down. The DOI SmartRing allows you to stay wire-free, charging your ring via its charging station. Simply place your ring on top of the inductive wireless charging station, and let the ring top itself off. 

 

With you in mind, we created a ring to fit your hectic schedule. Whether you are confined to your cubicle at work, or a busy parent of three getting updates from your babysitter, the ring brings you everything you need, all with a flick of a finger.

 

 

 

 

 

The DOI SmartRing lets you assign specific alerts to your key contacts, so you can know who's trying to reach you without looking at your phone.

 

 

 

 

Picture yourself in a meeting where answering a phone call would be impolite. No worries, you can customize your phone to alert you only when necessary, and read the alerts right from your ring, not even having to take out your phone. The DOI SmartRing helps you streamline your life . Even with your phone buried in a bag or purse, you can still be updated on all your incoming text messages, right from your fingertips.

 

 

Never lose your inner fashionista. This DOI SmartRing initially comes in beautiful midnight black and pearl white. Its sleek simple look blends in perfectly with your look, whether you're on Madison Avenue or Venice Beach.  

This DOI SmartRing is as rugged as it is sleek, engineered to withstand day-to-day wears and tears. It's shock and water resistant and its bright screen is readable even outdoors.

 

 

Without you, the production for this ring cannot happen. But with your support, together we can bring a new level of usefulness to wearable technology. Better yet, you'll be among the first to own this DOI SmartRing at a very special price!

Initially, the DOI SmartRing will ship with support Android® and IOS enabled devices (e.g iPhone®) with calls, text messages, email, and calendar notification. We are also working on popular social networking notifications such as Facebook® and Twitter®. We will continue to move further if you love the DOI SmartRing enough, where you can help us extend it to your favorite apps.

If you love the DOI SmartRing enough, help us extend it to your favorite apps. This ring is also designed to go with you wherever you go. This feather-light ring will become part of your daily life, and soon, you won’t be able to live without it!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As with any pioneering projects, come risks and challenges.  With this DOI SmartRing, came one of the hardest challenges yet: to create a ring small enough to be stylish and durable, but filled with innovative features. We strive to create the best for our customers, which also mean we require the best materials to make this ring.  The product had to be lightweight enough to wear, yet stylish enough where it is capable of hiding such high tech technology.  Through multiple failed attempts and a lot of testing on our end, we’re finally able to create one of the most innovative product yet.

SUPPLY CHAIN AND LOGISTICS

We have access to high-volume material suppliers that will help ensure we can ramp up production quickly. Nonetheless all consumer electronics projects encounter some risk when transitioning production from alpha to finished units. We believe we've minimized this risk for the DOI SmartRing by having constructed and tested prototypes and pre-alpha production units for adherence to design spec, reliability, and ability to be manufacturable in high volumes. We also believe that the know-how we've gained from our history of 15 years of high-volume manufacturing of accessories for mobile and other consumer devices will minimize this risk.

We have established relationships with multi-modal (land, sea, air)  shipping companies as well as with major consumer electronics distributors and do not consider shipping and distribution as special challenges, wherever you are located. We heard your comments and have been able to provide Free Shipping for US Domestic and flat-rate shipping for international shipments. Keep in mind that some countries may have custom restrictions which you may have to check.

INJECTION MOLDING AND PRINT HEADS

We have trusted long-term relationships with parts vendors for all the parts of the DOI SmartRing. Just to be safe, we will also secure additional backup vendors for key parts so we don't be depend on only one supplier.

ENGINEERING TEAM

We've assembled a team of the best and brightest designers and engineers, from experts in ASICS, Bluetooth®, PCB, and mobile OS to product usability, safety, and human engineering. We've tested our prototype and paths to Six Sigma standards. As part of this process we will be continuing with testing but we won't rest until we ensure the DOI SmartRing is flawless.

Disclaimer:

iPhone®, iPod®, iPad® are trademarks of Apple® Inc. Android®, Google Now® is a trademark of the Google Inc. We are not affiliated with Apple Inc or Google Inc. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

 

Q: How are the ring sizes going to work?

A: Our current plan is to create one or two ring sizes (e.g. small and large) and provide user-changeable interior pieces to adjust the ring's shank (similar concept as the Bluetooth ear pieces).  This way a perfect fit can be made. 

 

Q: How much will battery last with a full charge?  And how do you charge it?

A: With our current prototype, depending on usage, battery can last between 1-3 days.  DOI SmartRing can be charged using most QI wireless charging stations. 

 

Q: How can I choose the color of the ring that I want?

A: Once the project is funded and we are close to finalizing orders, you will be receiving a survey email where you can specify your preferred color.  To ensure a timely delivery, if you do not specify a color, the black DOI SmartRing will be shipped.

 

Q: Can it be used on iOs and Androids?

A: Yes. DOI SmartRing will be able to sync with iPhone and Android devices. 

 

Q: Are you able to ship internationally?

A: Yes. Please note that all international perks require an additional $5 shipping fee. 

 

Q: Will there be some type of app so that you can tailor the types of notifications you receive?

A: Yes. DOI SmartRing will connect with a free downloadable app that allows you to set your alerts as well as your VIP contacts.

Customize your ring to notify you only of a select few if you're crunching low on time. Expand your circle of contacts for when you don't mind being in touch with the world. The DOI SmartRing gives you back the most precious thing of all: time.  
Charging this ring is as easy as taking it off and putting it down. The DOI SmartRing allows you to stay wire-free, charging your ring via its charging station. Simply place your ring on top of the inductive wireless charging station, and let the ring top itself off. 
 
With you in mind, we created a ring to fit your hectic schedule. Whether you are confined to your cubicle at work, or a busy parent of three getting updates from your babysitter, the ring brings you everything you need, all with a flick of a finger. 
 
  
 
The DOI SmartRing lets you assign specific alerts to your key contacts, so you can know who's trying to reach you without looking at your phone.
 
 
 
 Picture yourself in a meeting where answering a phone call would be impolite. No worries, you can customize your phone to alert you only when necessary, and read the alerts right from your ring, not even having to take out your phone. The DOI SmartRing helps you streamline your life . Even with your phone buried in a bag or purse, you can still be updated on all your incoming text messages, right from your fingertips.
 
 Never lose your inner fashionista. This DOI SmartRing initially comes in beautiful midnight black and pearl white. Its sleek simple look blends in perfectly with your look, whether you're on Madison Avenue or Venice Beach.  
This DOI SmartRing is as rugged as it is sleek, engineered to withstand day-to-day wears and tears. It's shock and water resistant and its bright screen is readable even outdoors.
 

 

Without you, the production for this ring cannot happen. But with your support, together we can bring a new level of usefulness to wearable technology. Better yet, you'll be among the first to own this DOI SmartRing at a very special price!
Initially, the DOI SmartRing will ship with support Android® and IOS enabled devices (e.g iPhone®) with calls, text messages, email, and calendar notification. We are also working on popular social networking notifications such as Facebook® and Twitter®. We will continue to move further if you love the DOI SmartRing enough, where you can help us extend it to your favorite apps.
If you love the DOI SmartRing enough, help us extend it to your favorite apps. This ring is also designed to go with you wherever you go. This feather-light ring will become part of your daily life, and soon, you won’t be able to live without it!
 
 
 

 
 

 


 
 
As with any pioneering projects, come risks and challenges.  With this DOI SmartRing, came one of the hardest challenges yet: to create a ring small enough to be stylish and durable, but filled with innovative features. We strive to create the best for our customers, which also mean we require the best materials to make this ring.  The product had to be lightweight enough to wear, yet stylish enough where it is capable of hiding such high tech technology.  Through multiple failed attempts and a lot of testing on our end, we’re finally able to create one of the most innovative product yet.
SUPPLY CHAIN AND LOGISTICS
We have access to high-volume material suppliers that will help ensure we can ramp up production quickly. Nonetheless all consumer electronics projects encounter some risk when transitioning production from alpha to finished units. We believe we've minimized this risk for the DOI SmartRing by having constructed and tested prototypes and pre-alpha production units for adherence to design spec, reliability, and ability to be manufacturable in high volumes. We also believe that the know-how we've gained from our history of 15 years of high-volume manufacturing of accessories for mobile and other consumer devices will minimize this risk.
We have established relationships with multi-modal (land, sea, air)  shipping companies as well as with major consumer electronics distributors and do not consider shipping and distribution as special challenges, wherever you are located. We heard your comments and have been able to provide Free Shipping for US Domestic and flat-rate shipping for international shipments. Keep in mind that some countries may have custom restrictions which you may have to check.
INJECTION MOLDING AND PRINT HEADS
We have trusted long-term relationships with parts vendors for all the parts of the DOI SmartRing. Just to be safe, we will also secure additional backup vendors for key parts so we don't be depend on only one supplier.
ENGINEERING TEAM
We've assembled a team of the best and brightest designers and engineers, from experts in ASICS, Bluetooth®, PCB, and mobile OS to product usability, safety, and human engineering. We've tested our prototype and paths to Six Sigma standards. As part of this process we will be continuing with testing but we won't rest until we ensure the DOI SmartRing is flawless.
Disclaimer:
iPhone®, iPod®, iPad® are trademarks of Apple® Inc. Android®, Google Now® is a trademark of the Google Inc. We are not affiliated with Apple Inc or Google Inc. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
 
Q: How are the ring sizes going to work?A: Our current plan is to create one or two ring sizes (e.g. small and large) and provide user-changeable interior pieces to adjust the ring's shank (similar concept as the Bluetooth ear pieces).  This way a perfect fit can be made. 
 
Q: How much will battery last with a full charge?  And how do you charge it?
A: With our current prototype, depending on usage, battery can last between 1-3 days.  DOI SmartRing can be charged using most QI wireless charging stations. 
 
Q: How can I choose the color of the ring that I want?
A: Once the project is funded and we are close to finalizing orders, you will be receiving a survey email where you can specify your preferred color.  To ensure a timely delivery, if you do not specify a color, the black DOI SmartRing will be shipped.
 
Q: Can it be used on iOs and Androids?
A: Yes. DOI SmartRing will be able to sync with iPhone and Android devices. 
 
Q: Are you able to ship internationally?
A: Yes. Please note that all international perks require an additional $5 shipping fee. 
 
Q: Will there be some type of app so that you can tailor the types of notifications you receive?
A: Yes. DOI SmartRing will connect with a free downloadable app that allows you to set your alerts as well as your VIP contacts.

Project smart nfc ring closed.

Ask on the comment thread here or email smart.nfc.ring@gmail.com

Project smart nfc ring closed.

story:
I want to help make everyone more aware about drinking and it's dangers, but at the same time want it to be fun and easy to know if you have had to many drinks. I love to go out with my friends and drink and have a good time , but it should be easy to know when you have hit your limit. With the Party Time Watch you can set alerts to let you know what your BAC is and based on your input of body weight it will let you know the estimated time for you to reach a safe level for driving. I plan to integrate the Party Time Watch with "Android wear"  Google's wearable operating system so it will be able to get updates as the software progresses. I intend to have customizable backgrounds and alerts and alarms for your BAC levels and personal calendar. The watch will be designed with battery efficiency in mind. It will be an elegant and rugged time peace for all day wear and use in any environment, whether you are pool side or out on the town. If the goal is exceeded more sensors will be integrated into the design. Please help me make this idea a reality so we can all party on safely!

This project is important to me as  someone who has struggled with drinking responsible my whole life and having been convicted of a DWI I want to make everyone more aware  and a safer place for all. 

I would like to integrate solar and kinetic charging to help increase time between charges. As for alcohol detection I will be using sensors similar to police monitoring bracelets. I have contacted a fellow inventor that is working on a improved version not yet realeased. 

Patent Pending

story:
Short Summary

As the parent of a teenage son, I quickly recognized that wearing pants low was a style of the times that was going to endure the criticism aimed at it. More than just a form of teen rebellion, sagging as it's called, had become a style around the world. So rather than oppose it, I decided to give it the means to express itself with dignity. I saw the revealed underwear as a blank canvas and sought graphic imagery that would add flair and color. Working with young creative talents, I function as a curator of images that express the positive youth culture in ways that are consistent with the CYA ethos of bold and bright does it right.


What We Need & What You Get

The funds raised will go towards developing and producing next Summer's lines. In addition to creating fresh new boxer designs, our aim is to apply the CYA sensibility to boy shorts, sports bras, tank tops, boxer briefs and thermals so that more people can cover their assets in style, in a greater variety of ways.

Whether we reach or exceed our funding goal, every cent will go into designing, producing and promoting CYA.

The Impact

When you support CYA, you provide opportunities for young graphic artists to share their visions and you enable people to express their personal style in more attractive ways, having fun in an aesthetically pleasing way.

As the former head of a creative communications agency, I derive satisfaction from providing the structure and scope to creative people to express their talents -- whether by designing or wearing clothes in innovative ways. And for all those who feel they have to endure seeing exposed undershorts, I hope it will be a better experience to see beautiful, bright imagery printed on them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our positive message with your friends and associates so that they too can have the chance to appreciate the mission of CYA and show your pride.

Indiegogo makes it easy to pass it on with the share tools

story:
Do not miss the last chance to get the Haldor Abissi watch at a pre-order price.





Thanks to all our supporters for reaching the goal so easily. The campaign ended, but you can still pre-order the Abissi watch at a pre-order price, before the the delivery starts. The first stretch goal is unlocked and you will receive an extra NATO strap for free. Because of the big demand, we decided to add the Carbon fiber strap to the Abissi watch, although the campaign ended at 51.915USD. All the orders made after the end of the campaign will include the extra NATO and the Carbon fiber strap for free. 


Featured in:


 

         



The idea

The peculiarness of just high priced watches sparked in us - a group of watch professionals and enthusiasts from Slovenia - an interest. We asked ourselves:

is it possible to build a top grade Swiss Made dive watch at reasonable price?

Long story short, we found out that not only we can build a high quality certified product for the same prices as other brands, but we can even substantially lower the retail price of the timepiece. Although we had opportunities to develop our product under already established brand names, we took the rather bold decision to build a new brand from scratch. This would give us freedom in design, market positioning and overall brand recognition. 

The answer to the ‘’fairly priced’’ question took 4 years and considerable resources. But finally, in nov. 2015 the last pieces fell into place and we are proud to present - the Haldor Abissi.


Haldor is a Scandinavian name, derived from the Old Norse words 'hallr', which means 'rock', and 'Thor', the 'god of thunder' in Norse mythology.

Haldor Abissi 1000m

Haldor Abissi is an automatic dive watch capable of withstanding water pressure up to a depth of 1000m/3300ft. Equipped with a Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 automatic movement (adjusted in 5 positions to a Top Grade level), is without any doubt the most accurate dive watch in its class. By »top grade« we are referred to the accuracy of the movement. 


The Abissi on 6,7" (17cm) wrist.

Although the design is what most watch enthusiasts see first, it’s not where the process of making a timepiece starts. Before the size of the case, the shape of the hands, the thickness of the sapphire crystal,...is the actual centerpiece of the device: the movement. We could opt for a number of decent quality manufacturers, that would nicely fit into the expected price range of our product, but we didn’t want compromises. Therefore the choice was obvious. We choose the most commonly used automatic movement in Swiss brands like: Tudor, Tag Heuer, Breitling and many other. The ETA 2824-2 automatic movement.


What’s so special about Swiss watches?

Swiss watches are famed for their accuracy, superb craftsmanship and tradition. So when purchasing a Swiss Made watch you aren't just purchasing a time piece you are purchasing history. Something you will be proud of and want to pass down for generation to generation.

When it comes to Swiss watches, we all know how accurate they are. When we choose the ETA 2824-2 movement, known for its robustness and accuracy, we started comparing its accuracy with high-end luxury watches. The accuracy was very close, but we wanted more! So we asked ourselves:

Can we reach the COSC Chronometer accuracy?

COSC is, the Official Swiss Chronometer Testing Institute, which is the institute responsible for certifying the accuracy and precision of wristwatches in Switzerland. Those watches are know as the most accurate watches in the world. Making this tests would significantly increase the final price of our product, so we couldn‘t afford it. Before we started with the design we also had to buy a stock of ETA 2824-2 movements. There is a very limited quantity on the market and the retail price is too high. We had to find an other way.


The solution 

The solution was in our Swiss manufacturing company. As a professional company according to the strict rules of Switzerland watchmaking, they are able to supply us the Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 at price which is suitable for us.  We still had to make a full payment in advance and wait for a long delivery time. But we are here for a long run project so we did it!

Thanks to our Swiss partner we are able to adjust the already very accurate movement ETA 2824-2 to a Top Grade level. The 2824-2 is an automatic winding, twenty-five jewel movement, available in four grades: Standard, Elaborated (improved), Top and Chronometer.

To illustrate the differences in accuracy garnered by the successive grades, consider the following specifications:


Haldor Abissi, our first product, is accurate like a COSC Chronometer! This is possible when an ETA 2824-2 movement is adjusted in 5 positions to a Top Grade level.

Check out the results:

THE ACCURACY

You can see the accuracy of Haldor Abissi is about +4,5s/d with a maximum dialy variation of 7sec. The results are fascinating and we are proud of it. Each watch supplied by Haldor Watches will pass the quality control and water pressure tests. Every single watch will be adjusted to a top grade level, which will come with its technical data of accuracy shown like on photo. We guarantee out of the box accuracy of about +4s/d. 


Technical specification


  • CASE MATERIAL: 316L Stainless Steel marine grade
  • CASE DIAMETER: 45,5mm (excluding crown)
  • CASE HEIGHT: 15,5mm
  • CASE LENGTH: 57mm
  • LUG WIDTH: 24mm
  • CROWN DIAMETER: 7,5mm screwed down
  • SAPPHIRE CRYISTAL: 4mm thick, inside AR coated anti-scratch crystal
  • BEZEL: 120 click unidirectional bezel with Zirconia (ZrO2) ceramic inlay (engraved indexes)
  • AUTOMATIC HELIUM VALVE: at 9h position
  • SWISS SUPERLUMINOVA C3: on hands, dial and bezel 12h dot
  • WATER RESISTANCE: 1000m/3300ft, offically certified by Swiss test laboratory
  • MOVEMENT: Swiss Made ETA 2824-2 (Top Grade accuracy) (28.800 vibrations per hour, 25 Jewels)


THE DESIGN

Although there are many generic cases in the market, we wanted our watch to be unique. When the movement was chosen, the next step was to study the case design which will most perfectly fit the ETA 2824-2. 
Our watches are designed to be robust, durable, precise, functional and to satisfy the customer's own. 



WATER RESISTANCE

The Abissi is made to survive at extreme pressure conditions. Built in high-end materials like marine grade 316L stainless steel, zirconia ceramic bezel and ultra reisistant sapphire crystal, is capable of withstanding water pressure down to 1000m (3300feet).

Haldor Abissi is equipped with an automatic helium release valve. It’s purpose is to allow gases to escape from the watch. When the pressure outside the watch reaches levels that are significantly different from levels inside of the watch, the valve is activated, releasing the trapped helium atoms and lowering the pressure inside of the watch.

Reinforced caseback with 3D embossed logo made to survive extreme depths.

Screw down crown with embossed 3D logo.

Massive buckle with security buttons.

The case incorporates a Zirconia (ZrO2) ceramic bezel inlay water resistant up to depths of 1000m (3300ft). Zirconia is a silica-free, acid-resistant, polycrystalline ceramic that has no amorphous silica glass component. It is much harder than regular ceramic and is almost impossible to scratch it. 

To ensure the best visibility at night, we didn't use classic printing method on dial. When printing is not possible to apply enough powder. That's why the Super-LumiNova C3 powder is applied by hand! 



The watch passed all pressure and water resistance tests made in the Swiss lab.



Stretch Goals

We will add an extra 100% nylon Nato strap with engraved Haldor logo on buckle, if reached 40.000USD. 
High quality 316L buckle, lug size 24mm, lenght 280mm. Retail value of 20€.
Thank you for reaching the 40.000USD stretch goal. Now we will add an free extra NATO strap to the Haldor Abissi watch.



An extra high quality Carbon fiber strap will be added to the Abissi if reached 55.000USD. Massive 316L buckle with engraved Haldor logo, lug size 24mm, 5mm thick, hand orange stitching, lining 100% real leather. Reatail value 55€.
Because of the big demand, we decided to add the Carbon fiber strap to the Abissi watch, although the campaign ended at 51.915USD. 



Warranty and packing

You will receive the watch in a high quality PU leather box placed in a black inner carton box with Haldor logo. We will send you by email the PDF file with the testing results of the watch accuracy.  
The box will include: 
  • Haldor Abissi watch
  • Warranty card
  • Stretch goal items if reached the goals
The watch is covered by a 2 years guarantee against manufacturing or material defects. We will, within two years from date of purchase, repair or replace the movement of your watch free of charge if the movement proves to be defective in material or workmanship under normal use. The warranty does not cover damage arising from normal wear, scratches, accidents or misuse, or from any alteration, service or repair performed by any party other than Haldor Watches. 


SHIPPING

The watches will be shipped and insured by TNT Express Courier. It is scheduled for April 2016 (second part). Once shipped you will receive the tracking number to track your watch. The shipping fee is  fixed to all countries in the World. Do not forget - free shipping for first 20 backer!




Your support

The Abissi has been prototyped and fully tested. Now everything is set up to start the production. We already bought the movements, but there are still many costs to cover. We have to pay the initial order fee. Reaching the goal will help us to start the production. By pledging you are not just buying the watch, you are supporting our project and helping us to make it a reality. You have the opportunity to unlock special perks and to upgrade the final product. We are here for a long run. 
There are ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We need help from a community of friends who love watches and being a part of turning dreams into reality. Growing that community can be done for free. If you love what you've seen here, please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign..  Thank you! :)

The story

Our story begun in 2009 when we started searching for right partners to create our own watch brand. It took us 4 years to find and sign all agreements for cooperation with external companies and partners. In 2013 we formalised our commitment with the incorporation of the company and started working full time on the project.

We knew from the beginning that the level of expertise and professionality of our partners have to be top notch. Our demands were very high and the whole process was no walk in the park. We queried over a dozen of companies to identify the best fit for our project. They host the manufacturing for the most famous Swiss and German brands.

By »Swiss Made« we are not limited to the Swiss movement. We mean that all our products will have Swiss-Origin certificate. So our watches are manufactured in Switzerland according to the strict rules of Switzerland watchmaking, from the preliminary stages to the assembly of each component, quality and technical controls.

What to tell more? We made a Swiss Made automatic watch with a technical specification like high-end brands at price level interesting both for enthusists and more demanding customers. So we at Haldor Watches are extremely confident the Haldor Abiss will meet your needs. 


Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing an item is not an easy walk in the park. Especially when you want to make it different and better than others. That's why sometimes things go wrong. We didn't want you to risk when contributing, so we already set the basis and everything is prepared to start the production. There are no risks for you or any doubts about the product quality. Since the watches are exported from Switzerland to Slovenia, please be aware that there may be unexpected circumstances that may lead to late delivery. During the pre-order period we will keep you posted about the production process and delivery time.

High quality 316L buckle, lug size 24mm, lenght 280mm. Retail value of 20€.

Thank you for reaching the 40.000USD stretch goal. Now we will add an free extra NATO strap to the Haldor Abissi watch.







An extra high quality Carbon fiber strap will be added to the Abissi if reached 55.000USD. Massive 316L buckle with engraved Haldor logo, lug size 24mm, 5mm thick, hand orange stitching, lining 100% real leather. Reatail value 55€.
Because of the big demand, we decided to add the Carbon fiber strap to the Abissi watch, although the campaign ended at 51.915USD. 







Warranty and packing

You will receive the watch in a high quality PU leather box placed in a black inner carton box with Haldor logo. We will send you by email the PDF file with the testing results of the watch accuracy.  

The box will include: 



Haldor Abissi watch
Warranty card
Stretch goal items if reached the goals

The watch is covered by a 2 years guarantee against manufacturing or material defects. We will, within two years from date of purchase, repair or replace the movement of your watch free of charge if the movement proves to be defective in material or workmanship under normal use. The warranty does not cover damage arising from normal wear, scratches, accidents or misuse, or from any alteration, service or repair performed by any party other than Haldor Watches. 






SHIPPING


The watches will be shipped and insured by TNT Express Courier. It is scheduled for April 2016 (second part). Once shipped you will receive the tracking number to track your watch. The shipping fee is  fixed to all countries in the World. Do not forget - free shipping for first 20 backer!







Your support

The Abissi has been prototyped and fully tested. Now everything is set up to start the production. We already bought the movements, but there are still many costs to cover. We have to pay the initial order fee. Reaching the goal will help us to start the production. By pledging you are not just buying the watch, you are supporting our project and helping us to make it a reality. You have the opportunity to unlock special perks and to upgrade the final product. We are here for a long run. 


There are ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We need help from a community of friends who love watches and being a part of turning dreams into reality. Growing that community can be done for free. If you love what you've seen here, please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign..  Thank you! :)


The story

Our story begun
in 2009 when we started searching for right partners to create our own watch
brand. It took us 4 years to find and sign all agreements for cooperation with
external companies and partners. In 2013 we formalised our
commitment with the incorporation of the company and started working full time
on the project.
We knew from the beginning that the level of expertise and professionality of our partners have to be top notch. Our demands were very high and the whole process was no walk in the park. We queried over a dozen of companies to identify the best fit for our project. They host the manufacturing for the most famous Swiss and German brands.

By »Swiss Made« we are not
limited to the Swiss movement. We mean that all our products will have
Swiss-Origin certificate. So our watches are manufactured in Switzerland
according to the strict rules of Switzerland watchmaking, from the preliminary
stages to the assembly of each component, quality and technical controls. 
What to tell more? We made
a Swiss Made automatic watch with a technical specification like high-end
brands at price level interesting both for enthusists and more demanding
customers. So we at Haldor Watches are extremely confident the Haldor Abiss will meet your needs. 


Risks & ChallengesManufacturing an item is not an easy walk in the park. Especially when you want to make it different and better than others. That's why sometimes things go wrong. We didn't want you to risk when contributing, so we already set the basis and everything is prepared to start the production. There are no risks for you or any doubts about the product quality. Since the watches are exported from Switzerland to Slovenia, please be aware that there may be unexpected circumstances that may lead to late delivery. During the pre-order period we will keep you posted about the production process and delivery time.

story:
About this project 

 “Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication”, - Leonardo da Vinci.

Some things are absolute: time, nature, beauty, art. The natural stone Kub combines all of them. In millions of years nature created a beauty and we transformed it into a piece of art.
 

Kub is an elegant piece of art made by nature and shaped by human hands. It is a home décor accessory, a conversation starter, a bookend, a desk companion and simply a natural stone cube.
 


In addition to Kub we give our backers more reward choices adding square marble coasters for drinks made from Italian marble: Carrara white. 

  • Elegant desk companion for office workers 
  • Conversation starter for anyone 
  • Unique home décor accessory  
  • Stylish bookend for readers  

​


Did you know that the natural stone (either granite or marble) travels months all around the world till it is ready to be installed in your kitchen? And before that it takes months to take it out of the ground.

 

Did you know that only about 3% of all mined natural stone is utilized for kitchen countertops? What about the rest 97%? Sometimes it is  used for building materials and sometimes is sitting for years at the warehouses. In fact, natural stone manufacturers prefer to work only with large slabs 120"x70" therefore much smaller pieces may be used for something else. 

I have been exporting granite and marble  for the last 2 years. I saw firsthand how much stone is sitting on the back yards of the natural stone suppliers and waiting for its use.  That is why I decided to give a new life to those beautiful  pieces of marble and designed the Kub.



We cut the natural stone remnants with precise measurements using CNC machines. Then 6 sides (10 cm each) of the cube are glued to make it geometrically even. Then it comes a hard part, each angle of the cube is polished by hand with the diamond disk, which takes a little bit of hard work & time but only in this way Kub can look seamless! 

  • Completely natural marble
  • 6 sides polished
  • Seamless angles 
  • 10 cm x 10 cm x 10 cm  
  • Weight – 2 lbs 
  • Mocs scale hardness 3.5 ​



Carrara white – is a type of white or blue-grey marble of high quality, popular for use in sculpture and building decor. It is quarried in the city of Carrara located in the province of Massa and Carrara in the Lunigiana, the northernmost tip of modern-day Tuscany, Italy.Wikipedia

story:
Where are we headed

Kydra aims to be at the forefront of the innovative active wear. We are currently in contact with various research and development teams around the globe to attain the most cutting edge materials for our products. Concurrently, we have been garnering feedback from avid athletes on what they hope to see in Kydra's next line of apparel.

We need your support

Kydra’s Flex Shorts are sold below the margin of many major brands. The bulk of our cost is attributed to the material and workmanship that went into designing our shorts. Without your support, it would be impossible for us to fulfil our minimum order quantity (and sadly, our dreams). By backing this campaign, you not only help us realise our goal but also have gifted yourself the best pair of shorts you will ever own.

Every bit of your support goes a long way. By simply liking our Facebook page or tweeting about us, you are bringing us one step closer to taking on the sporting industry.

We’d also like to hear more from you. Tweet us, Instagram us, Facebook us (drop us a snail mail if you like!) – tell us what you would wish to see in our next line of urban athlete apparel. We’d like to make your dreams come true.

Risk and Challenges

Like all start-ups, the biggest challenge we face is getting the word out and convincing our backers that we are worth it. We have built a strong relationship with both our suppliers and manufacturers over the past year of refining our primary product and they are ready to begin the production process once we have achieved our funding goal.

FAQ

Q: How do I purchase or pledge for your apparel?

A: You can do so by selecting the Perks side bar (located on the right hand side, if you scroll up). Select the perk which you prefer and you will be brought to a page for you to fill in your details in order to complete the transaction.

Q: When do i select my colour and sizes as well as my shipping address?

A: When we achieve our campaign goals, we will send you a form to fill up all these information when the campaign ends. The form would include individual sizes and colour for each apparel.

Q: What colour selection are there? 

A: The default colour for the Flex shorts are (Black) while the Basic Kydra Shirts are (Grey), depending on our stretch goals you will be offered more colour both for the shorts and shirts.

Q: How long do I have to wait to receive my pledged rewards?

A: We will be providing you constant updates from manufacturing to shipping. The estimated time that you will be receiving the rewards would be by November. 

 

For more Questions, please direct them to:

Jimmy@mykydra.com - Public Relations

Ding@mykydra.com - Business Enquiry

story:
"Shorts" Summary

Relay@UWA is a Cancer Council Relay for Life event held at the University of Western Australia. The 2013 event will be held over the weekend of the 31st August and the 1st of September, starting 12pm on Saturday, ending 12pm on Sunday.

In recent years we've raised $100k, $110k and $187k for the Cancer Council in Western Australia and this year we hope to raise $200k.

Money raised for the Cancer Council goes to fantastic initiatives including research funding, patient support programs and so much more. Given that almost everyone will be touched by cancer in one way or another in their lifetime, this is a truly worthy cause.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to get merchandise for our event. As a charity group, we can't afford to spend money on merch at the risk that it will not sell, so we need to take pre-orders! We need to sell 50 pairs to keep the price low enough with our initial order.

You, dear reader, want to buy our merch! These shorts are fantastic quality microfibre, with both navy and royal blue options. They feature "Relay@UWA" down the left leg, and "RELAY" across the bum. You get a great new pair of shorts, and you'll be helping us promote a fantastic event!

So order a pair for yourself, and convince your friends to get some too! Help us get to the minimum pre-order number of 50!

*Update* If you're really awesome, and want a pair in each colour (or two pairs in the same colour!), just add $26 to the pledge option you chose (i.e. no need to pay for postage twice if you chose that option)!

Got queries? Email relay@guild.uwa.edu.au.

story:
** Simply select a perk - we will be in contact regarding which style you want!

Featured On:



*Photo credit to SolarAid and http://travelwithjan.blogspot.ca/

In order to make this dream of ours into a reality we need help from people like you to not only fund this campaign, but to also share it with friends and family. We are looking to raise $12,000 USD to get this project off the ground. 

In return for helping us fund our first production run, we are offering our amazing watches to you at a fraction of the final retail price.

Like us on Facebook and join our 5000 followers on Instagram by clicking the links at the bottom of the page!

We have identified three potential risks that sometimes arise in projects such as ours and have tackled them head on. They are the following:

1.  Poor quality products. We have seen campaigns that over-promise and under-deliver on quality, leaving backers disappointed. We didn’t want this to be the case with NOVUS so we spent almost eight months going through prototypes, searching for the perfect supplier. We even traveled to Hong Kong to visit the supplier’s facility to ensure quality standards are met.

2.  On time delivery.  We greatly appreciate the patience backers have and understand it can be disappointing when projects don’t deliver on time. We have worked with our suppliers to ensure everything is ready to go and have made an agreement with them to start production as soon as the campaign is funded, this way we don’t have to wait until the funds are released at the end of the campaign.

3.  Your pledge.  We have decided to go with a fixed funding campaign, meaning we will only receive your pledge if we raise the required amount to start the project, ensuring that we will be able to deliver on our promises no matter what.

story:
We eat organic food. We apply organic skincare. We use organic tampons ... it's time our underwear are organic too. The Annual Brief™ was born out of the belief that what we put on our body should be as healthy and clean as what we put in our body. Each Brief is made of 100% certified organic pima cotton - a naturally hypoallergenic, silky smooth fabric that's 100% free of toxins, synthetics and pesticides. And because studies show we should replace our everyday underwear once a year to stay healthy, we take the guesswork out of knowing when it's time to refresh your underwear drawer. Each pair comes with a unique D.O.B. to help keep track. Stick with us, and never worry about underwear shopping again.

THE PROBLEM

The dirty truth about 99% of underwear sold today: 

 

OUR SOLUTION

 

Take our Quick Fit Quiz™ to find briefs perfect for your bum >

 

The Annual Brief comes in 3 styles....

And 2 colors

 

MIX AND MATCH colors and styles within all pledge levels.

 

Each Annual Brief comes with a unique (and discreet) D.O.B. to help keep track when it may be time to swap. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

 

The Impact

Where Your Money Goes: When you support us by ordering The Annual Brief, or savings with our Annual Brief Bundles, not only will you get that reward but you'll also be helping to make this project a reality.  Your pledge will help pay for the fabric weaving and production in Peru, and make sure our factory in LA can be paid well for their hard work. In short, it will be greatly appreciated and, we hope, help launch a whole new category of healthy, organic pima cotton under-apparel.

 

SHIPPING: All pledges $50 and over qualify for free domestic shipping within the US, and all other domestic orders ship for $10. Shipping for orders shipped to Canada will be $15. Shipping for all other international orders will be $25. You should include this amount in your Kickstarter pledge by visiting our Kickstarter page and clicking "manage your pledge" button that sits next to our video. The average number of days for shipping may vary based upon origin and destination. Please also bare in mind any duty or taxes on import into your country will be your responsibility. Expedited shipping available - please contact us to arrange. 

RETURNS: We want you to love your Annual Brief! We understand mistakes with sizing will be made and we will do our best to exchange your  Briefs for the right size. Try on one Brief from your order and request an exchange for a different size or style for the rest, if needed. Keep all original protective liners and tags in tact. Because our margins are really tight, we will have to charge for the freight cost of any returns. 

 

How to Pre-Order

To pre-order The Annual Brief,  pick a reward that contains The Annual Brief. Once you have pledged, sit back and relax - we’ll be in touch to collect your style, color, size and shipping information.

Once you’ve pledged, we’ll send a warm welcoming to the KENT community! Throughout our campaign, we’ll be sharing updates with backers include photos and footage of the products as well as live video hangouts and Q&A with the founding team.

 

Risks & Challenges

This is KENT Woman's 3rd year in manufacturing organic underwear. We've got some great experience behind us on how to manufacture high-quality underwear and loungewear, and fulfill lots of orders for them. We've also always dealt with unexpected challenges in a way that leaves every last customer happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with transparency and care for you, our backers.

Forecasting Risk 
If all goes well during our funding campaign, we'll finish up with enough preorders for The Annual Brief. Of course we're trying our hardest to predict our future demand and plan accordingly, but it's far from an exact science.

Supply Chain Risk 
As KENT continues to evolve we're perfecting the art of managing our supply chain. We're so thrilled on how far we've developed our supply chain - fabric to factory. It's always safe to say that there is still some risk here. If a container shipment is delayed for 2 weeks in customs, for instance, our fulfillment schedule—even if padded—can start to slip.

Acts of God 
We're based in Los Angeles. That means we could have an earthquake. Or we could have a massive spur-of-the-moment beach party and parade involving brilliant costumes or public nudity. Whatever happens, we'll get through it together. We promise.

 

 

About KENT Woman

 

We started KENT in 2016 because there was no simple, style-driven organic underwear for women.  Since our launch, we've talked to hundreds of women about what they want in their underwear drawer - not just those ones for special occasions but those everyday briefs you reach for every morning. Learn more about us at www.kentwoman.com. 

 

THANK YOU + CONTACT 

Questions? Contact our team! Email us and we'll get back to you within 24 hours: info@kentwoman.com

 

Other Ways You Can Support

Have a friend that wear Briefs? Or eats organic food? Get them in on the know:
