story:
Designed in Croatia and engineered to explore the world’s uncharted places, Marnaut timepieces mark a return to the enduring style and quality of the great dive watches of the past.


Established in 2018 by career-creative and life-long horology enthusiast Mario Jutronic, Marnaut is an independent watch brand that prides itself on making high-performance, modern ocean timepieces inspired by mid-20th century design.

MARNAUT: For the Explorer
The challenge: Create a high-performance, original yet instantly classic dive watch that stands out in today’s crowded timepiece market. 

The result: A sharp, enduring watch design that fuses the golden age of ocean timepieces with modern-day high-performance.


Marnaut's offering – The Dark Surge 300m

Supporting this Kickstarter campaign means you will be among the few to own the Marnaut Dark Surge 300m, and at a significantly discounted rate. The production will be limited to 300pcs per style the first production year.


MARNAUT's Dark Surge 300m will come in three variations:

MDS300S (Silver Bezel) - Full silver – a brushed stainless steel 316L case with a silver bezel 
 MDS300T (Black Bezel) – Two-tone classic – a brushed stainless steel 316L case with black bezel 
 MDS300B (Full Black IP Plating) – All black – a brushed stainless steel 316L case, fully IP plated with a black bezel


Pride in craft 

Marnaut is about creating stylish and enduring limited-batch dive watches. Our timepieces work at depths of 300m and have the high-grade materials and craftsmanship to match. All our watches are engineered to meet higher specifications than most others and house one of the best automatic movements around, the Miyota 9015. 


Original yet classic

New watch brands are constantly surfacing, but Marnaut is not like the rest. We go beyond the simplicity and wearability of the others to bring a high-performance, modern-day classic to the dive-watch segment. We have gone to great lengths to source the best components and develop a one-of-a-kind timepiece that stands confidently alongside luxury brands, which cost far more.

300 Pieces per year

Marnaut is a small, independent watch brand that prides itself on creating a unique product. As a result, production of the Dark Surge 300m is capped at:  

MDS300T (Two-tone Black Bezel) 300pcs per year 
MDS300S (Silver Bezel) 300pcs per year 
MDS300B (Full Black IP Plated) 300pcs per year  

Capping supply means Marnaut timepieces hold their value and our customers have pride in ownership. 

Two-factor verification 

Our two-factor verification proves you are buying a watch that has a limited yearly supply. Each Marnaut Dark Surge 300m has a serial production number etched on the back of the case and a unique QR code is provided for verification via mobile app.


Scanning the QR code using the app CertiEye (on android or ios) will produce a serial number that matches the one stamped on the case. The app will not scan a copy of the authentication card, only the original will work. Any watch without the two-step verification or these matching serial numbers is not Marnaut.

 Here’s how our two-step verification works (video here):

They say the dial makes the watch. It is within Marnaut’s 34mm face where the heart and soul of our timepieces exist. 

The design of our one-of-a-kind enamel finished dial was guided by the texture and symmetry of the extraordinary and enduring sea urchin shell. There are more than 900 species of sea urchin spread across the length and breadth of the world’s oceans. One of longest living creatures on Earth, they inhabit and endure the darkest, most inhospitable and extreme corners of the ocean.



Markers 

Marnaut dials house 46 metal indexes, including circular, numbered and line markers. Each is carefully pinned through the dial and secured only millimetres apart, making the production process extremely complex. Such detail requires exact precision and skill, and if any element is just a fraction of a millimetre off, the entire dial is rendered useless.

 


Symmetry LumiNova 

Marnaut uses Super-LumiNova C3, the world's best lume from Switzerland. It is applied to all 46 metal indexes, the hands, as well as the bezel for the 300T and 300B, (C3 Super-LumiNova is not applied on the 300S bezel). The unique dial together with the Super-LumiNova makes them glow in captivating symmetry like no other watch on the market.


Case and crystal 

The Marnaut Dark Surge 300m is fitted with a scratch-proof domed shaped sapphire crystal and custom brushed case, which is designed to sit perfectly on the wrist. The gasket fitted screw-down back cover and double O-ring screw-down crown ensures water resistance to depths of 300 meters.

Bezel 

All Marnaut Dark Surge 300m watches are fitted with 120-click unidirectional rotating bezels and are made of anodized aluminium. 

 We have three variations: 

MDS300S - Silver anodized aluminium (no Super-LumiNova C3 applied on bezel) 
MDS300T - Black anodized aluminium 
MDS300B - Black anodized aluminium


Under the hood

The Marnaut Dark Surge 300m is powered by the industry leading automatic Miyota 9015 movement. The 24-jewel movement beats at 28,800bph, giving it a super smooth hand sweep. It has a 42-hour plus power reserve, hand winding and hacking.


Straps

Each Marnaut timepiece will come with two straps: One silicone and one Italian distressed leather. 

MDS300S - 1x silicone, 1x cream distressed Italian leather 
MDS300T - 1x silicone, 1x grey distressed Italian leather 
MDS300B - 1x silicone, 1x black distressed Italian leather Testing
Additional straps

If you would like to purchase additional straps please get in touch with us. 


Testing

Marnaut watches are tested to 30ATM (300 metres) in a water pressure chamber. Watch how it performed (video):

“Our goal was to create a timepiece with the same spirit and originality brought to life by the legends of a more honest time, like the Submariners, the Fifty Fathoms, the Seamaster 300s. I did not want to create a homage timepiece but something simple, honest and original.” – Mario Jutronic 


 

 

 

 

A BIT ABOUT ME & THE PROJECT
MARNAUT = Mare(sea) + Nautica. 

Having collected vintage watches (mainly divers) for the last 7 years, it’s needless to say that I have the watch bug. I love the stories, the designs, the ruggedness of tool watches and the fact that you can dress them up as well.

Throughout these 7 years, I’ve seen thousands of interesting, intriguing, and unique vintage diver watches and inevitably built a mental database of these beautiful designs.

As a career creative, I approached this project largely from a design standpoint wanting to challenge myself to create something that was not a homage piece but rather a timepiece that had the same feel as the legends of the past but could stand on its own as an original. That meant that I had to create a distinctive dial, which for me is the most vital part of the watch.



Being Croatian, I spent much of my childhood snorkeling on the Island of Brac in the Adriatic Sea looking for sea urchins and their shells. I remember always being captivated by their shape, their symmetry and their utter uniqueness. That texture and balance all came back to me and ultimately became the design inspiration for the MARNAUT Dark Surge 300M.

I hope people see it for its originality and are proud to add it to their collection.

BE SOCIAL
To see more pictures of the Dark Surge 300M in action and on the wrist head over to our instagram and be sure to follow to keep up to date with the latest.


THANK YOU
Your support is sincerely appreciated and would give us the needed boost to keep this endeavour moving forward. It would also enable us to develop future pieces like a chronostop/chronograph version. 

 

Risks and challenges
The watch industry is more specialised and fragmented than ever – meaning while the hands might be made in one factory, the dial could be manufactured on the other side of the world. 

The challenge is ensuring each component not only fits together, but also creates a superior product when combined. This takes time and patience, particularly when immense underwater pressure is added to the equation.

Although the initial groundwork of sourcing and organising top-quality components was a challenge, Marnaut has reached production stage through tireless testing and sampling, and is ready to hit the market.

story: Hi, my name is Elvin, from Singapore. I am a student studying in Ngee Ann Polytechnic. I love good haircuts, whether its me seeing one or having one myself. For that, my interest in the barbering industry has grown over the past two years. In Singapore, old school barbers are kinda forgotten, many youngsters now prefer going to hairstylists/salons. Because of that, I want to be part of bringing back old school barber. I feel that it is an art form and craftsmanship that needs to be appreciated. I want to see more people in world with good haircuts! I am here to seek help to raise money so that I can purchase a set of barber equipment (clipper, trimmer, razor, scissors).  I want to start as a freelance barber, I will start working with myself, learning and practicing with the tools i have. I will give haircuts to people around me. Basically, just do what i love!

Because of that, I want to be part of bringing back old school barber. I feel that it is an art form and craftsmanship that needs to be appreciated. I want to see more people in world with good haircuts! I am here to seek help to raise money so that I can purchase a set of barber equipment (clipper, trimmer, razor, scissors).  I want to start as a freelance barber, I will start working with myself, learning and practicing with the tools i have. I will give haircuts to people around me. Basically, just do what i love!

story:
Trust - Verb. Believe in the reliability, truth, ability, or strength of.

Kamae - "physical embodiment of your mental outlook and 'fighting spirit.'"

As we advance through our Taijutsu martial art, we learn many kamae.  Some have names - Ichimonji no Kamae, Jumonji no Kamae, etc.  Some do not.  Regardless, they are all supremely important to our studies and success.  Being in the right Kamae can mean the difference between success and loss in a fighting situation.

Sometimes, our training partners need to be reminded of that.  Let your shirt do the work for you.

story:
We've decided to cut out the middle-man, cancel our crowdfunding campaign and offer our product directly on our site! You can now purchase these on www.kandiinpublic.com

 

The concept is simple, yet impactful. Each of our bracelets has an empowering message. Wear the message that means the most to you to stay inspired everyday. When you meet someone who could use that message more, pay-it-forward by passing it on! Each bracelet comes with a unique serial ID where you can go online, and read and share stories of where your bracelet has been, and the lives it has touched as it travels from wrist to wrist!

 

Enter your bracelet's unique serial ID to add to its story. If you've already passed the bracelet on, you can see where it's been and how it's inspired others. Browse other pay-it-forward stories by word and read about how Kandi In Public bracelets are spreading hope and love all over the world!

 

 

“One day I'll pass this on and can't wait to see how it helps the next person!”

 

“Already got compliments on it and wearing this message everywhere just feels so darn good!”

 

“High quality materials, I'm proud to wear mine everyday.”

 

The Message: The modern world has become chaotic and extremely fast paced. We constantly have to compete and perform. Wear this message as a reminder to keep calm, weather the storm, and be at peace with your life. Then pass it on to someone who could use some tranquility.

The Color: Mint is the color of freshness, renewal, and youthful energy. Those who favor this color are hopeful and optimistic beings who strive for a balanced and peaceful lifestyle.

The Message: Passion is what drives us to do the things we love, even if that means leaving money on the table. Wear this message to be reminded to stay focused on pursuing your passion, because ultimately it is what makes you happiest. Then pass it on to someone to encourage them to follow their own passion.

The Color: Lavender is often used to show that something is special or unique. It is a color that symbolizes purity, devotion, and love. Those who favor lavender are said to be refined, elegant and graceful.

The Message: It’s easy to forget to appreciate the life you already have when we’re all constantly bombarded with lavish lifestyles and materialistic goods. Wear this message to remind yourself how lucky you are to have all the things you already have, and the people who are in your life. Then pass it on to someone who needs a reminder of how fortunate they really are.

The Color: The color white is the purest of colors and stands for innocence, spirituality, goodness, cleanliness, and humility. Those who identify with this color value sincerity, simplicity, and purity.

The Message: Life will always present situations that scare us. When there are unfamiliar or dangerous feats ahead, we can’t cower away in fear. Wear this message as a reminder that you are fearless and bold. Then pass it on to someone who needs to be brave about what lies ahead.

The Color: Grey is a solid and stable color that creates composure and balance between the extremes of black and white. Those who identify with the color grey are mature individuals who are dependable and practical.

The Message: In a world full of so much hate and violence, kindness is a virtue we need the most right now. One small act of kindness can have monumental and reverberating effects for those around us. Wear this message as a reminder to be kind to one another. Pass it on to someone you meet who is a kind and loving soul.

The Color: Baby blue is a color that represents health, healing, and understanding. Those who identify with this particular shade of blue are usually gentle souls that favor tranquility and do not like to make a big deal out of things or attract attention.

 

Personalize your bracelet by choosing your own custom word to wear. Select a word of up to 8 letters that means the most to you. Then select one of our five fantastic colors to pair it with for a stylish bracelet that's truly your own! See our custom perks below.

 

Measure the circumference of your wrist with measuring tape. If your measurement is below 6.5 inches, choose the small size. If your measurement is 6.5 inches or more, choose the large size.

As a general guideline, our small size is designed for average female wrists/smaller wrists and large size is designed for average male wrists/larger wrists.

Not sure? You can always exchange your bracelet for a proper size if it does not fit you.

story:
Much love to my Ireland friends. You are dominating the list of countrys checking out my movement :) Let me know if you're interested and I will ship packs to you :) That goes for the rest of my international friends to! email at PowerStacheClip@gmail.com

 


The Power-Stache is a professional sectioning clip for hairstylists. The first in a line of creatively designed tools that I am introducing to the beauty industry.

50% of our profits from Movember 2014 to Movember 2015, will go to men's health related causes. 

**Not sure what Movember is all about? Look at this convenient link to their webpage Movember.com. They have all kinds of good info related to Movember.**

November is not the only time of year we can help people affected by prostate cancer, testicular cancer, and other issues that affect men's physical and mental health.  These are things as a man have personally affected me or someone I know.  I want to give back to these important aspects of men's health.  The Power-Stache is about personal strength all year round.  It’s also a reminder that giving back feels good. That is whyI have pledged 50% of Power-Stache’s profits to men’s health related causes.  

The Power-Stache started out as a fun side project and something I wanted to use at work.  I mean, mustaches are cool!  Unfortunately I am not blessed with a full face of hair like some, so my Power-Stache can be my amazing facial hair! Then I asked myself, "Why can’t my lack of facial hair and sense of humor benefit more than just me?"   

What We Need

$27,000: total costs for the first batch of Power-Stache Clips

  • Production of 2 new molds for mass production {$5,000}
  • First 12,500 units {$18,150}
  • Shipping and importing {$2,500}
  • 5% to Indiegogo is worked in there {$1,350}

What you get

Early purchase Discount PERKS!

All Perks come with free shipping.  Just another “perk” of donating.

Perk 1 

You are early and you deserve special treatment!

Donate $7.00 and you will receive one 4-pack of Power-Stache professional clips. This is a huge savings off the $15 MSRP.

Pick your color: white, 1930’s mint, lavender, or pink. Only 1,000 sets of each color are available.

Perk 

Show your support in a big way - you can retail these bad boys! Donations of $50,000 receive 12,500 packs. Plus you get to specify your colors!

I'm sure you're wondering what happens if we miss our goal. You never get charged.  There is no risk to you. 


Lavender

1930's Mint

Pink

White


Other ways to help

Can’t donate?  No worries. Share this campaign by sending the link to your friends and family.  You can also post pictures of your Movember beard or mustache and share them with our link and #powerstacheclip #powerstache

Check the Power-Stache out at:

instagram @powerstacheclip

twitter @powerstacheclip

FaceBook www.facebook.com/PowerStacheClip

Tumbler www.powerstacheclip.tumblr.com

Who am I?

My name is Chris Deutschman, I was raised in Central NY. My passion is making people feel great and look beautiful, and in turn igniting happiness into their world. When you look good, you feel good. I have 14 years of experience as a professional cosmetology teacher and high-end stylist. Power-Stache is an extension of my passion to enhance the life of those in the world of beauty by delivering happiness and fun to the work place.

Thank you to all the people who have made this creation a reality. Friends, family, and my students, you have all been part of this.

Michael Giannattasio and Salt Makerspace. Who brought my idea to life with his amazing sculpting and manufacturing skills.

Jonathon Grutka from Upstate Venture Connect. He has been a mentor and a life line during the work. If you are in the upstate New York area and have a vision or idea Upstate Venture Connect is a fantastic resource. They are doing amazing work fostering start-ups.

Would Mario be as super without his ‘stache?  Mustaches make things better, faster, stronger, and more fun!  So add a mustache to a hair clip and you have an instant power upgrade to a Power-Stache.

instagram

Who am I?
My name is Chris
Deutschman, I was raised in Central NY. My
passion is making people feel great and look beautiful, and in turn igniting happiness into their world. When you look good, you feel good. I have 14
years of experience as a professional cosmetology teacher and high-end stylist.
Power-Stache is an extension of my passion to enhance the life of those in the
world of beauty by delivering happiness and fun to the work place.
Thank you
to all the people who have made this creation a reality. Friends, family, and
my students, you have all been part of this.
Michael
Giannattasio and Salt
Makerspace. Who brought my idea to life with his amazing sculpting
and manufacturing skills.
Jonathon
Grutka from Upstate Venture Connect. He
has been a mentor and a life line during the work. If you are in the upstate
New York area and have a vision or idea Upstate Venture Connect is a fantastic
resource. They are doing amazing work fostering start-ups.
Would Mario be as super without his ‘stache?  Mustaches make things better, faster, stronger, and more fun!  So add a mustache to a hair clip and you have an instant power upgrade to a Power-Stache.

story:
We've met some amazing people along the way, and are proud of the company we keep.

The company who hand-make our leather goods, in small table lots, has recently been audited to international standards, and is compliant in all requirements, including employees' age, wages and working conditions.

Below is quick film on the lovely people at Thien Tam Huong Center - a vocational training and job creation centre who make our dust bags. 

 

 

Each item is made from buttery, vegetable-tanned leather: tough, long-lasting and sensuous to touch, with soft suedette lining. They feel truly beautiful.

Airliner

 

________________

Boxy bowling

 

________________

Bowling bag

 

________________

The laptop tote

 

________________

Satchel/Messenger bag

 

________________

The Overnighter

 

________________

Backpack

 

________________

Laptop sleeve

This drama queen sleeve comes with red suedette lining with organic silk floss padding for extra protection. You won't get to see it as it's quilted into the lining but if you did it would look something like this:

Considered a 'waste' product from the silk clothing industry, it's soft and avoids the off-gassing and toxic production methods of foam. It comes from a family-run silk farm in a small village north of Ho Chi Minh City. 

The sleeve comes in two sizes - the small fits up to a 12" laptop and the large up to a 15" [based on Macs - see dimensions below]. It also includes a pocket on the back with a snap closure, for papers, small tablets, your phone...

Large: 37.5x26.5x2.5cm, 14.7x10.4x0.9"
Small: 31x20.5x2.5cm, 12.4x8x0.9"

________________

 

________________

Other

  • All bags are made with quality zippers and antiqued hardware.
  • Each item is lined in either grey or red suedette.
  • The internal pockets are trimmed with leather for added strength. Each item has one zippered internal pocket and two or three open pockets - an iPhone 6 will fit into one of the largest open pockets.
  • The laptop tote and satchel include an easy slide leather compartment with soft lining, for your laptop or tablet.  
  • Each item is hand-made with vegetable tanned leather which may lead to small variations and inconsistencies - part of the personality of your bag.
  • Vegetable tanned leather uses the most sustainable tanning process, is done by hand and doesn't off gas as it ages. It is bio-degradable and chromium free.
  • No chemical treatments are used to protect the leather so some care needs to be taken - care instructions can be found on our website here: stufforhumans.com.au/care.
  • Any import or customs duties are not included. 

For the style conscious, not the brand conscious.

 

Can't see the place called home in the shipping options? Contact us and we'll see what we can do. 

And a few pics since we finished our KS campaign - bags ready to be shipped out and the back of the swing tags.

I know! They're wrapped in plastic - but it's to keep the bags in pristine condition until they're popped into their dust bags. It's all LPDE, or recycyling symbol 4, plastic and one of the less toxic ones. It is recycled and reduces packing weight in transit.

story:
At Crown Wood Eyewear we strive to bring you the most unique, stylish, and high quality sunglasses out there. The high quality of our materials is what separates us from other sunglass companies. Our imported Italian acetate mixed with our eco friendly Chinese bamboo, along with our polarized lenses and high quality steel hinges, makes our sunglasses truly a work of art. 

No other sunglass company offers such high quality sunglasses at such a low price. Ray Ban and other premium sunglass companies over charge their sunglasses because they control the market price of high quality designer sunglasses. At Crown Wood Eyewear we want the world to know that the reign of overpriced high quality sunglasses is over. A new order has arrived, welcome to Crown Wood Eyewear. 

In The Beginning

It all began a few years ago when I couldn’t afford the overpriced designer sunglasses all my rich Los Angeles friends had. I was always stuck buying cheap street vendor sunglasses because it was the only way to fit in with the designer look without going broke. After some research, I found that it is near impossible to buy high quality sunglasses, the ones that don’t break or scratch the first time you sit on them, at an affordable price. I quickly came to the conclusion that this is outrageous!

Now, as a college student at the University of Arizona, I’ve decided to do something about it. Over the past year I've been working on a way to bring you high quality sunglasses at an affordable price. I decided to create a premium sunglass brand without the designer price tag. Every King has a Crown.

 

The Glasses!

Let me start off by saying that these sunglasses are perfect. I spent the past few months going over design specs so I could bring you the best possible fit and style. I won't wear uncomfortable sunglasses, and neither will you.

The King

The Hyrbid

 The Era 

The Dynasty

 

   

The Og

The Tortoise

The Pharaoh

 
 

Materials and Specs!

All materials used in these sunglasses are top of the line.

The Bamboo is imported from China and the acetate is imported from Italy. These are the highest quality materials on the market. We then had two unique molds made to start mass producing Crown Wood Eyewear! Check out the specs below!

Bamboo Specs

 

Acetate Specs

 

Dimensions:

Frame Width-140mm

Bridge-22mm

Lens Width-50mm

Lens Height- 44mm

Temple Length-145mm

Hinges

On the acetate glasses we feature a five barrel hinge and on the bamboo glasses we feature a Swiss steel spring hinge. All top of the line hinges.

Lenses

All lenses are polarized (4x) and scratch resistant to make sure your eyes are protected. Lenses are impact resistant approved by the FDA.

Micro Fiber Carrying Case

All glasses will come with one microfiber carrying case, to keep the glasses fresh.

Where you come in!

We need your help to raise enough money to successfully fund the cost of materials and production! Our main expense is materials; Crown Wood Eyewear uses high quality materials to ensure that our sunglasses are the best quality out there. Your contribution will start a movement against the overpriced cost of designer sunglasses. Other comparable high quality sunglasses sell for $160. At Crown Wood Eyewear we believe that price is way too high, we don't steal from our supporters! Your contribution goes directly into the creation of Crown Wood Eyewear, devoted to the production of high quality sunglasses.

Contributions and Perks!

When Crown Wood Eyewear gets funded, it will take us about 6 weeks to manufacture our first production line! We plan to have them shipped by late March. After our first production line we plan to develop and release more styles and color/wood combinations. There are many ways YOU can help contribute to Crown Wood Eywear! 

Attention Contributors:

In order to contribute to this campaign you need a PayPal account! No PayPal, no problem! Click on the CONTRIBUTE NOW link above Perks and follow the simple steps!

Wth a $45 Contribution you receive ONE pair of ALL ACETATE sunglasses (choose from The Og, The Hybrid, or The Tortoise) AND one Microfiber carrying case.

With a $55 Contribution you recieve ONE pair of MIXED ACETATE/BAMBOO sunglasses (choose from The Emperor, or The Pharaoh, The King) AND one Microfiber carrying case.

With a $65 Contribution you recieve ONE pair of ALL BAMBOO sunglasses (The Dynasty or The Era) AND one Microfiber carrying case.

With a $115 Contribution you will receive any TWO pairs of Crown Wood Eyewear (any style) and TWO Microfiber carrying cases.

With a $210 Contribution you will recieve any FOUR pairs of Crown Wood Eyewear (any style) AND FOUR Microfiber carrying cases.

With a $400 Contribution you will recieve the entire Crown Wood Eyewear Collection (or any combination of 8 pairs) AND EIGHT Microfiber carrying cases! This is for the ultimate supporter and this reward will also feature a personal shout out on our Facebook page!

Choosing your Sunglasses!

Once we get funded you will receive a questionaire asking you exactly which pair(s) you want! So make sure to remember the name of your favorite pairs!

Social Media!

Help spread the word by sharing/liking our page on Facebook!

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Crown-Wood-Eyewear/477318455636977

http://www.crownwoodeyewear.com

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ibc8CFWb6jQ

Follow us on Twitter and Instagram also!

Twitter: @crownwood2013

Instagram: crownwoodeyewear

 

 Thanks for your time!

This is Adam Trent of Crown Wood Eyewear,

Every King has a Crown

story:
What is Sum Gua?

Sum Gua /衫掛 / means clothes hanger in Malaysian Cantonese. It is a new revolution of clothes hanger (our life-partner product)! 

Why Sum Gua?

We strongly believe that clothes hangers are not just widely used for hanging our clothes in the wardrobe, but also can be re-designed to make it more user friendly for outdoor clothes drying on clotheslines as well. That's why Sum Gua was born!

Pegless Softouch

Pegless Softouch is a feature of holding your clothes fast and secure without using a single peg. Softouch means wrinkle free.

**The above image is a rendering, not a real product.

Windlocker*

**The above image is a rendering, not a real product.


How Windlocker* works?  

An animation shows a clothesline interacts with a Sum Gua's windlocker: 


The idea behind the Windlocker* is to utilise the characteristic of rubberized soft PVC clotheslines together with the flexible characteristic of PP material so for the Windlocker* to hold with the clothesline tightly from the winds blow.

Due to it requires material's flexible characteristic to proof this concept, it means that final confirmation of this idea will only be able to finalise during the initial off tool samples trial and design fine tuning. 

We are also planning for a backup solution with offering a Clothesline Hook design if the Windlocker* did not solve some of the incredible strong winds. It could be one of our stretch goal offers!


Twinhead ezylife 

We love to take challenge so we are here to take a risk of introducing our Sum Gua with another feature called Twinhead ezylife. We all know that there this design will create a little disadvantage with slight tilting when hanging your clothes. However, after a few weeks of debating we voted for "makes life easy" rather than " looks ok". With a 100% symmetrical design of Sum Gua, consumers can always hang their clothes in the same orientation and shorter time spending so can also collect them in the quickest way. No more tangling concern!

**The above image is a rendering, not a real product.

One Stop Solution

Sum Gua was created as one stop solution for our laundry job with only one off hanging action from drying the clothes on the clotheslines until hanging them in the wardrobe. Thanks to all of the above features!


Green Your Life - Cheer Your Life

We support green life so we 100% support drying clothes in the sun rather than in the dryer.

According to an online article, clothes dryers use an average of nearly 1,000 kilowatt hours of electricity annually. That's remarkable when you consider that a typical household in the United States consumes a total of about 11,000 kilowatt hours of electricity per year; your clothes dryer could be accounting for ten percent of your total electricity use! The majority of the electricity in the United States is generated by burning fossil fuels. The burning of fossil fuels is associated with many harmful environmental effects, such as global warming, air pollution, water and land pollution, and thermal pollution. A simple shirt, during all of its years of use, can send up to 9 pounds of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere![1]

That's the main reason why Sum Gua is here. It is here to simplify the traditional way of hard work or minimise use of clothes pegs so to make everyone enjoy drying clothes in the natural sunlight.



Size


**The above image is a rendering, not a real product.

Material



Colours


**The above image is a rendering, not a real product.

Thank You Souvenirs

BLACK CheeYourLife round collar T-Shirt

MEN:

**The above image is a rendering, not a real product.


LADIES:

**The above image is a rendering, not a real product.


WHITE CheeYourLife round collar T-Shirt

MEN:

**The above image is a rendering, not a real product.


LADIES:

Rewards





Prototype - Laser cut Acrylic

Purpose: Proof of the following concepts:

  • Pegless softouch
  • Twinhead ezylife




Timeline


Acknowledgement 

1. Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC BY 3.0 & Some icons designed by Freepik

References

1. Dry Your Clothes on a Clothesline

story:
WARLD stands for storytelling and endless opportunities. We are passionate, adventure-seeking individuals that love to pursue inspired lives. Lives that fall outside of the norm. We stand for the ones who want to push forward to be and do more while creating unforgettable moments.

Our mission is to start a movement and to foster a global community centered on creating life stories that are worth telling.

 

 

 

 

Inspired by the feeling we get whenever we set out to begin a new journey, this series was created with the belief that the next chapter of your story can take place anywhere you are.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Click to download more high-res photos!

Click to download more high-res photos!

Click to download more high-res photos!

Click to download more high-res photos!

 

We heard your feedback about the straps loud and clear from our previous line! This time, we went with a superior-class Genuine Italian Leather with quick release straps on ever watch. That means you can change the bands in a matter of seconds with absolutely no tools needed!

 

Swiss Ronda 763 movements included w/ EVERY watch!

 

We couldn't be more thankful for our early supporters helping us jump start this company, and because of it, we want to genuinely give back. For all original backers who backed our first project (The Apollo Series), you will receive a FREE World Watch if you pledge for this campaign.

 

Earlier this year, we had an incredibly successful campaign thanks to the monumental support of our backers. Throughout that fulfillment process, our team identified many issues with manufacturing and was able to implement fixes to better our overall production. With an entirely improved and streamlined distribution & supply chain for this second launch, we are happy to announce that you will receive your watch in just a few short months!

The initial funds will be used for constructing and testing the numerous molds required to manufacture our product. With many custom parts, we require a much more extensive production process compared to most others. Additionally, the funds received will be used to streamline our current supply chain process even further in order to ship you the product in a MUCH shorter time frame!

 

 

 

 

We are proud to partner with United Planet to offer scholarships that will fund volunteering opportunities and travel abroad for students worldwide. A percentage of all proceeds from the campaign will be donated directly to this program.

 

 

This program is for you if you want to immerse in a world outside your own experience. You want to do your part to effect real change in small, underserved communities. You want to form bonds that last a lifetime. You want to push yourself and others to experience something wildly new, and at the same time discover the richness of giving back and helping others.

And yeah, you want to see the world while you're doing it. Sound like you?

 

 

We wouldn't be here if it weren't for you guys. Simple as that. Our mission is to create a global community of wanderers, one story at a time. Use the hashtag #WARLDWIDE so we can curate yours!

 

 

For those interested in our influencer program, we are always looking for new and passionate content creators to join our global community. To the young hearts who beleive in our mission to travel beyond boundaries and inspire others, we would love to partner with you.

Tell us a little about your story. We'd love to hear it.

 

 

 

Or maybe you will be by the time this campaign ends. Or maybe you might be but you're not sure. We get it. That's the life of an adventurer. But don't worry. Wherever you are in the world at the time, we ship there. Just keep an eye out for our quick survey a few short weeks prior to shipping. Fill it out, get it back to us and we'll make sure your watch meets you where you are. 

 

Our story begins on the West Coast. California to be exact.

We were two best friends, fresh out of college, bright-eyed and busy-tailed when we decided that the next logical step - getting a safe and normal 9 to 5 - just wasn't what we truly wanted in our hearts (sorry mom and pops).

So we dropped everything and embarked on an entrepreneurial adventure and traveled the world. We wanted to create something that could really represent our lifestyle.

On one hand, we were both watch enthusiasts and had been collecting since forever. But we never really found the perfect watch.

We both also breathed adventure and were huge travelers. So we thought... why not find a way to combine the two?

 

Have a question? Shoot us a message at hello@warld.co!

 

 

 

 

Together, we can foster a global community and inspire the next wave of wanderers.

 

 

 

Click the button above to view all our high-res images!

 

For more information, please visit our website at www.warld.co!

#WARLDWIDE
story_txt: WARLD stands for storytelling and endless opportunities. We are passionate, adventure-seeking individuals that love to pursue inspired lives. Lives that fall outside of the norm. We stand for the ones who want to push forward to be and do more while creating unforgettable moments.Our mission is to start a movement and to foster a global community centered on creating life stories that are worth telling.    Inspired by the feeling we get whenever we set out to begin a new journey, this series was created with the belief that the next chapter of your story can take place anywhere you are.      Click to download more high-res photos!Click to download more high-res photos!Click to download more high-res photos!Click to download more high-res photos! We heard your feedback about the straps loud and clear from our previous line! This time, we went with a superior-class Genuine Italian Leather with quick release straps on ever watch. That means you can change the bands in a matter of seconds with absolutely no tools needed! Swiss Ronda 763 movements included w/ EVERY watch! We couldn't be more thankful for our early supporters helping us jump start this company, and because of it, we want to genuinely give back. For all original backers who backed our first project (The Apollo Series), you will receive a FREE World Watch if you pledge for this campaign. Earlier this year, we had an incredibly successful campaign thanks to the monumental support of our backers. Throughout that fulfillment process, our team identified many issues with manufacturing and was able to implement fixes to better our overall production. With an entirely improved and streamlined distribution & supply chain for this second launch, we are happy to announce that you will receive your watch in just a few short months!The initial funds will be used for constructing and testing the numerous molds required to manufacture our product. With many custom parts, we require a much more extensive production process compared to most others. Additionally, the funds received will be used to streamline our current supply chain process even further in order to ship you the product in a MUCH shorter time frame!    We are proud to partner with United Planet to offer scholarships that will fund volunteering opportunities and travel abroad for students worldwide. A percentage of all proceeds from the campaign will be donated directly to this program.  This program is for you if you want to immerse in a world outside your own experience. You want to do your part to effect real change in small, underserved communities. You want to form bonds that last a lifetime. You want to push yourself and others to experience something wildly new, and at the same time discover the richness of giving back and helping others.And yeah, you want to see the world while you're doing it. Sound like you?  We wouldn't be here if it weren't for you guys. Simple as that. Our mission is to create a global community of wanderers, one story at a time. Use the hashtag #WARLDWIDE so we can curate yours!  For those interested in our influencer program, we are always looking for new and passionate content creators to join our global community. To the young hearts who beleive in our mission to travel beyond boundaries and inspire others, we would love to partner with you.Tell us a little about your story. We'd love to hear it.   Or maybe you will be by the time this campaign ends. Or maybe you might be but you're not sure. We get it. That's the life of an adventurer. But don't worry. Wherever you are in the world at the time, we ship there. Just keep an eye out for our quick survey a few short weeks prior to shipping. story:
Xwallet

 

The Xwallet is a small credit sized wallet, with a beautiful leather outside skin and a leather pocket for your credit cards. The inside of the wallet holds another pocket in which you can store your paper notes. That's it.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The project is in its concept phase, which means that the 3D design has been made along with photo-realistic renderings and manufacturing planning already, but now we have to place a bigger initial order. So that's where we ask you for your help.

We set a 10-day test here on IndieGoGo and are offering you an opportunity to make an order on the Xwallet before it hits the shelfs at a discounted price just to cover our startup costs - which include the first batch manufacturing in Croatia, Europe, Packaging in Slovenia and delivering it to you.

 

Risks & Challenges

As the project is in its concept phase and the possibility the wallet isn't interesting is open, there is also a possibility it won't be made if there is not enough interest in it and you will get your money back.

But if it is... Then we'll start right away with the further development, packaging development and ordering the first batch for you.

 

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word and share

story:
Aqvantis is available in four (4) different variations. You can choose among two different case colors (black PVD or silver) as well as two dial colors (Black or Blue).   

The Black PVD case, the Lugano, was inspired by the mysterious color of Lake Lugano in Switzerland, which has a maximum depth of 288 m/945 ft. The silver case, called the Geneva, was inspired by Lake Geneva, which is brighter at its bottom although it is deeper by 22m/75ft (max. depth 310 m/1020 ft).  

NAVIS Aqvantis is a custom-designed watch crafted with premium materials and high quality parts. Similar to most luxury watches, it is hand-assembled with watchmaking precision and delicacy. Take a look at each component:

NAVIS Aqvantis is available with two different movements. Pick your favorite -

Swiss SW200-1  

Swiss movements are strongly desired by watch lovers because of their accuracy. Due to its popularity, it is extremely difficult to source for a small start-up like NAVIS. We spent days and nights in search of a supplier who could provide our Aqvantis with an automatic Swiss heart. After a long search, we finally found one! The SW200-1 is one of the most popular automatic movements which can be easily found in many of high-end luxury Swiss watch brands. SW200-1 is characterized by its durability as well as longevity.  

Japanese NH35A  

The Japanese NH35A movement is a true workhorse that comes from a long line of venerated movements from one of the most respected watch manufacturers in the world. While some Japanese mechanical movements can be quite delicate, the NH35A is built to last. It has excellent power reserve and has proven itself over many years of ticking in watches around the world.

Our timepieces are manufactured in 316L stainless steel - the same material used to make ultra-resistant surgical equipment which never oxidizes. An exceptional smelting process makes it strong, while its low carbon content makes it particularly resistant to corrosion, especially from acids like these found in sea or ocean water as well as perspiration. 

One model with two case colors. The Black Lugano coating is created by physical vapor deposition (PVD), a vacuum coating technique in which metal is vaporized to a plasma of molecules. Alternatively, the Silver Geneva case is not covered with black PVD, exposing the beauty of brushed stainless steel.  

The case is equipped with 120-click bezel which allows to keep track of time with an accuracy of 30 seconds. The crown must be manually screwed down, which means that in order to adjust the date and/or time on our timepiece, you must first unscrew the crown before you can gently pull it out. This helps keep its water resistance up to 300 m/1000 ft.

Aqvantis is fitted with a high-grade sapphire crystal, the most resistant crystal there is. Sapphire is a naturally growing crystal and the second hardest matter on the Earth. It is so hard that only a diamond can scratch it. The end result is beautiful, but more importantly, unbreakable.

The dial of the Aqvantis consists of two layers (called a double-layer sandwich). The outer layer with cut-outs gives the numerals and indices distinctive shapes, revealing the luminous layer beneath. The luminous layer beneath features superior visibility in low light conditions. Additionally, our Superluminova is placed on all three hands. We choose the highest quality luminous materials that will last a lifetime.

NAVIS uses the finest leather and rubber available. We’ve tested our straps multiple times to make sure they can stand up to everything from heavy sweating, humidity, and extreme heat, to every type of friction. Our tough team of testers add traction and compression to ensure there are no cracks and no defects.  

To see all available straps, please scroll down to the straps section.

Our two basic straps - Black Leather and Honey Suede

Our unique customers deserve a special box. That’s the main reason why we decided to design the NAVIS wooden box. This neat packaging is crafted manually by local woodworkers and is made of two parts. While opening the box, you’ll notice that the top half is dedicated to holding the watch in place. Under the top half, you’ll find straps, warranty, tools and other accessories...all accompanied with the pleasant smell of wood.

Case diameter without a crown: 42mm  

Case diameter with a crown: 46mm  

Thickness: 14mm  

Lug to lug: 47mm  

Strap width: 22mm  

Weight: 112g (depending on the strap)  

Water Resistance: 300m/1000ft  

Crown: screw down  

Buckle: NAVIS premium buckle

3 years of warranty!

NAVIS watches’ warranty covers defects in material or manufacturing for a period of 36 months from the date of purchase. If the product is returned within the warranty period, we will repair or replace any faulty watches free of charge. 

The idea was born in Geneva, Switzerland in 2015. After over two years of research, designing, prototyping and testing we can proudly introduce our new watch. Designed in Switzerland and inspired by its nature.

Our company is registered in the UK and cooperates with Swiss designers, experts and factories. Our mission is to reduce administrative costs which increases efficiency, boosts productivity and more importantly brings you our watches at an affordable price.

NAVIS is a startup established by two watch enthusiasts who do not agree with the idea that high-quality watches have to be horribly expensive. That is the main reason why we decided to start producing the watches ourselves.  

We’re proud watch owners ourselves and know it’s so important to share our consumer’s point of view. By becoming watchmakers, we are aware that it’s not an easy task. We believe that our passion, engagement, hard work and dedication are crucial in creating an exceptional product which will meet the expectations of even the most demanding consumer. However, to set off on our journey to mass production we need your help. By supporting us, you will not only receive the watch, but lend a hand in building the NAVIS brand and the company’s future.

With your support, we can bring this unique product to life for so many watch lovers.

story:
The Dizmio Wallet...

For the Dizmio wallet we wanted to create a wallet that was incredibly small and yet allows the user to carry as much cash/ cards as they want.

The Dizmio wallet:

  • Has a slim, minimal, & functional design
  • Allows the user to carry cash & cards
  • Expands to be able to accommodate an insane amount of cards/ cash. We have tested it with up to 20 cards & it still had room for more!
  • Helps protects against RFID skimming theft (watch our video below)
  • Is very durable and lightweight

Dimensions

At its thinnest point the Dizmio wallet is only 2mm (0.079 inches) thick.

At the thickest point ( around the elastic strap) the Dizmio wallet is 6mm thick (0.24 inches).

The Design

We went through countless prototypes until we settled on a Design that we believe fits all of our goals. The Dizmio wallet has a unique shape with very specific and functional grooves. The shape of the Dizmio wallet provides a pleasant user experience.

The images that you see are of the Dizmio wallet that you will receive. All images show the final production model of the Dizmio wallet.

The Dizmio wallet is composed of two aluminum plates & one elastic strap.

Mix & Match aluminum plates

Display your personality through your Dizmio wallet. Create your own wallet by mixing different colored aluminum plates! 

* Choose any two aluminum plate colors you like!

The aluminum plate colors we are offering are Black, Clear, Blue, Orange, Red, & Green. 

With logo or without logo

There are two different pledges for the Dizmio wallet. 

  • Pledge With logo: In this pledge you will receive the Dizmio wallet with our laser etched logo that can be seen in the images. The laser etched logo also helps to provide a rough surface to keep the outside cards even more secure. 
  • Pledge with NO logo: This pledge option is for the pure minimalists. There is no logo on the wallet. 
 
 

The "V" Shape

As you can see from the image above, when the Dizmio wallet opens it forms a "V" shape. The "V" shape helps keep the cards from falling out the bottom and it also helps push the cards up to make them easier to grab & sort through.

Quick Card Organizer

By placing your index finger at the top of the wallet & thumb at the bottom of the wallet, you can quickly organize/ straighten your cards located inside the plates.

Thumb Groove

Located on the upper left corner on both sides of the Dizmio wallet is a curved thumb groove. The thumb groove allows for easy removal of the outside credit card.

6061 Aircraft Grade Aluminum Plates

We chose aircraft grade aluminum 6061 for the Dizmio Wallet because it allowed us to create a wallet that was incredibly thin, light, and strong. The aluminum plate has grooves on the side which keeps the elastic strap in place.

Each Aluminum plate is 1mm thick (0.039 inch), and is very solid and extremely difficult to bend. The aluminum plates are anodized to protect against corrosion & finger oil.

Aluminum Production Steps:

The aluminum plates undergo an intensive manufacturing process. First the aluminum plates are laser cut, they are then tumbled which helps smooth the edges, the aluminum after this is sand blasted, anodized, and lastly laser etched with our logo.

We have chosen a manufacture who upholds very high standards. We promise that none of the aluminum plates shipped will have any scratches or defects.

Elastic Strap

The Dizmio wallet has (1) one inch elastic strap. The elastic strap is composed of high quality rubber and polyester, which makes it machine washable.

The elastic strap is off-centered towards the bottom of the wallet. By placing the elastic strap closer to the bottom it makes the wallet easier to pull open from the top.

Stop RFID Skimming Theft

The Dizmio Wallet is made from 6061 aircraft grade aluminum. This material is able to block & interfere with RFID signals. Our wallet helps protect you from RFID skimming theft.

Extra Images...

story:
From Japan, the birthplace of Ninja, we present you Shuriken tools! 

Although this project has been inspired by Ninja tools, it is not a weapon. It looks exactly like a Shuriken, but it's one of common multi-tools 

All the processes in the production take place nowhere, but in Japan . Shuriken tools comes in two different packages. 
Black owl — The high-end model that looks just like a real Shuriken and comes with 24 features. 
Snow crow — Reasonable, yet high quality model that comes with 20 features and safety-conscious design with round edges. We've designed and developed both models with very high quality.
Now, we only need your support for the production!


Perks





Trial production


Black owl

  1. Key ring hole


  2. Inch ruler


  3. Bu ruler


  4. Metric ruler


  5. Cutter


  6. Small screwdriver


  7. Lage screwdriver


  8. Ring gauge


  9. Inner diameter gauge


  10. Diameter gauge


  11. Saws


  12. Punch


  13. 14mm Wrench  (19/32")


  14. 13mm Wrench  (33/64")


  15. 12mm Wrench  (15/32")


  16. 10mm Wrench  (25/64")


  17.  9mm Wrench  (11/32")


  18.  8mm Wrench  (5/16")


  19.  7mm Wrench  (17/64")


  20.  6mm Wrench  (15/64")


  21.  5mm Wrench  (3/16")


  22.  4mm Wrench  (5/32")


  23. 1/4" Wrench  (6.35mm)


  24. Bottle opener

Snow crow

  1. Key ring hole
  2. Inch ruler
  3. Bu ruler
  4. Metric ruler
  5. screwdriver
  6. Ring gauge
  7. Inner diameter gauge
  8. Diameter gauge
  9. 14mm Wrench  (19/32")
  10. 13mm Wrench  (33/64")
  11. 12mm Wrench  (15/32")
  12. 10mm Wrench  (25/64")
  13.  9mm Wrench  (11/32")
  14.  8mm Wrench  (5/16")
  15.  7mm Wrench  (17/64")
  16.  6mm Wrench  (15/64")
  17.  5mm Wrench  (3/16")
  18.  4mm Wrench  (5/32")
  19. 1/4" Wrench  (6.35mm)
  20. Bottle opener

・Never throw it. It's dangerous! 
・Handle with care. It has lots of sharp edges. 
・Carrying it with you may violate the law in your local region. 
・You wouldn't be allowed to carry it with you on an airplane. Put it in your luggage. 
・We are not responsible for improper usage of the tools.
  Any trouble and accident by abuse of action is at your own risk.
・ If our project reaches its goal, we will develop another exciting Ninja tools.

1/4" Wrench  (6.35mm)

Bottle opener



・Never throw it. It's dangerous! ・Handle with care. It has lots of sharp edges. ・Carrying it with you may violate the law in your local region. ・You wouldn't be allowed to carry it with you on an airplane. Put it in your luggage. ・We are not responsible for improper usage of the tools.  Any trouble and accident by abuse of action is at your own risk.・ If our project reaches its goal, we will develop another exciting Ninja tools.

story:
Petros and Yassine are two young undergrads well known to be adrenaline addicts. Among the various extreme semester projects they had the opportunity to commit to - such as swimming through the Atlantic Ocean back and forth,  crossing the Alpes on a skateboard or adopting a baby tiger-  they chose the most dangerous one of all : Shaving a straight line down the middle of their heads ... nothing less. 

In a world of prejudice, shallowness and hatred against difference, they made the bold (or maybe "bald") choice to face society and its oppressive gaze, with the wind of freedom blowing through the middle of their heads. 

This project is also the occasion to prove that collective mobilization for a cause (in this case : Petros and Yassine's material well being) is still possible in individualistic societies. That is why the two students will finance with a part of their earnings one of the Campus' association : Horus Sciences Po,  which raises funds in order to help providing basic humanitarian services to Syrian refugee camps

If every student of the campus of Menton donates 3 euros before Monday the 23th of March, the 600 euros line will be reached, and everyone will get to see them with  a reversed mohawk, for a week. 

This would allow two souls to finance more initiatives and project and more generally to do what life invites us to do.

story:
LYENA

We are students from Peru we want to star to produce a kind of pijamas with fun and confortable design, this idea start because:

  • We recognize the wave of Asian fashion that is spreading throughout the world

  • the prices of this type of pajamas are very high

What We Need & What You Get

we need money to start a bigger production:

  • we need some machines
  • we need the material, cloth, buttons etc
  • we need to implement our workshop 

 Our reward for the people who support us will not be much but significant, we think about sending small packages with Peruvian sweets to the biggest investors, gift pajamas and all the people who help us show our progress by sending our thanks

The Impact

  • We are part of a group of young people who help children and older adults with limited resources bring gifts and a small Christmas party in some poor districts of Peru, and we want to produce pijamas as a gifts for them.
  • Also we produce these kind of pijamas for both men and women

Risks & Challenges

We do not have enough money to invest in a physical store, for this reason we will only handle the sale by online store and social networks

 

Other Ways You Can Help

please help us to know our project

story:
Product Information

Our Unisex T-Shirts are made out of microfiber (polyester) material. The printing done on the T-Shirts, are called sublimation printing. Sublimation printing is a technique that uses heat sensitive inks. The inks turn into gas under the influence of heat and combined with 100% polyester medium. Since ink becomes part of the structure of the material, the image on the fabric does not fade or crack- even after multiple washing. Sublimation printing provides us with a boost in our design quality in terms of colors and resolution - giving it that robust and natural look. 

Your satisfaction is our number 1 priority. Therefore, we had researched and contacted several printing companies and have decided to go with a local sublimation printing company in Malaysia. We chose this printing company for it's fantastic quality, fast turn-around and friendly services. 

Initial Design of the Bearded & Tattooed Hulk done by A Rokk Production.

 

Final outcome of the sublimation printing done for the Bearded Tattooed Hulk T-Shirt 

 

Our product chart and sizes are as listed below :

 

Our Story

My brother Ephrem Rokk and I (Ezra Rokk), grew up reading comic books and watching cartoons. We were heavily influenced by loads of comics from Marvel Comic Universe and DC Universe. As we grew into adults, we developed an interest in tattoos and beards as well. Thus combining our interests into our custom designing company called A Rokk Production. We are from an IT, Graphic Designing and Multimedia background both with a Bachelor's Degree. 

We started this campaign to help us achieve what we have dreamed of for a long time now, which is to start a custom design clothing company. We would like our custom designed T-Shirts to be used globally to all those who share the same interest with us. We also dreamed of one day, owning our own store for our custom design clothes. We hope to inspire the public to be creative and to work hard to achieve their dreams. 

Every help that we receive from any backers, would bring us one step closer in achieving our goals and dreams. We would truly appreciate every support we can get. Please feel free to contact us via email or through our Facebook and Instagram links below.

Our link to Facebook and Instagram:

https://www.facebook.com/ARokkProduction/

https://www.instagram.com/elrokk86/

 

The Rokk Brothers

Our Goals

We are currently seeking a minimum fund of $6000 to start our campaign. The duration of the campaign will be for 60 days. Once we have reached the minimum of $6000, we will then proceed with printing and shipping. Please note that we will choose a fixed campaign. Which means, if we do not reach our minimum goal, your pledges will be refunded.

When we reach our minimum funding goal, there will be multiple stretch goals which we will announce later. We will also provide sneak peaks of more T-Shirt designs for our upcoming campaigns. 

Please help us to achieve our goals and dreams. We will be extremely grateful for any support that we get throughout this Campaign.

story:
PREPARE FOR TAKE OFF

The Kingsbury 1983 XL Pilot is inspired by the iconic designs of WWII era pilot watches. This timepiece, with an impressive diameter of 46mm, offers a modern take on a vintage classic.

The watch, which is powered by a Miyota 21-jewel automatic movement, features a 24 hour sub-dial, date and hand winding option. As on the famous models of the past, the dial is decorated with bold, easy to read numerals and propeller-like hands which further underscores the heritage character of this timekeeper.

This is going to be a limited edition watch, we will produce no more than 200 units and then retire the design forever, so make sure to reserve yours now!

 

Our latest design draws its inspiration from aviation, to create a reimagined classic. The matte black face, 24 hour sub-dial and luminous markings draw on elements of some of the great pilot watches of the past. Yet the bold numerals, black leather strap (with deployment clasp), and contemporary detailing on the stainless steel case sets this timepiece firmly in the future.

 

 

Beginning in the late 30's and through WWII, a number of manufacturers started to produce large oversized watches to be supplied to Air Force pilots. The large size was functional, as the pilot's needed to be able to read their timepiece with just a quick glance during flights. With an imposing diameter of 46mm, the 1983 XL stays true to these vintage pilot's watches.  

To ensure a sturdy build, we used 316L stainless steel to forge the casing. With a total height of 12mm and a weight of 108 grams, it feels and looks great on the wrist. The case has a brushed finish with a high polish on the edges, which gives it a more sophisticated look.

Protecting the face of the watch, you'll find scratch resistant sapphire glass. Coupled with the stainless steel case and screw-down crown, this combination gives the 1983 XL a water resistance of 10ATM (100m).

 

In the center of the dial is a large triangle at the 12 o'clock position. This feature has been a mainstay since the pilot watch was first introduced. It allows pilots in the cockpit to instantly recognize the position of the hands.

The black dials of cockpit instruments with their contrasting, luminescent displays has been the inspiration for the design of pilot's watches for decades and the 1983 XL is no exception. The dial has been reduced to the bare essentials and made extremely easy to read. Also present on the dial is a date window at the 3 o'clock position and a 24-hour sub-dial to strengthen the military look.

 

In the pioneering days of aviation, pilots had to face the elements in unheated cockpits. The original Pilot's Watches had particularly large crowns that were easy to grip so that they could be set and wound by a pilot wearing thick gloves.

The 1983 XL Pilot is engineered with large screw-down crowns which are engraved with the number '83', to identify the model. In addition to controlling the date / time, the crown is also connected to a hand winding system that lets you charge the watch with just a few churns. The crown is unscrewed before being pulled out and rotated. This screw-down design offers the highest level protection against water and guarantees the wearer a superior water resistance.

 

The 1983 XL Pilot comes equipped with a genuine leather strap with a black finish and black stitching. The 22mm wide strap, which has a thickness of 3mm, is soft and comfortable to wear and easy to put on. Instead of a traditional buckle, we chose to pair the strap with a stainless steel, butterfly deployment clasp (with push buttons). The clasp has a polished finish and has been laser etched with the 'Kingsbury' logo.

There are a several advantages to using such a clasp: They're easy to put on and remove. They don't cause as much creasing and wear in the leather. They're stylish and add more flair to your timepiece. They're more secure as they lock in 2 positions rather than one.

 

For decades Pilot's Watches borrowed their design from the glowing cockpit instruments of aircraft. Thus, no pilot's watch would be complete without some sort of luminous features and the 1983 XL Pilot is no exception.  

For our design, we chose to add Super-Luminova BGW9 which is appears white under normal and glows blue during low light conditions (when charged). The striking luminescent hands make it easy to tell time even in the dark, a feature that lasts for hours. To further aide in reading the dial in the dark, we've added Super-Lume beads (also BGW9) on top of every hour marking, which is not only functional, but gives the watch a unique glowing design.

 

 

The caseback on the 1983 XL Pilot is constructed from 316L stainless steel and has a screw-down design allowing for the tightest fit and best protection against water. Each case has been engraved with the Make / Model as well as the indication that this watch is a limited release of only 200 units.

Featured prominently in the center of the caseback, is an engraved P-51 Mustang, an American fighter plane made famous during WWII.

 

It was a must that we use an automatic movement to power the 1983 XL Pilot. We wanted something robust and reliable, which is why we settled on the Miyota Calibre 8217. It's an upgrade from the popular 8215 series in both mechanics as well as decoration.

The 8217 is a Japanese movement manufactured by Citizen. It’s a great movement that provide accuracy, dependability, and longevity that is used by several watch makers worldwide. This is a 3-hand automatic date movement and has a 24-hour indicator at 9 o’clock position.

The 8217 employ a ball bearing unidirectional winding rotor that winds the mainspring which stores energy and transfers it through a series of gears and springs, regulating the release of energy to power the watch. The movement runs at 21,600 BPH or 6 beats per second and has about 40 hour power reserve. In addition, it has 21 Jewels to help keep the movement running efficiently.

 

Each watch comes in a high quality, luxury wooden box with a glossy black finish. Inside, the box is lined with a smooth crimson PU leather interior, which really shows off the timepiece. 

 

 

Kingsbury offers a limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of One (1) year after original purchase from Kingsbury Watch Co.

This means that if the components or materials of your watch have any issues, or if the watch isn’t functioning correctly, we’ll repair or replace it (at our discretion). We don't cover normal wear and tear, broken or damaged crystal, watch case, strap, bracelet and loss or theft. You will void your warranty if you open the caseback, or forget to screw down or push in the crown and expose the internal components of your watch to moisture.

Proof of purchase is required for all warranty claims and service requests, so hold onto your unique serial dog tag, this is the ID for your warranty. Kingsbury will not accept a warranty claim or repair request if a watch has evidence of excessive wear or misuse.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing the watches in a large scale. Since we're already passed the prototype phase and have all the sourcing completed, we don't anticipate any major setbacks.

We are fully capable of handling any issues that might arise as our team has previous experience sourcing and manufacturing products. This is also our second Kickstarter project, our first was a success and our backers told us time and again how well we had managed the project. We will be transparent with backers throughout the process, and will give frequent updates and answer any questions that arise.

We are confident in our manufacturing and our quality control and believe strongly that we'll once again be able to meet all of our shipping targets.

story:
Galvaine is a family owned/run company. We’ve crafted high quality shearling and leather jackets  for over 10 years. You’ll find our coats on the racks of designer clothing brands…for no less than $1,500 each. We’ve decided to eliminate the middleman. NOW, we are going on our own way and delivering coats direct to our clients. WE ARE PASSING ON THE SAVINGS TO YOU.  With that, you can receive exclusive offers and BIG discounts by ordering directly from us. Here’s the best part: If you back us, we’ll send you one of our genuine shearling jackets right to your doorstep. Better yet, every customer who supports us through this channel will become a lifetime VIP client. Enjoy a 20% discount on everything we sell, for life.   

                 For years, people have been held hostage by large brands that artificially spike their prices through the roof. With Galvaine, you’re always getting the highest quality, right from the source – at tremendous discount price. Back US  and get your very own Sherling Coat! Until Next Time, The Galvaine Team P.S. For a limited time, this special discount offer will be available ONLY for this page.

        You see, Sherling coats were originally made in World War 1 to protect soldiers from freezing cold temperatures. We’ve replicated this classic design with a combination of suede, genuine leather and wool.  

 Each jacket is water repellant, and built to last for at least 3 generations. In fact, this might be the last high quality coat you’ll ever need to buy. Unlike many brands who use cheap sheepskin for their coats (that would otherwise be thrown in a dumpster)…we only use Spanish Merino sheepskin for our coats, widely regarded as the highest quality on Earth. For under $500, you’ll never see another coat like it.  

 

Product details

· We use MERINO sheepskin form Spain in all our products. It is globally known highest quality.

· Each jacket has the greatest quality buckles and YKK zippers for durability.

· Designed stiffness will reward you by time with a natural patina and a jacket that is unique to you.

· These unique pieces will age beautifully with proper care, and get more supple through time

Design

· Premium shearling jackets where the best quality hides

· A design that Will Never Go Out of Style

· No unnecessary seams

· Designed for a comfort and lifetime use

Quality

· The highest quality is combined with the remarkable worksmanship by the Galvaine experienced artisans.

· An heirloom quality that can last 2-3 generations…





 

With the experience we accumulated by time, we deliver what we promise. Your reward will be sent to you within the committed time.

This is a crucial part, SIZING! You can check here our size guide. 

However, we will REACH OUT TO YOU TO CONFIRM THE MEASUREMENTS BEFORE WE START CRAFTING YOUR CUSTOM MADE JACKET.

 

A CHEST 1/2

B WAIST 1/2

C SLEEVE

D SHOULDER

E LENGTH

                  

                 Thank You For Supporting Galvaine! Every single contribution counts, no matter 

how big or small. We want to disrupt the fashion industry, removing the middleman and 

change the way people buy coats.   

 

The future of the project

Future Galvaine designs will send strong messages regarding environmental consciousness

through eco-friendly materials and packaging, and laid-back luxuriousness through an user

friendly online retail space

Galvaine will also support you to design your own dream jacket through an online platform. In

each customization, our artificial intelligence tool will also suggest you how you can combine

Galvaine products with other brands.

You will benefit from the valuable part of the Galvaine creativity without paying any premiumfee.

 

 ALL GALLERY

Galvaine will also support you to design your own dream jacket through an online platform. In
each customization, our artificial intelligence tool will also suggest you how you can combine
Galvaine products with other brands.
You will benefit from the valuable part of the Galvaine creativity without paying any premiumfee.  ALL GALLERY

story:
At the Dawn of Wearable Technology, There is Finally a Successor to the Rubber Band…

The Nunchuk is bringing order and mobility to the Oculus Rift virtual reality head mounted display. We are entering an era where wearables will be everywhere and the Nunchuk will keep cables secure with slack for mobility and breakaway protection. Check out these shots of the Nunchuk taming the Rift. You can back us now, or follow the link on our project page to back us as the drive continues!

My daughter doesn't like me taking pictures of her but she is still enjoying the Nunchuk!


The questions does not stop at "what do I do with my earbuds."

The Nunchuk is made to Run

We have more information, choices, and devices than ever before.

Raw Umber Nunchuk

We have never been more powerful.

We have never had more access.

There has also never been so much clutter.

Great design and technology increases access while decreasing clutter. It empowers us to pay attention to the things that matter, cutting away all of the remaining spam.

We have tried other devices. They are all flawed.

The biggest problem with other organizational devices is that they become part of the clutter they are meant to whip into order because they are:

  • Too Specific (difficult to remember to use and where you put it!)
  • Too Small (becomes part of the clutter at the bottom of your bag!)
  • Too disposable (after a few uses it breaks and becomes clutter)
  • Too low-end (does not work with your presentation)

The Nunchuk Tech Strap is Mindlessly Simple.

With strong magnets and a durable flexible premium vegan leather exterior, The Nunchuk can be used for easy and reliable access and organizing of a vast variety of wearable tech accessories, sensors, and components.

Increase Access, Decrease Clutter

Increase Access to your Technology: Keep your earbuds where they belong, in easy reach of your ears without being in the way.

Decreasing the Clutter

We have all been there, wires, cords, and headphones. From getting caught on someone’s bag while getting off the train to taking a few minutes to untangle your USB cable to use it for a few seconds.

Clutter Free Environment

Eliminate those messy corners that collect dust where tangled wires are stashed.

Simple:

No latches, straps, or buttons.

Just pull and place.

No more thinking. No more mental or physical clutter.

Strong and Reliable:

The Nunchuk is built for action.

Perfect for the gym, running, and other outdoor activities. Increase access while decreasing clutter, which means keeping cords out of your way and your technology where you want it (headphones near your ears).

If your headphones fall out, they don't hit the ground.

The Nunchuk magnets are strong enough to always stay in the position you put them in.

Strong enough to clip to a jacket collar or lapel. 

Perfect for running. Water resistant: don't worry about rain or sweat, and strong enough to keep your cords within reach while out of the way.

The Nunchuk is out of the way and reliable.

Light and Small

With a mass of less 0.6 oz (17 grams), about the weight of a pencil, The Nunchuk will never add to your load. You will not need to make choices about whether to use it or not, whether it is part of the clutter or eliminating the clutter.

Flexible and Versatile:

With a flexible modular and seamless design, The Nunchuk's shapes can be manipulated to fit any use you can imagine. As our wearable tech quickly evolves, we need a versatile basic accessory that can adjust to our changing needs.

As our wearable tech quickly evolves, we need a versatile basic accessory that can adjust to our changing needs.

Reusable: Durable and Weatherproof

The Nunchuks are made to be simply reusable. With their versatility, they are not a disposable accessory and can be used regularly and for as many uses as you can imagine.

We made them with active lifestyles in mind, so rest assured about using The Nunchuk in all climates and weather systems.

Premium Materials and Simple Aesthetic

Unlike many cord clips and similar accessories, The Nunchuks are made with a premium vegan leather material and simple streamlined design that can blend in with any style and dress code.


Nunchuks at Home

The Nunchuks can also be used for a simple solution to cleaning up the clutter at home. Many of us stash tangles of wires in out of sight crevices and corners. Use The Nunchuks to quickly whip these tangles into shape.

Your Imagination is the Limit!

Your Kung Fu is strong… but what other techniques do you have? While testing the prototypes we found that the Nunchuk does much more than just keep your wires and headphones.

A game my daughter invented playing with The Nunchuk and the fridge!

No animals were harmed in the design or presentation of The Nunchuk!

The Design Process

Designing a simple solution to a great problem is our holy grail. And after months of testing the prototypes we believe we have just that.

We tested many skins, finally finding one durable and flexible enough to wrap easily around most objects. We sampled many varieties of magnets until finding magnets that can withstand pull and tug from your wires and headphones and resist coming apart and slipping, even when clipped to the collar of a thick outer garment. After months of design, prototyping and testing, we have a product that is of the best built quality, with amazing performance.    


The Avid Union Team.

story:
Hello, everyone!

  Unfortunately, our team has decided to cancel our campaign. But it does not  mean this is end of our project.

These two weeks of taking a part on Indiegogo was a really good experience for our team. We have realized all the aspects of our product and campaign that need to be improved to bring the best quality.

  We are thankful for your support and hope that you will take a part in next time too.

  Do not miss the updates on our Facebook page. We promise to be back soon and in much better quality.

C&C team

*If you have funded our product, your money will be returned automatically

**We have e-mailed all the contributors
