story:
Hi! Thanks for Checking out our Campaign!

**Also Check Out the Gallery Section!!

                            

Our Vision

At Transcendent, our vision is to empower and enrich individuals of all walks of life in their journey of transcendence toward happiness and prosperity.

We seek to advocate the mastery and elevation of the Body, Mind, and Soul through focused discipline, ardent hard-work, audacious drive and the overcoming of adversity.  

Remember, we are infinite beings, interconnected with the universe. We have complete dominion over our lives and boundless potential for greatness.

At the moment, we seek to spread our vision through the embodiment of a clothing company, a simple and subtle method of delivery. In equal, we seek to be an accessible source of reliable and aesthetic apparel. 



Quality and Durability

A prominent focus of our brand is quality and durability. That is why we proposed that all our clothing be crafted from 100% Heavy Blend Cotton. Providing optimal resilience to wear and tear, Transcendent fabrics will last you through you toughest endeavors.

Moreover, often overlooked, cotton has an array of positive traits. On top of having a high tensile strength, cotton has great moisture control and also serves well as a thermal insulator. Cotton is also a very sustainable and natural fabric source.

Building upon the focus of durability and quality, all our apparel will be screen printed. This process entails a multi-station machine and a screen with our design stencil where ink flows through the open areas to create the image. Screen printing produces a crisp image that is resilient to wear and tear, aiding in the longevity of the clothing. 

Where does your Money go?

The funding collected through this campaign will contribute completely to the launching of our brand. This entails the purchase of various business licencing, initial production and printing, websites and other promotion platforms. 

Risks & Challenges

Currently, as we are still premature in the start-up, we will be facing many many challenges. But in all honestly, I know that with our passionate and diligent creators and developers we will find a way to overcome these tribulations. I have complete faith in this project, we will only continue to learn and grow through the progression of our brand

Spread the Word

If for whatever reason you cannot contribute, you can still help us by simply spreading the word. Ultimately, we are seeking to gather in people who believe and share the same vision as us. Together with your support, we can look great, cultivate wisdom and transcend our reality. 

FACEBOOK 

(Copy & Paste)

  • "Help Support TRANSCENDENT APPAREL- An Empowering, Quality, Aesthetic Clothing Line and help us meet our goal. http://bit.ly/1SsIJfq"

(Direct Share)

  • https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A//www.indiegogo.com/projects/transcendent-empowering-quality-aesthetic-


TWITTER

(Copy & Paste)

  • "Help Support TRANSCENDENT APPAREL- An Empowering, Quality, Aesthetic Clothing Line and help us meet our goal. @indiegogo http://bit.ly/1SsIJfq"  
(Direct Share)

  • https://twitter.com/home?status=Help%20Support%20TRANSCENDENT%20APPAREL-%20An%20Empowering,%20Quality,%20Aesthetic%20Clothing%20Line%20and%20help%20us%20meet%20our%20goal.

story:
FEATURED IN

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------




Our Story

Cargnello is a Canadian owned watch business, opened in 2015. The idea of this business began in 2014 when I wondered why quality watches were becoming harder and harder to find at reasonable prices. I want to bring quality watches to everyone at a price that won't break the bank. 

Often, when searching for a watch on a budget, various unique designs are available, like ours, but lack the quality of industry leading movements from Switzerland. I value quality over quantity, and my goal is to give you a watch you are proud of and last many years. I worked rigorously over the past two years to select the perfect suppliers.


Design inspiration was taken from the top luxury watch makers  in the world. Countless hours, days and months had passed until a final design was produced. Every small detail was scrutinized to make sure I will provide you a watch to be proud of. Fast forward to today and I am proud to present to you the Classic Collection.

I have passion for aviation and graduated with a Masters Degree in Aerospace Engineering. My extreme attention to details and love for mechanics helped me decide the perfect movement supplier. The Classic Collection will have industry leading ETA Swiss movements. 

I have had the privilege to work for amazing entrepreneurs and business leaders. They inspired me to take the leap of faith and put my heart into my watches. I believe in three major pillars that are the foundation to the business; 

  1. Quality
  2. Design 
  3. Customer Service

It's all about you!

Our logo was designed with aviation influence. It symbolizes our dedication to keep aiming higher and higher proving their are no limits to where our flight will take us. Join us on our adventure.


Why buy a Cargnello Watch?

I believe when you purchase a Cargnello Watch and wear them, you will feel the quality and your mood will instantly change for the positive. You will be buying a Swiss quality watch with outstanding materials and fine details. But you are not just buying the watch, you are buying into the brand. Cargnello Watches is a startup watch brand from Toronto, Canada. My goal is to have Cargnello Watches a well known brand that all will love. With your contribution to this campaign, Cargnello Watches will not only succeed in launching their first collection, but you will be helping the brand thrive and grow into new collections. We will become the brand which gives you a quality watch without breaking the bank. If you believe in me and the brand, contribute and watch Cargnello Watches soar to the top!


Classic Collection

Below are all the watches available for this campaign. With your support Cargnello will not only provide you with a quality timepiece at a great price but will support the development of future collections. To help raise the funds needed I am offering the Classic Collection watches at a discounted price for a LIMITED TIME and only for our Indiegogo Backers. We are also offering FREE SHIPPING on ALL Perks!

          Ocean

         Pilot         Royalty

         Speed

         Everyday

         Elegance

         Beach

         Forrest

         Purity

         Home



Features

316L Stainless Steel

All Cargnello Watches were machined from high strength 316L Stainless Steel. Ion plating was used to create the rose gold models.

Sapphire Crystal Glass

The sapphire crystal used on the Classic Collection is scratch resistant and flat giving it a more modern look. I chose flat over domed because you get less distortion with a flat glass than domed. This allows you to view the dial much easier when angled.

Sunburst Dial

Sunburst dials have beautifully textured radial lines applied to the dial face. Beyond the extra level of detail, they do funky things when exposed to different levels of light, making them more attractive and fun.

ETA Swiss Movement

When it came time to decide on the movement to use, I went with the industries highest standard. Our Classic Collection of watches are assembled with Swiss ETA F07.111 quartz movements.

Genuine Leather

All Classic Collection watches are fitted with genuine leather straps that have been made with fine detail.

Water Resistance

Our watches are water resistant to 5 ATM, which is equivalent to 50 m or 165 ft.

The Details

What makes a watch truly stand out? Details. The  logo is on the crown, back and leather strap. The watches are made with Swiss movements, sunburst dials and beautiful indexing. There was no compromise on materials showing you that I mean business and I am here to make you proud to own a Cargnello Watch.


Specifications

Shape: Round

Glass Material: Sapphire Crystal

Movement Caliber: ETA F07.111

Water Resistance: 5 ATM

Case Material: Stainless Steel

Dial Type: Index

Bracelet Material: Genuine Leather

Weight: 70 g

Case Size: 42 mm

Thickness: 9 mm


How will the Funds be used?

Cargnello Watches Campaign is a Fixed Funding Campaign. This means that if Cargnello Watches does not reach its goal of $35,000 everyone will receive their money back. Cargnello Watches will not be aiming for less than its goal, only its full amount. 

REMINDER: No extra funds will be gathered from shipping the products to you. Cargnello Watches is offering FREE SHIPPING to everyone!!!

Cargnello Watches will use the majority of funding to get the watches into the hands of our Indiegogo backers. The remaining inventory will be used sell online through our e-commerce website. The rest of the funds will be used to continue the business into new and exciting collections to offer our customers. Cargnello Watches will not stop at a Classic Collection, but is intending to develop a Chrono Collection, Luxury Collection and more. This collection is just the beginning of many to come. This is why Cargnello Watches needs your support now to keep this business growing. 100% of all funds will go back into the business.


Order Fulfillment

Once the campaign ends, our supplier is confident that the products will be in Cargnello hands within 90 days. If any delays do arise from our supplier or from delivery I will notify you immediately.


Challenges

The greatest challenge that Cargnello will face is getting our brand name out to the public and get as much exposure as possible. I have great support from family and friends who help spread the brand name. They are committed to tweet, post, share and pin Cargnello Watches to the top. If you purchase a watch from us, we would love to see it on social media with #cargnellowatches.

Contribute, follow us and share our campaign with your friends and family. 

THANK YOU for your support!

story:
Thank you in advance for checking out our Indiegogo page, we truly appreciate all the support! This is our second crowdfunding campaign for our customizable anchor bracelet due to high demand. Thank you for loving our project & product, like we do!
 

 

Introducing The World's First Customizable Anchor Bracelet 

As avid bracelet users our team sought out to create something unique. Our passion for accessories led us to create a product that could potentially disrupt an industry. Never before have it been this easy to match a stylish accessory with ANY outfit. We got frustrated having to buy dozen of bracelets and would still struggle to match our unique styles - it's both expensive and inconvenient. We have spent the past year working with leading manufacturers to come up with an affordable, stylish and functional bracelet that we believe would suit anyone. Men, women and kids 4+ (just switch to a bigger size band as they grow.)

 

Designing this first collection of bracelets, we made sure of THREE things:

  • Create a luxurious stylish anchor that look and feel exclusive.
  • To use the best possible quality to create a product that will stand the test of time 
  • To create a way to change colors and styles within seconds to fit any style or outfit.

 

 

Designing this product, our goal was to emphasize the user of today, a truly individual person who likes to express emotions through fashion. A great design that is timeless and unisex. 

 

 

 

 

Open the Ring and Switch Band in Seconds

Tired of spending money every time you need to match a bracelet with your outfit? Us too! Never again do you need to spend money on a new bracelet to match your new outfit, now you can just get a new band at the fraction of the cost. Once you have your stylish metal anchor you just have to get your favorite colored bands and switch to match the occasion. We will in the future introduce new pendants and colors, materials and more for our anchor.

 

'

More Than Just An Accessory

Fashion is getting more and more personal and today's digital landscape shows that users want to have their unique style and they also emphasize their values through their fashion! Our goal is to have the JVL bracelet become a symbol for your inner strengths and powers. Whoever you are, wherever you are from - you will always be reminded of your true powers. Sometimes we all need some encouragement.

 

 

Match and Switch with Your Loved Ones

You finally have a bracelet suitable for the whole family. Mix and match sizes, styles and colors. Have your kids grow with it, change color based on your current lifestyle and size as you change. The perfect gift for your beloved, reminding them of their inner strength.

 

The First 6 - Wear Your Power

Each band symbolizes a power, reminding it's wearer of their inner strengths. 

 

Fearless Black: "In times of struggle release the power of the warrior within.  Let this power guide and remind you that there's nothing to fear but fear itself. Be fearless."

Powerful Brown: "In the depths of nature you will find stability and strength. Release this deep power of integrity and patience.  Be strong and walk tall - Life is your creation and the power is in your hands."

Loving Red: "This divine power challenges all others and the world itself. Let this essential piece of jewelry linger around your wrist whilst constantly reminding you that love really is all you need."

Happy Pink: "Life is a play and all your friends are waiting for you. Wide eyes and big smiles, fun and games. This power releases the creativity of the artist within. Don't worry, be happy."

Humble White: "Celebrate your wins and learn from your losses. Let this power remind you to slow down and appreciate the things that truly matter Be gracious, be humble."

Wise Blue:  "Like the ocean, wisdom knows no time. It comes from the depths of the mind and soul. Invoke this potent power in times of growth and development. Be wise."

 

 

Sizing

 

Sizing Comparison | The anchor bracelet's sizing is similar to the fit of many popular bracelets and wrist sizes.

Size Exchanges | Getting the perfect fit can be difficult especially online. It’s our mission that you get the best possible fit with your Vessi's. Send us a message and we’ll be happy to help you out with your exchange!

Still not sure about your size? Here's how you can measure for the right fit.

Print the size guide below (original A4 size). Cut the ruler with a scissor and wrap it around your wrist. In between two sizes? Choose the larger one!

 

We Created 1x Perk for each Power/color of the band. After that you'll choose which Anchor and Size you want to complete your bracelet. Here is How To Order:

 

1. Click Back this Project Below or at the Top: 

Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment: 

Enter your payment information. Your payment will not be charged until the very end of this campaign (April 15th, 2018)

3. Size, Color & Shipping Information: 

Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your Size, Color choice and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign (April 15th, 2018).

 

Risks and Challenges

We have spent the last 16 months researching and developing our bracelet. It's an on-going process and our team will continue to work day and night to disrupt the fashion accessory industry. 
We have worked closely with our manufacturers to ensure that quality control is met at every step of the production line. To ensure your package to be delivered as smoothly as possible we've teamed up with multiple logistic partners. We understand that no campaign comes without any challenges. In any case, we promise to communicate with transparency and work around the clock to ensure your expectations are met.

story:
We are the HandKnitting Studio and these Animal Slippers are our bestsellers! Our mission is to make your home even more cozy and to give you wild animals you can tame ;-) Support us and adopt those cuties. You'll get exclusive handcrafted knitted designer slippers.

 

You'll help us

to make our portfolio

to knit another animals slippers

to rent a place for Show Room and Studio

to make our personal website

 

Shipping

We offer FREE shipping worldwide

All slippers will be sent in August 2016

Feel free to contact us

Annie - one of makers

story:
What is Lenzindex?

Lenzindex is an incredibly versatile and fully customizable indexing system for the rear cap of your precious lenses, with unique features: 

  • Any number at any size! Really! Try us...
  • Economy / Ecology. Just stick it on top of your cap.
  • Practicality. Grab the lens you want in the blink of an eye!
  • Durability. Made from one piece solid plastic.
  • Style. If you gonna do it, do it right! 

Lenzindex. Index your lenses with style!

You name it, we make it!

We can make indexes for any mount and any lens. But, as you can see below, the combinations of focal lengths and cap sizes are endless. So, we need a little help from you to organize our production process. 

Before you get your perks, take 1 minute and follow the link below to state your camera mount. This is the first step that will give us valuable feedback of the market share. 

The second step, for the details of your order, will be ready in a few days, Then, all of you will be notified and asked to fill it and it will be forwarded to our production team.


Help us build a database!




How much?

It costs "nothing" compared to the easiness it gives you in organizing and choosing quickly your invaluable lenses. You keep your old cap and you can reposition it in case you change mount or lens. 



Types of Lenzindex

Standard

No matter what mount you have, if you don't want any special indexing, standard version covers all your needs.

Custom

If you have, let's say, two equal lenses with different aperture or you want to specify the macro one, choose the Custom Design perk and give us the details in the order form.

Branded

Use Lenzindex to promote your shop or lens repair house and offer your clients a useful gift. Let us design it or send us a B/W vector file and we'll make it for you!

Feel free to contact us through indiegogo for any questions or requests.

Alternative

In some cases we might propose a different design. I.e. the Arri lenses have a very small place to stick the index. We thought of inverting the colors and make it negative, white circle with black engraved numbers. We'll get back to it when we receive the first orders and find out about the market share.


How to order...

Due to Indiegogo System Restrictions, Contributors cannot claim more than one perk during a contribution. And the only way to bypass this is to ask for your input again...

It's easy as pie, just follow the instructions below:




What are the perks?

(Keep in mind that one perk represents one order and not one piece)


Perk #1: Friendly Support

Even if you don't need it but you like the idea, you're more than welcome to contribute...  

Perk #2: Early Bird Standard

The first 50 "Standard index" orders will be sold at the special price of £4 per piece and you will enjoy FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. Later on, you'll be asked to fill the order form with the details. (Up to 10 pieces per order)

Perk #3: Early Bird Custom / Branded

The first 50 "Custom index" orders will be sold at the special price of £6 per piece and you will enjoy FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. You have to contact us via indiegogo and tell us exactly what you want us to do. Be it your logo, your site, extra info of the lens or any other special request. (Up to 10 pieces per order)

Perk #4: Standard

Get this perk if you want standard numbers without any additional info. Multiply the quantity you need by £6, add £2 for P&P and update the total. 

Perk #5: Custom / Branded

Get this perk if you want special info or your brand on the index. Multiply the quantity you need by £8, add £2 for P&P and update the total. In this case, though, you have to contact us via indiegogo and tell us exactly what you need.

Perk #6: Standard Bulk (100)

You own a shop or a lens repair house, like the idea of Lenzindex and want to sell it to your clients? Get 100 pieces with 30% discount. Through the Order Form, you can order indexes for the most popular lenses (you know better) or ask your clients what they want.

Perk #7: Custom / Branded Bulk (100)

You own a shop or a lens repair house and want to promote yourself with a smart gift? Get 100 pieces with 30% discount. Through the Order Form, you can order indexes for the most popular lenses or ask your clients what they want. Contact us to discuss the layout and your needs.

Perk #8: Standard Bulk (200)

You own a shop or a lens repair house and like the idea of helping your clients index their lenses? Get 200 pieces with 40% discount. Through the Order Form, you can order the most popular lenses or ask your clients what they want.

Perk #9: Custom / Branded Bulk (200)

You own a shop or a lens repair house and want to promote yourself with a smart gift? Get 200 pieces with 40% discount. Through the Order Form, you can order indexes for the most popular lenses or ask your clients what they want. Contact us to discuss the layout and your needs.


Example for 6 lenses, Early Bird, Standard.



Don't get lost...


Don't forget the Form...



Stretch Goal #1: £10,000 

If we raise £10,000, we'll provide FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE, for orders up to 10 pieces. 


Stretch Goal #2: £15,000 

If we hit £15,000, every one will get a small Lenzindex-like plate with his initials for the keys or the case or any use he can imagine... (PLUS FREE SHIPPING, of course...)


Who's talking about us?


Testimonials

We think the best way to check Lenzindex is to give it to photographers and ask them for their opinion. 

While the campaign is running, we'll post some videos...


Show me the money...

Your contributions will be used to cover expenses such as Advertising Costs, Web Support & Maintenance and, of course, Research and Development for the final product, the production itself and various fees and taxes.


FAQ

The available number in the Early Birds stand for pieces or orders?

As you cannot get multiple perks, every perk is an order of up to 10 indexes per order.

I want 6 indexes for Canon and I want to add my logo. What shall I do?

Get the "custom / branded" perk, multiply your lenses by £8 and add £2 for P&P, add your numbers in the form and contact us via indiegogo for the layout.

Why do I have to fill the form?

We are willing to fulfil every single demand. It is impossible to add as many perks as the combination of all lenses and cap sizes. So we need your feedback and data through the form that will help us categorise your orders and organise our production process.

I want 3 standard design and 1 custom. What perk do I pick?

Since you add the total by yourself, the perk doesn't really matter. In this case, pick whichever you like and count:

3x£6 + 1x£8 + £2 p&p = £28.



It's my first project on indiegogo (and crowd funding ever) and I hope I didn't forget anything! Also hope you found it interesting either for you or your friends. Share and spread the word...

I'm George Kouvaras and on behalf of the team, I thank you for your time!

Happy and Creative 2014!

story:
The modern MultiTool Inspired by the mobile lifestyle and life's daily adventures


Whether you roam cities or mountains, you often need more than a smartphone to get through the day. The real world requires real tools, but tools are not meant to share your pocket with a smartphone.  

We wanted a sleek, multi-functional too that could be conveniently carried with your smartphone to give you everything you need in one pocket to support your active lifestyle, so we made the ToolCase.


The ToolCase is the first case to feature a fully functional, detachable MultiTool. Our MultiTool is also the first to combine the functionality of a folding tool with the low profile of a card tool. This keeps the ToolCase sleek while still packing over 25 functions in an area slightly larger than a credit card. The MultiTool cleanly separates from the case to be used like a real tool and it snaps back on when the job is done. 

What We Need

We are asking $25 thousand to help us invest in tooling and to meet our manufacturer's minimum order quantity. 

What You Get

We are offering the ToolCase for the iPhone 5s/5 and 4s/4. We are also offering the MultiTool separately for anyone simply looking for the latest and most innovative multi-tool available. If we don't reach our goal, we will return your pledge so their is no risk of contributing without a reward.


Quality, Design, and Experience

We use quality materials (ballistic grade polycarbonate with soft-touch scratch resistant silicone overlay, stainless steel, and aircraft aluminum), precise engineering, and follow a minimalist Scandinavian design principle where form fits function. Every line and curve serves a purpose.

Members of our team have a designed gear for major companies including Victorinox and Oceanic Worldwide. We have finished our design and prototyping and have an established relationship with a quality manufacturer that is already producing our popular CargoCase, so we are ready to go.

Our Commitment

We are committed to making the highest quality products and will strive to deliver your perks on schedule. While there is always some risk of setbacks during the tooling and first run of manufacturing, we are confident that we will be able to ship our rewards on time or even ahead of schedule. We will not wait for our campaign period to end before starting the tooling process. To get a head start, we will begin as soon as we reach our goal. If we don't reach our goal, we will return your donation so there is no risk of making a pledge without a reward.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that's OK. If you like what we're doing and want to help, you can let your family, friends, and co-works about our campaign - and be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools. 

We also value your thoughts and opinions. Which smartphone model would you like us to design to? Is there a snap on gadget that would better suit your lifestyle? Any color preferences? Let us know.

If you take the time to spread the word or provide feedback we would love to add you to our Early Supporters list so you can receive special deals and insider info that others can't get. We look forward to hearing from you! 

All the best,

Paul, Robert and the entire KROME Team


Stay tuned for our next snap on gadget!

campaign_city: San Francisco Bay Area, United States

story:
WALTER is the creative vomit that has been bubbling in the bellies of my friends and I for a good deal of time. We love shoes! But you practically have to risk your life trying to find a descent looking pair of shoes in this day and age. How many times have you walked into a shoe store, looked around, scanning the shelves up and down until your eyes feel like their burning inside your skull, only to turn around and walk away hoping that somewhere in this world that perfect set of footwear is waiting for you to sweep them out of their cold cardboard box and run away with (in) them. Or maybe you found that pair of shoes but theres no way your paying a cajillion dollars for a pair of paper-thin slip-ons.

Well...we feel for ya. So much so, that we're working our dairy-airs off to provide you with a SOLUTION! WALTERs are just the beginning of what we hope will become the easiest and most effective way to shop for high quality, low priced footwear (what a concept!). Our goal is to bring you only the shoes you want. You should be trying to figure out which shoes NOT to buy! Well...help us...help you. Claim your kicks NOW! Or sooner if necassary! Three and a half minutes ago!

"Every day over 4,000 children are dying of water-related diseases such as cholera and typhoid that are EASILY preventable" (UNICEF)

About $24 Billion dollars is spent anually on shoes in the USA alone. With Compassion's new filter technology that much money would provide clean drinking water for over 1 billion families. We're not telling you to stop buying shoes. Gots' to have yo shoes! We've provided a way for you to look good and feel great knowing that while your walking, someone out there is drinking clean water. With 50% of your WALTER purchase we will be working to provide these innovative water filters to families around the world. Just one of Compassion's $78 filters provides clean water for an entire family for their whole lives! OUR GOAL is to purchase 100 filters. Your gonna buy shoes anyways. Everytime you put on your WALTER's you'll be reminded of the children, woman, and men around the world who are drinking healthy clean water because of you.

 

Compassion International Tanzania has been working since 1999 in its efforts to see children released from poverty in Jesus’ Name.  Currently Compassion International is working in 12 Tanzanian mainland regions. The total number of children supported reaches 64,558 in the Child Development Sponsorship Program and 1,113 mother and child units, and 1,050 children in the Child Survival Program.

Children in rural Tanzania have to walk long distance to gather water.  This water is often not safe to drink – giving children diseases like cholera and dysentery.  A Sawyer water filter is set up in five minutes, but removes all harmful bacteria that could put a child’s life at risk.  Compassion Tanzania has decided to take deliberate efforts to ensure every Compassion child and their household has access to safe and clean water.  Clean water and sanitation have profound bearing on health, human dignity and economic growth.

The overall objective of providing water filters is to reduce morbidity and mortality among children and babies related to water borne disease resulted from untreated drinking water.  The water filters will affect 103 implementing church partners in the Northern base of Tanzania. 

 

Click the link below to see more information on Compassion's water project as well as other wonderful things Compassion International is doing to impact the world.

Couldn't find any change in the couch!? Can't claim your kicks but you still want to contribute? MAKE SOME NOISE! Contact all your Twits, FBookers, Instabuds and...post like mad about the WALTERS we're selling and the water we're giving.

You people are sweet. Stay golden.

 

Joshua from WALTER SHOES
story_txt:
WALTER is the creative vomit that has been bubbling in the bellies of my friends and I for a good deal of time. We love shoes! But you practically have to risk your life trying to find a descent looking pair of shoes in this day and age. How many times have you walked into a shoe store, looked around, scanning the shelves up and down until your eyes feel like their burning inside your skull, only to turn around and walk away hoping that somewhere in this world that perfect set of footwear is waiting for you to sweep them out of their cold cardboard box and run away with (in) them. Or maybe you found that pair of shoes but theres no way your paying a cajillion dollars for a pair of paper-thin slip-ons.

story:
Our Blue Planet, Stained

8 Million Tons of Plastic End Up in Our Seas Each Year

Hundreds of thousands of animal species call the oceans their home. But their habitat is heavily polluted with tons of plastic waste. The amount increases by the hour. It is evident that this needs to change! The plastic needs to be taken out in a sustainable manner.

We Have to Make Use of the Trash

Consider Ocean Plastic a Commodity

Let's not just take the ocean trash out of the seas, but make great products from it. This needs to work without relying on donations. This needs to be done not just one time, but permanently. The product made from ocean plastic must be useful to many people, so we can upcycle as much ocean waste as possible.

Once in the Ocean, Now Fashion

The Upcycled Marine Plastic by SEAQUAL™

To make this happen, we have worked on a solution for over a year: Thanks to the SEAQUAL™ initiative we're able to develop a sports t-shirt entirely made from upcycled marine plastic! Since it is extremely soft, breathable, and quick to dry, with our high-quality tees, you are well-equipped for every kind of sport: fitness, running, workout, sailing, yoga, relaxing at the beach, or even snorkeling in warm waters.

How Do We Ensure that It's Exclusively Marine Plastic?

We Produce in the EU Only and Rely on Proven Partners

Fishermen take the plastic out of the sea. The upcycled marine plastic we use is exclusively collected in the Mediterranean Sea. This is organized by SEAQUAL™, they sort and upcycle the marine plastic in Spain. As a first step, the shredded garbage is turned into a polyester fiber, which is then processed in a licensed weaving mill. Subsequently, the fabric receives its unique and wear-resistant print. Then it is cut and sewn. Lastly, the shirts are wrapped in an eco-friendly way. All done, our sports t-shirt from upcycled marine plastic is ready for wearing!

Our Vision for the Future

There Are More Products We Can Make from Ocean Waste

We already have plans for rashguards, beanies, cool towels, multifunctional headbands, and swimming trunks up our sleeve. It is crucial we consider the ocean plastic a commodity from which new, stylish, and useful apparel and accessories can be made. Our goal is to give fishermen a permanent economic reason for getting plastic out of the ocean. And with the upcycling of ocean garbage, little by little, we are making our oceans cleaner.

So, Take a Deep Breath

These Are the Reasons to Support Our Campaign

✔ Get a really cool high-quality sports t-shirt
✔ Manufactured from 100% ocean trash
✔ Made in the EU, waste from the Mediterranean Sea
✔ Use it for any kind of indoor or outdoor sport or in the water
✔ Breathable, quick to dry, and very soft
✔ Different designs and colours for women and men in the common sizes
✔ Custom shirt production for dive shops, travel agencies etc. available
✔ Serves as a safeguard for the future livelihood of fishermen
✔ The freenea startup is run by passionate watersports enthusiasts
✔ FOR EVERY SINGLE SHIRT 7 PET-BOTTLES ARE TAKEN OUT OF THE SEA*

* Estimation based on average fabric consumption and weight of 0.5 litres PET bottles 

LET'S CREATE SOMETHING NEW.
IT STARTS HERE AND NOW.

 

All prices include 19% VAT, plus 5€ shipping within the European Union.
freenea is a registered trademark.

story:
Have you been looking for the perfect belt for a long time? 

I bet you have, haven’t you?! 

Have you always wanted something more from your belt, maybe a particular color, the right buckle to suit your clothes, the right color thread, the exact size you need, the desired width, the right number of holes, so that there is no need for you to find ways to make new ones? Maybe you wanted the leather to be soft and pleasant to the touch? And of course you want your belt to be light and to draw everyone’s attention.

I’m Donna Anaine and I will help you create your perfect belt.

All our belts are made of the softest and the best quality full grain Italian leather, hand sewn as per your desired choices.

The thread we use is 1mm thick and it is treated with beeswax so that dirt won’t stick to it and withstands the test of time. This particular thread gives each belt created by Donna Anaine a lifetime warranty.

Each belt created is handmade by one of our skilled workers. The hand sewing takes about 2 hours. In total, the approximate working time for each of our belts is 3 to 4 hours.

Other fashion brands guess what their customers want – we let YOU decide!

Choose from 7 possibilities to customize your dream leather belt:

  • The desired length, measured at waist: 24” to 50” (61cm to 127cm);
  • The desired leather color: chose from 3 colors: black, white, brown;
  • The desired width: 1” (2.54cm), 1.18” (3cm), 1.5” (3.8cm);
  • The desired thread color to be used for your belt: white, black, red, yellow;
  • The desired belt buckle from 3 models: nickel, anti brass and dull nickel;
  • The desired number of holes;
  • The desired belt edge: natural or dyed in white, black or brown;

Delivered to you at wholesale price!

If you purchased our belt at a retailer, you would pay $99. We’ll sell them directly to you with 50% discount for $49 belt + $15 shipping.


4 Thread Colors:

3 Buckle models and 6 belt edge finishes: 

Anything I can do to help?                                                                

After you support us, we would love if you helped spread the word. Email, Facebook - whatever you prefer!

THANK YOU!

Thank you so much for the support!

Risks and challenges

Our team is made of experienced workers and each member has been working in the leather goods manufacturing field for at least 9 years. We are accustomed to delivery deadlines and large production quantities.

All our belts are handmade and hand sewn and for this reason, in case of large orders we will need additional skilled workers to help us. Although, orders might be above our estimates this shall not delay in any way the delivery schedule.

In the worse case scenario, the Italian leather supply process could encounter delays due to reasons beyond our control, but this could only mean a customer delivery delay of 2-3 weeks.

story:
My crazy idea to piss off spammers

The problem with spam is that it is so easy to send a lot of it, and you only need a few fools to buy your stuff to make a buck. The economics are in the spammers favor. For less than $10 you can spam 40 million email addresses. The odds might only be one in a million, but that’s good enough for a spammer.

Over the past few decades we have been focusing on better filters, on understanding and in building smarter servers and routers to keep spam from ending up in your inbox. But the fact of the matter is that as we get smarter about filtering spam, spammers get better at reaching more of us, for less money. The economics are still in the spammers favor.

The Economics of Spam

Now imagine the following scenario: imagine if a spammer would send out 40 million emails, and instead of getting 40 orders,he or she would receive a million faulty orders. It isn’t economically viable to read through one million orders to find the 40 valid orders. Even with 4000 faulty orders I wonder if the numers are still attractive for spammers.

So why don’t we do this?

What would happen if a large portion of us would donate something like $5 a year for an international spam fighting team. I’ll bet we can find a million people around the world who want to pay $5 for the pleasure of knowing that a team of people are fighting back against spam. This team could do two things. First of all it could hire people, through Amazon’s mechanical turk program to place fake orders on spammed urls. As a member I could forward all or some of my spam and it would all be collected in a huge spam box at this organization. Random emails could be submitted to mechanical turk so that our little army of spam fighters can visit these websites and start placing fake orders. It would be hilarious, and effective.

There is more...

The second thing I would love to see is an automated script to keep spammers busy. I even got a domain name ready for it: procurement-office.com
Besides the obvious spam messages selling me penis enlargement pills or Viagra I also get the occasional Nigerian 419 scams or Asian offers for random stuff. I would love to be able to reply to these people with the following message:

“Hey thanks! That’s exactly what we were looking for. Unfortunately this is my last day here but my buddy Mike at procurement has just received a budget of 90,000 to start acquiring stuff and is eagerly awaiting your email. You can reach him at mike.johnsen@procurement-office.com”

I can totally imagine these spammers freaking out and thinking this is going to be the best day ever! They email ‘Mike’ and get an auto-reply. Something like this:

“Hi there, this is Mike at procurement. I’m off for the week visiting trade shows buying stuff but would love to talk to you about whatever you are selling. Please fill out th attached form and mail it back to me at your earliest convenience”

The attached PDF is of course 40 pages long and contains 600 forms that need to be filled out. Once they send that back there will be another step in the process. Maybe the form has been lost and a new form needs to be filled out. Maybe Mike will transfer the order to someone else up the chain (how about ‘Cindy’) that has an even bigger budget, and more form to fill out.

How much fun would it be?

The procurement-office.com would have to look good and would have a secret entrance somewhere for people who know what’s going on. I can see a dashboard there with how many people are going through the scripted responses and who got the farthest. It would be hilarious to see the threads of email from spammers and scammers replying to pre-formatted emails and complaining about their lost time but still continuing through the process.

And of course every minute they spend talking to ‘Mike’ is time they can’t spend spamming other people.

To wrap things up; these thing are both easy to do. Technically it isn’t very challenging. It is just a lot of work to set up.

How much money do we need?

Fortunately there is such a thing as crowdfunding. If spam still is an issue, and you dislike it enough, why not plegde a few dollars? If enough people dislike spam enough, we should be able to raise a substantial amount of money, hire an awesome team of developers and designers and start fighting back.

It is a simple plan, but simple plans often just work.

story:
Help Us Build Our Yurts and You Will Be the First to Stay in One!We need your help!! Highland Heights is a small, fully operational and sustainable farm in Indiana, USA just 20 minutes north of Indianapolis. It is time for us to expand and offer something brand new an- agritourism resort. Every guest we have had stay at the farm has said how peaceful it is here, and that it would make a great get-away. So, we are bringing to you the perfect vacation with a farm experience with all luxury amenities! Join our campaign and help us build our yurts by booking your next vacation.

Who Are We?

Evan and Autumn Overbay along with their 2 young children have owned and managed Highland Heights Farm, a small farm in Central Indiana since 2009. Despite our farm only sitting on 7 acres, we have always dreamed big! We are committed to our mission of acting locally by employing sustainable farming methods, including organically grown produce and livestock, supporting other local business, providing educational experiences and being environmentally sustainable with the aim of having a more global impact.


What Are We?

Currently, Highland Heights Farm is a small, working farm with a large outdoor event venue, located just 20 miles from Indianapolis. With a successful campaign, our aim is to make Highland Heights a sustainable agritoursim resort. The jewel in our crown will be our luxurious Bed & Breakfast made up of three luxury yurts giving our guests a unique, and enjoyable stay. Our guests can choose to relax under the big Indiana skies, whilst sitting on the deck of a one of our new yurts, with a book in one hand and glass of their favorite drink in the other. Or, for those with more energy, we will offer a unique insight into day-to-day running of a small farm, giving our guests the opportunity to get involved with farm life. We will also offer, high quality farm-to-table cuisine that the most discerning of travelers have come to expect. Our aim is to create a destination that our guests will visit again and again.

There is just one problem. In order to achieve our dream.

Let us paint a picture of what this campaign can achieve.

After a short, 20 mile drive from Indianapolis, you will spot our sign letting you know you have arrived at Highland Heights. Pulling into our drive, you will notice two beehives in which, our own bees produce delicious honey, a community garden nestled up against our 100 year old barn and brick silo. If you listen, you will hear sounds of our ducks and chickens, and our friendly barn cat, ‘Donkey’ will no doubt be running up to be petted. Our welcoming committee also includes our Border Collie farm dog, Zoe. As you walk through our beautiful gardens, you will arrive in our apple orchard. Tucked, just behind our orchard, you will see our three, luxury Yurts, overlooking neighboring Indiana cornfields. A peaceful and secluded escape, just waiting for you to arrive.

Our three, 24' yurts will include all the luxuries you would expect to find in any top class Bed and Breakfast. Hickory hardwood flooring, a wood stove to keep warm during those chilly evenings and 180 degrees of fully functioning glass windows providing uninterrupted views of our beautiful farm. Our yurts will feature a queen size bed, leather chairs, and a small kitchenette where you can make your favorite hot drink. Each yurt will feature its own, private deck, on which you can enjoy your favorite drink whilst watching the sun setting over the Indiana countryside. Every yurt will have their own private bathroom, complete with a walk in shower, toilet and sink. The finest plush towels, bathrobes and slippers are provided for your comfort.

Outside, just off the deck of the yurt, a campfire will be waiting, ready for cooking a cowboy dinner, or to simply make a s’more while you enjoy the evening.

On the other side of the apple orchard, there will be a 30' yurt with a deck encircling the entire yurt. This will be available for weddings and business conferences providing seating for up to 58 guests inside and more seating available on the deck. This will be the perfect setting for a country style wedding or business retreat. Eight, bar-height tables with whiskey barrel bases, will give a rustic feel whilst still providing plenty of comfort. For our business users, we will have full PA and Projection systems in place along with wifi connectivity.


Outside the 30' yurt will be an arbor for weddings, with space for plenty of seating. We will offer straw bales covered in burlap for that perfect country wedding setting.

Over near the horse pasture there will be a set of bleachers for our group and corporate team building sessions. In the pasture a 70' riding pen will be used for small and private EAL sessions.

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP?

Running a growing farm is expensive. We are fortunate that the farm is already a sustainable business, but that is only a small part of our mission. We want to share our farm with more people. We want to give others the chance to experience the lifestyle of sustainable, rural living. While we could go to the bank or an investor, we believe that people like you want to support projects like us. We want to avoid debt or giving away large portions of our business.

So, we are turning to the power of social media and crowdfunding. We are offering you the chance to play your part in the building of Highland Heights. We are not just asking for your money offering nothing in return. We know we have some great perks for you! Your money will front the costs of building three yurts and getting our doors open. People will be able to stay on our farm and experience the wonderful lifestyle of running a small family farm for years to come!

Quite honestly, we were hoping to stash away enough cash over the next few years to self-fund the yurts, but in order to do that it would take us 10 years working multiple jobs and facing burn out before we ever arrived. Early in 2014, we gathered some trusted friends and colleagues around us and shared our dream of opening Highland Heights to the public as a B&B. Everyone came back and said the same thing: “Get the funding. Do it now. Don’t wait.” We took them at their word and here we are.

A NOTE ABOUT TRUST.

With all crowdfunding ventures, there needs to be some reassurance that investments are trustworthy and legitimate. How do you know that we won't use the money to take our whole staff to Octoberfest for "team-building?" And how do you know the rewards will be honored?


We have built our farm from the ground up out of nothing which isn’t easy these days. Our partnership with Purdue University and Clinton County Extension office signifies we are part of the community, and we're not going anywhere. We have an award-winning team that has helped us get here, and we've got a solid plan for moving forward.

The money plan.

Let's get to the good stuff: how will we be spending the money? Well, here are the plans so far.



Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and we totally understand. You'll win a place in our hearts if you click one of our share buttons below, or simply tell your friends about our campaign to get people excited and participating. We're grateful for any efforts on our behalf.
story_txt:
Help Us Build Our Yurts and You Will Be the First to Stay in One!We need your help!! Highland Heights is a small, fully operational and sustainable farm in Indiana, USA just 20 minutes north of Indianapolis. It is time for us to expand and offer something brand new an- agritourism resort. Every guest we have had stay at the farm has said how peaceful it is here, and that it would make a great get-away. So, we are bringing to you the perfect vacation with a farm experience with all luxury amenities! Join our campaign and help us build our yurts by booking your next vacation.Who Are We?Evan and Autumn Overbay along with their 2 young children have owned and managed Highland Heights Farm, a small farm in Central Indiana since 2009. Despite our farm only sitting on 7 acres, we have always dreamed big! We are committed to our mission of acting locally by employing sustainable farming methods, including organically grown produce and livestock, supporting other local business, providing educational experiences and being environmentally sustainable with the aim of having a more global impact.What Are We?Currently, Highland Heights Farm is a small, working farm with a large outdoor event venue, located just 20 miles from Indianapolis. 

With a successful campaign, our aim is to make Highland Heights a sustainable agritoursim resort. The jewel in our crown will be our luxurious Bed & Breakfast made up of three luxury yurts giving our guests a unique, and enjoyable stay. Our guests can choose to relax under the big Indiana skies, whilst sitting on the deck of a one of our new yurts, with a book in one  hand and glass of their favorite drink in the other. Or, for those with more energy, we will offer a unique insight into day-to-day running of a small farm, giving our guests the opportunity to get involved with farm life. We will also offer, high quality farm-to-table cuisine that the most discerning of travelers have come to expect. Our aim is to create a destination that our guests will visit again and again.There is just one problem. In order to achieve our dream.Let us paint a picture of what this campaign can achieve.

After a short, 20 mile drive from Indianapolis, you will spot our sign letting you know you have arrived at Highland Heights. Pulling into our drive, you will notice two beehives in which, our own bees produce delicious honey, a community garden nestled up against our 100 year old barn and brick silo. If you listen, you will hear sounds of our ducks and chickens, and our friendly barn cat, ‘Donkey’ will no doubt be running up to be petted. Our welcoming committee also includes our Border Collie farm dog, Zoe. As you walk through our beautiful gardens, you will arrive in our apple orchard. Tucked, just behind our orchard, you will see our three, luxury Yurts, overlooking neighboring Indiana cornfields.  A peaceful and secluded escape, just waiting for you to arrive.

Our three, 24' yurts will include all the luxuries you would expect to find in any top class Bed and Breakfast. Hickory hardwood flooring, a wood stove to keep warm during those chilly evenings and 180 degrees of fully functioning glass windows providing uninterrupted views of our beautiful farm. Our yurts will feature a queen size bed, leather chairs, and a small kitchenette where you can make your favorite hot drink. Each yurt will feature its own, private deck, on which you can enjoy your favorite drink whilst watching the sun setting over the Indiana countryside. Every yurt will have their own private bathroom, complete with a walk in shower, toilet and sink. The finest plush towels, bathrobes and slippers are provided for your comfort.

Outside, just off the deck of the yurt, a campfire will be waiting, ready for cooking a cowboy dinner, or to simply make a s’more while you enjoy the evening.

On the other side of the apple orchard, there will be a 30' yurt with a deck encircling the entire yurt. This will be available for weddings and business conferences providing seating for up to 58 guests inside and more seating available on the deck. This will be the perfect setting for a country style wedding or business retreat. Eight, bar-height tables with whiskey barrel bases, will give a rustic feel whilst still providing plenty of comfort. For our business users, we will have full PA and Projection systems in place along with wifi connectivity.
Outside the 30' yurt will be an arbor for weddings, with space for plenty of seating. We will offer straw bales covered in burlap for that perfect country wedding setting.
Over near the horse pasture there will be a set of bleachers for our group and corporate team building sessions. In the pasture a 70' riding pen will be used for small and private EAL sessions.

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP?
Running a growing farm is expensive. We are fortunate that the farm is already a sustainable business, but that is only a small part of our mission. We want to share our farm with more people. We want to give others the chance to experience the lifestyle of sustainable, rural living. While we could go to the bank or an investor, we believe that people like you want to support projects like us. We want to avoid debt or giving away large portions of our business. So, we are turning to the power of social media and crowdfunding. We are offering you the chance to play your part in the building of Highland Heights. We are not just asking for your money offering nothing in return. We know we have some great perks for you! Your money will front the costs of building three yurts and getting our doors open. People will be able to stay on our farm and experience the wonderful lifestyle of running a small family farm for years to come!Quite honestly, we were hoping to stash away enough cash over the next few years to self-fund the yurts, but in order to do that it would take us 10 years working multiple jobs and facing burn out before we ever arrived. Early in 2014, we gathered some trusted friends and colleagues around us and shared our dream of opening Highland Heights to the public as a B&B. Everyone came back and said the same thing: “Get the funding. Do it now. Don’t wait.” We took them at their word and here we are.A NOTE ABOUT TRUST.With all crowdfunding ventures, there needs to be some reassurance that investments are trustworthy and legitimate. How do you know that we won't use the money to take our whole staff to Octoberfest for "team-building?" And how do you know the rewards will be honored?
We have built our farm from the ground up out of nothing which isn’t easy these days. Our partnership with Purdue University and Clinton County Extension office signifies we are part of the community, and we're not going anywhere. We have an award-winning team that has helped us get here, and we've got a solid plan for moving forward. 

The money plan.Let's get to the good stuff: how will we be spending the money? Well, here are the plans so far.Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, and we totally understand. You'll 
win a place in our hearts if you click one of our share buttons below, 
or simply tell your friends about our campaign to get people excited and participating. 
We're grateful for any efforts on our behalf.

story:
Version Française >>>

You miss this opportunity? To buy VertiGOmug go to www.vertiGOmug.com

 

The innovative mug that can prevent you from burning yourself while keeping your beverage hot for a longer period of time.

VertiGOmug is a simple, novel and incredibly good looking mug that makes every sip awaken and stimulate your senses. The perfect gift for the ones you love.

Schematic view of BB & WW Duetto

 

Made of ceramics and natural silicone, this product will make every cup a real emotional and comforting experience down to the last drop!

Appreciate the flavor and pleasure without the hassle of drinking an over hot beverage in non user-friendly containers.

Use it every day, everywhere, at home,the office, or on the road. vertiGOmug fits in car cup holders and you can refill it at your preferred coffee shop.

As product designers, we are constantly looking for problems or challenges to be solve. The issues of drinking hot beverages took a lot of innovate thinking.

Pain points:

We have all been scalded by that first sip of too hot coffee, hot chocolate, tea at some time or other!

If you’re like us, drinking coffee from a paper cup or plastic mug is like drinking wine in a foam glass!!!

What a disgusting way to enjoy pleasures of a great coffee taste! You can wait ages for the coffee to be drinkable, then before you know it, it's cold and only good for the sink! What a waste!!!

Mugs and tumblers made of plastics give of toxic vapors when subjected to high temperatures, everyone knows that, right?

Don't be sorry! Billions of paper cups end up in landfill each year because they cannot be recycled.

vertiGOmug, a must have solution:

Wouldn't it be wonderful if we could just take 1 or 2 sips at the perfect temperature while the rest of it stays hot, for longer?

Wouldn't it be great if we could always can put our lips on the soft and comforting texture of glass or ceramics?

Wouldn't it be really cool to get all those things while being environmental friendly, and using food safe materials?

As product designers, we always keep an open mind, using creativity to solve every day needs, providing solutions that improve people's life, we think you deserve it!

Schematic view of BW & WB Duetto

Made of ceramics and natural silicone, vertiGOmug is a 12oz (375ml) double wall insulated mug that keeps beverages hot.

You will always feel the luxury of ceramic on lips when drinking.

Drink from our innovative ceramic lid that cools liquids to the temperature you want in seconds, 1 or 2 sips at the time while the remaining beverage is kept hot in the insulated area. You can also remove the top and drink directly from the cup.

Oh! and the sealing lid prevents accidental spills. Isn't that wonderful too!?!

 
Schematic view of WO Solo

How does vertiGOmug work?

It way it works is very simple, but very cleverly to.

As you saw in the video with our fully functional prototype, you fill the mug with your favorite hot beverage and then put the lid on just like a regular mug or tumbler.

The difference and big advantage is that you don't need to wait for the entire volume to cool before drinking: You push the side button in, this pumps a sip into the cooling zone in the lid.

Simply wait for that sip to cool down to the desired temperature and drink. This operation takes approximately 10 seconds depending of liquid and ambient air temperatures. It may take up to 60 seconds if the liquid is at boiling temperature.

No batteries, no complicated mechanisms, no hassle, easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Feel free to propose any optimizations, we are open to suggestion and who knows, we may add them before production.

Who are we?

Well, as you saw in the featured video, we are professional product designers. We have been involved in more than a hundred design projects.

Roberto Barbusci, associated VP at A3D innovation.

Inventor of the vertiGOmug, in 1990, he achieved a toolmakers degree and has been an industrial designer since 1998.

Véronique Bibeau-Poissant, CEO at A3D innnovation industrial designer since 1999

 

At A3D innovation, product design, prototyping, tooling and manufacturing is what we have done for our customers and partners since 2003.

We are in perfect control every step of the design process from the concept to shelve ready product.

Since 1998, we have helped inventors and entrepreneurs to build they're business.

In 2008, we set up a distribution channel that is ready to ship any new product worldwide

Production plan and why Indiegogo.

We're here to make the required sales to pay for the tooling and to lower the production costs by being able to order bigger volumes of our brilliant vertiGOmug.

To do so, we offer you early bird special deals, so buy with confidence, talk about us to all your contacts, ''share'' and ''like'' us on Facebook and others.

Your help is highly appreciated and will help us on our mission to improve people’s lifes.  Plus you'll get a very special deal, you deserve it. Cheers!

Thank you.

vertiGOmug design team.

 

Choose your style and specify the vertiGOmug item reference by selecting the good perk.

Models and reference:

Schematic view of colors choice

Patents pending.US61/755,501

 

Press release:

 

 

 

Version Française  cliquez ici pour voir la vidéo en Français

Vous avez manqué cette opportunité? Achetez VertiGOmug ici: www.vertiGOmug.ca

VertiGOmug permet à son utilisateur de boire sans se brûler grâce à son système ingénieux qui propulse quelques gorgées à refroidir sur un plateau supérieur alors que la réserve isolée conserve le brevage chaud.

VertiGOmug est une tasse tout simplement géniale au look incroyable qui fait de chaque gorgée l'éveil qui stimule vos sens. Le cadeau idéal pour l'être chère!

 

Vue schématique des modèles BB & WW en format ''Duetto''

Faite de céramique et de silicone naturel, vertiGOmug fera de chaque breuvage une véritable expérience émotionnelle et réconfortante de la première gorgée à la dernière goutte!

Appréciez la saveur et le plaisir sans les tracas de boire une boisson chaude à même les contenants non conviviaux qui vous brûle la bouche dès la première gorgée.

Utilisez-la à tous les jours, partout, à la maison, au bureau ou sur la route. vertiGOmug convient aux porte-gobelets des véhicules et vous pouvez en faire le plein chez votre commerçant de café préféré.

Points de douleurs:

Nous avons tous été brûlés par cette première gorgée trop chaude de café, de chocolat chaud ou de thé à un moment ou à un autre!

Si vous êtes comme nous, vous détestez boire du café dans une tasse de papier ou une tasse en plastique, c'est comme boire du vin dans un verre en styromousse! Quelle manière désagréable de savourer les plaisirs de la vie!

il faut attendre des lustres pour un café prêt à boire, puis surprise, avant même de le réaliser, il est trop froid et seulement bon pour l'évier! Quel gâchis!

Les tasses et les gobelets en plastique émanent des vapeurs toxiques lorsqu'ils sont soumis à des températures élevés, tout le monde sait ça, n'est-ce pas?

Ne participez plus à ce désastre: Des milliards de gobelets en papier finissent dans la nature chaque année parce qu'ils ne peuvent pas être recyclés!

vertiGOmug, un must à vous procurer absolument:

Ne serait-il pas merveilleux si nous pouvions obtenir quelques gorgées à la température idéale pendant que le reste du breuvage se conserve au chaud dans une réserve isolée?

Ne serait-il pas merveilleux si nous pouvions toujours appuyer nos lèvres contre la texture douce et réconfortante de la céramique?

Ne serait-il pas idéal d'obtenir toutes ces choses, tout en étant respectueux de l'environnement et en utilisant des matériaux approuvés pour les aliments?

En tant que concepteurs de produits, nous gardons toujours l'esprit ouvert et nous utilisons notre créativité pour résoudre les besoins latents du quotidien en fournissant des solutions pratiques qui améliorent la qualité de vie des gens.

Nous croyons que vous le méritez bien!

 Vue schématique des modèles BW & WB en format ''Duetto''

 

Fait de céramique et de silicone naturel, vertiGOmug est une tasse de 12oz (375ml) à double paroi isolée qui garde les boissons chaudes plus longtemps que ses acolytes.


Vous ressentirez toujours le lux et le réconfort de la céramique sur vos lèvres en buvant.


Buvez directement du couvercle innovateur en céramique qui refroidit les liquides à la température que vous désirez en quelques secondes seulement, 1 ou 2 gorgées à la fois tandis que la boisson reste bien au chaud dans la réserve isolée.

 

Vous pouvez également boire directement à la tasse en retirant simplement le couvercle.


Ah oui! Et le couvercle étanche empêche également les déversements accidentels. N'est-ce pas merveilleux!?!

 

Vue schématique du modèle WO en format ''Solo''

Comment fonctionne vertiGOmug?

son fonctionnement est très simple et son mécanisme est précis.

Comme vous l'avez probablement observé dans la vidéo démontrant notre prototype fonctionnel, il suffit de remplir votre vertiGOmug de votre boisson chaude préférée, puis simplement installer le couvercle innovateur.


La différence et surtout l'avantage est que vous n'avez pas besoin d'attendre que la totalité du volume liquide refroidisse avant de commencer à boire: Vous appuyez sur le bouton latéral qui pompe une gorgée de liquide dans la zone de refroidissement, sur le dessus du couvercle.


Attendez simplement que le liquide chaud se retrouvant dans la zone de refroidissement ait atteint la température désirée et buvez.

 

Cette opération prend environ 10 secondes en fonction de la température du liquide et de la température ambiante. Cela peut prendre jusqu'à 60 secondes si le liquide est à la température d'ébullition de 100 degrés Celcius.

 

Pas de piles, pas de mécanismes compliqués, pas de soucis, facile à nettoyer et va au lave-vaisselle. N'hésitez pas à proposer des optimisations, nous sommes ouverts aux suggestions et, qui sait, nous pourrons peut-être les ajouter avant la production.

Qui sommes-nous?

Nous sommes des designers de produits, plus précisément ''designers industriels'', ayant plus d'une centaines de projets réalisés à notre portfolio.

Roberto Barbusci, VP associé chez A3D innovation.

inventeur du vertiGOmug, en 1990, il obtient son diplôme d'outilleur (fabricant de moule) et il est designer industriel depuis 1998.

Véronique Bibeau-Poissant, Présidente chez A3D innnovation, elle est designer industrielle depuis 1999.

 

Chez A3D innovation, le design de produit, le prototypage, l'outillage et la production sont les services que nous offrons depuis 2003 à l'ensemble de notre clientèle.

Nous sommes en parfait contrôle de toutes les étapes du processus de design, du premier esquisse au produit prêt à livrer.

Depuis 1998, les gens qui composent l'équipe de A3D innovation aident les inventeurs et les entrepreneurs à développer leurs entreprises.

En 2008, nous avons renforci notre réseau de production et de distribution nous permettant de livrer nos nouveaux produits mondialement, de notre créativité à votre porte!

vertiGOmug et Indiegogo.

Nous utilisons une plateforme de ''financement populaire'' parce que nous y croyons et qu'ensemble, nous parviendrons à améliorer la qualité de vie des gens, un produit à la fois.

 

Ce processus est très intelligent car il nous permet d'effectuer les ventes nécessaires pour défrayer l'outillage, diminuer les risques financiers et abaisser les coûts de production afin de vous offrir un produit de qualité à un juste prix. En effet, commander des volumes plus importants de notre vertiGOmug fait chuter les coûts de production et c'est vous qui en profitez.


Pour ce faire, nous vous proposons des prix spéciaux sur vos préachats du vertiGOmug présentés sous plusieurs couleurs attrayante.

 

Achetez en toute confiance, parler de nous à tous vos contacts, ''partagez'' et ''aimez-nous'' sur Facebook et tous vos autres réseaux sociaux.


Votre aide est très appréciée et vous participerez à notre mission d'améliorer la qualité de vie des gens en plus de profiter d'une offre très spéciale, vous le méritez.

Santé!

Merci.

de l'équipe vertiGOmug.

Choisissez votre style et achetez votre vertiGOmug dès maintenant:

Modèles and codes de produit:

 

Choix de couleurs

Patents pending.US61/755,501

Vue schématique du modèle WO en format ''Solo''
Comment fonctionne vertiGOmug?
son fonctionnement est très simple et son mécanisme est précis.
Comme vous l'avez probablement observé dans la vidéo démontrant notre prototype fonctionnel, il suffit de remplir votre vertiGOmug de votre boisson chaude préférée, puis simplement installer le couvercle innovateur.
La différence et surtout l'avantage est que vous n'avez pas besoin d'attendre que la totalité du volume liquide refroidisse avant de commencer à boire: Vous appuyez sur le bouton latéral qui pompe une gorgée de liquide dans la zone de refroidissement, sur le dessus du couvercle.
Attendez simplement que le liquide chaud se retrouvant dans la zone de refroidissement ait atteint la température désirée et buvez.
 
Cette opération prend environ 10 secondes en fonction de la température du liquide et de la température ambiante. Cela peut prendre jusqu'à 60 secondes si le liquide est à la température d'ébullition de 100 degrés Celcius.
 

Pas de piles, pas de mécanismes compliqués, pas de soucis, facile à nettoyer et va au lave-vaisselle. N'hésitez pas à proposer des optimisations, nous sommes ouverts aux suggestions et, qui sait, nous pourrons peut-être les ajouter avant la production.
Qui sommes-nous?
Nous sommes des designers de produits, plus précisément ''designers industriels'', ayant plus d'une centaines de projets réalisés à notre portfolio.
Roberto Barbusci, VP associé chez A3D innovation.
inventeur du vertiGOmug, en 1990, il obtient son diplôme d'outilleur (fabricant de moule) et il est designer industriel depuis 1998.
Véronique Bibeau-Poissant, Présidente chez A3D innnovation, elle est designer industrielle depuis 1999.
 
Chez A3D innovation, le design de produit, le prototypage, l'outillage et la production sont les services que nous offrons depuis 2003 à l'ensemble de notre clientèle.
Nous sommes en parfait contrôle de toutes les étapes du processus de design, du premier esquisse au produit prêt à livrer.
Depuis 1998, les gens qui composent l'équipe de A3D innovation aident les inventeurs et les entrepreneurs à développer leurs entreprises.
En 2008, nous avons renforci notre réseau de production et de distribution nous permettant de livrer nos nouveaux produits mondialement, de notre créativité à votre porte!
vertiGOmug et Indiegogo.
Nous utilisons une plateforme de ''financement populaire'' parce que nous y croyons et qu'ensemble, nous parviendrons à améliorer la qualité de vie des gens, un produit à la fois.
 
Ce processus est très intelligent car il nous permet d'effectuer les ventes nécessaires pour défrayer l'outillage, diminuer les risques financiers et abaisser les coûts de production afin de vous offrir un produit de qualité à un juste prix. En effet, commander des volumes plus importants de notre vertiGOmug fait chuter les coûts de production et c'est vous qui en profitez.
Pour ce faire, nous vous proposons des prix spéciaux sur vos préachats du vertiGOmug présentés sous plusieurs couleurs attrayante.
 
Achetez en toute confiance, parler de nous à tous vos contacts, ''partagez'' et ''aimez-nous'' sur Facebook et tous vos autres réseaux sociaux.
Votre aide est très appréciée et vous participerez à notre mission d'améliorer la qualité de vie des gens en plus de profiter d'une offre très spéciale, vous le méritez.
Santé!
Merci.
de l'équipe vertiGOmug.
Choisissez votre style et achetez votre vertiGOmug dès maintenant:
Modèles and codes de produit:
 
Choix de couleurs
Patents pending.US61/755,501

story:
Our Story:

Growing up in Southern California we've always loved living life to the fullest. Whether we were hanging out on the beach or hitting the slopes in the mountains we were always having fun and enjoying life!

It was at one of those moments when Brian (the founder) was riding one of the local canyons on his motorcycle that the idea of NTL came to him. Growing up he was constantly trying new things, whether it was surfing, snowboarding, or mountain biking he knew it was "never too late" to do what he loved!

So from the idea that it's never too late; NTL was born. Over the year's the idea of NTL has grown and adapted with Brian and his friends. For Brian NTL started it's meaning as "never too late", but for some of his friends it means some completely different. With that in mind NTL stands for something else to every individual. Whether it means "never too late", "nothing too lose", or whatever else you want it stand for NTL is less of a brand and more of a life style!


Our Designs:

We are currently offering two different models of sunglasses and two different t-shirt designs.

Our Shades:

Ryder - Our Ryder shades are made from skateboard material, giving your shades a unique and stylish look! We currently offer the one color, but hope to add additional colors soon!

Norco - The Norco shades are made from lightweight and stylish bamboo, giving you a classic and awesome look! You can get the Norco's in either a light bamboo or dark bamboo color.

T-Shirt Designs:

Spray - Our t-shirts are made from high quality materials. The Spray design currently comes in three different colors: black, white or red.

Outline - Our t-shirts are made from high quality materials. The Outline design currently comes in three different colors: black, navy, or white.


Save Now Before Our Campaign is Over!


Frequently Asked Questions

Are the lenses on your sunglasses polarized?

  • Yes. Our polarized lenses have been produced to eliminate atmospheric, reflective glare and to protect against UVA and UVB rays.

Do your sunglasses float?

  • Yes. Our sunglasses are water proof and can even float!

How long will my wood or bamboo sunglasses last?

  • Our sunglasses are made from durable bamboo or hardwood, which is chosen for its long lasting characteristics. NTL Shades are made to last for as long as you maintain them!
Is shipping included?

  • Yes shipping is included on all domestic shipments. For international shipments an additional fee is required to help cover shipping costs.
Do you ship internationally?

  • Yes we do ship internationally, but request you please add the additional shipping fee to help cover shipping costs.


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that there are some people who can't contribute at this time but any little bit helps. Even by sharing this with your friends and family on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any other social media outlet, you help us by getting our name out to those who might be interested.
